['', 'Define best practices and new processes to collect, analyze, and manage data', 'Experience in the digital media industry is a strong plus', 'You have a logical, problem-solving mentality', 'Experience working with cloud architectures (AWS or GCP)', 'TIME is seeking a Data Engineer to lead engineering on our newly formed Data Insights team. This is an opportunity to help transform the way the organization uses data to drive business decisions.', 'You are creative, flexible, eager to learn, and able to work productively in a multi-project, deadline-driven environment', 'Create data models and manage ETL processes for loading our data into them', 'Build, debug, and scale data pipelines that ingest data into our data warehouseCreate data models and manage ETL processes for loading our data into themPrepare data for Data Science and Machine Learning use casesWork closely with Data Analysts to ensure our data is properly modeled and organized for efficient SQL queryingWork closely with the product engineering team to make sure all new features are properly capturing dataDefine best practices and new processes to collect, analyze, and manage dataTroubleshoot data discrepancies; resolve and articulate them', 'Qualifications:', 'You have 2+ years working as a Data Engineer', 'Mastery of SQL', 'Past Experience building ETL pipelines', 'Work closely with the product engineering team to make sure all new features are properly capturing data', 'You have a Bachelor’s degree with a concentration in MIS / Computer Science / Engineering / Data Science or other technical field, or equivalent experience', 'You have a Bachelor’s degree with a concentration in MIS / Computer Science / Engineering / Data Science or other technical field, or equivalent experienceYou have 2+ years working as a Data EngineerExpertise in JavaScript, Python, Java or another high level programming languageExperience building and maintaining data pipelines, possibly using Hadoop, MapReduce, SparkExperience working with cloud architectures (AWS or GCP)Past Experience building ETL pipelinesMastery of SQLYou have working knowledge of BI tools like Looker and Tableau (experience in Looker specifically is a plus)You have a logical, problem-solving mentalityYou have exposure to Data Warehouses and a strong understanding of data modeling concepts and methodologiesStrong communication skills and a proven ability to communicate not just raw data but what the data means to various non-technical audiencesYou are creative, flexible, eager to learn, and able to work productively in a multi-project, deadline-driven environmentExperience in the digital media industry is a strong plus', 'Troubleshoot data discrepancies; resolve and articulate them', 'Prepare data for Data Science and Machine Learning use cases', '\xa0', 'Experience building and maintaining data pipelines, possibly using Hadoop, MapReduce, Spark', 'You have exposure to Data Warehouses and a strong understanding of data modeling concepts and methodologies', 'Work closely with Data Analysts to ensure our data is properly modeled and organized for efficient SQL querying', 'Strong communication skills and a proven ability to communicate not just raw data but what the data means to various non-technical audiences', 'Expertise in JavaScript, Python, Java or another high level programming language', 'As a Data Engineer, you will be responsible for building and maintaining the data pipelines that ingest data into TIME’s data warehouse. In addition, you will work closely with other members of the data team and organization to build out our holistic data platform and help use data to drive company-wide decisions.', 'The Job:', 'Responsibilities:', 'Build, debug, and scale data pipelines that ingest data into our data warehouse', 'You have working knowledge of BI tools like Looker and Tableau (experience in Looker specifically is a plus)']

If you are a highly independent worker and have excellent organizational and problem-solving skills, this is the job for you. Working at Megaphone also means full benefits, competitive salary, and a friendly work environment. This role is open to fully remote candidates, as well as candidates near our Reston, VA office. ['', 'A solid foundation in data modeling, experience with data transformation, and in-depth knowledge of distributed systems.A passion for building and defining a strong foundation of using data-driven approaches to make key business decisions cross-functionally throughout an organization.\xa0', 'Decide what metrics are worth tracking, work with technical and non-technical teams to instrument data, and provide visibility to people all around the company.\xa0', 'You will:', 'Stock options', 'Competitive health, dental, and vision benefitsStock optionsFlexible and open vacation policyWork from home allowance\xa0\xa0Generous parental leave policy', '          -SQL and scripting experience with one of the following: Python, Ruby, or Node.JS', '          -Machine Learning skills a plus!\xa0', 'About Particle', 'Manage the flow of data across multiple sources and build/use tools that reliably extract and load data from various sources.\xa0', '          -Stitch, Segment or DBT\xa0', 'A passion for building and defining a strong foundation of using data-driven approaches to make key business decisions cross-functionally throughout an organization.\xa0', 'Pursuant to the SF Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider employment for qualified applicants with arrests and conviction records.', '          -Tableau (preferred) or a similar BI Analytics tool', 'Investment in our people is critical to who we are as a company. From there, you’ll work with your manager to create your own growth path and get the coaching needed to achieve it. Our people get:', 'At least 10 years of experience in data engineering with proven success designing, building, and maintaining big data pipeline systems at scale.Deep knowledge of and extensive experience with:', '          -Snowflake or Redshift ', 'We are inspired by our mission of enabling the next technological revolution, and by the incredible products that people build on our platform. ['', 'A solid foundation in data modeling, experience with data transformation, and in-depth knowledge of distributed systems.A passion for building and defining a strong foundation of using data-driven approaches to make key business decisions cross-functionally throughout an organization.\xa0', 'Decide what metrics are worth tracking, work with technical and non-technical teams to instrument data, and provide visibility to people all around the company.\xa0', 'You will:', 'Stock options', 'Competitive health, dental, and vision benefitsStock optionsFlexible and open vacation policyWork from home allowance\xa0\xa0Generous parental leave policy', '          -SQL and scripting experience with one of the following: Python, Ruby, or Node.JS', '          -Machine Learning skills a plus!\xa0', 'About Particle', 'Manage the flow of data across multiple sources and build/use tools that reliably extract and load data from various sources.\xa0', '          -Stitch, Segment or DBT\xa0', 'A passion for building and defining a strong foundation of using data-driven approaches to make key business decisions cross-functionally throughout an organization.\xa0', 'Pursuant to the SF Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider employment for qualified applicants with arrests and conviction records.', '          -Tableau (preferred) or a similar BI Analytics tool', 'Investment in our people is critical to who we are as a company. Health and safety of our employees is our number one priority. We have updated our reimbursement policy for certain work-related expenses to ensure employees have the equipment and resources they need to work from home effectively. From extensive onboarding to 360 feedback, you’ll have the tools to navigate your own success from the start. From there, you’ll work with your manager to create your own growth path and get the coaching needed to achieve it. Our people get:', 'At least 10 years of experience in data engineering with proven success designing, building, and maintaining big data pipeline systems at scale.Deep knowledge of and extensive experience with:', '          -Snowflake or Redshift ', 'We are inspired by our mission of enabling the next technological revolution, and by the incredible products that people build on our platform. We also support our Particle family and community by embracing our core values of caring, curiosity, openness, joy, and trust.', 'A solid foundation in data modeling, experience with data transformation, and in-depth knowledge of distributed systems.', 'Manage the flow of data across multiple sources and build/use tools that reliably extract and load data from various sources.\xa0Decide what metrics are worth tracking, work with technical and non-technical teams to instrument data, and provide visibility to people all around the company.\xa0Validate and invalidate key assumptions through the democratization of data.Build coherent, version-controlled data models in Tableau that empower the entire company to make sense of and make key business decisions using a data-driven approach.\xa0Empower operational teams by integrating key actionable data points into load-bearing operational CRMs, including but not limited to Marketo, Salesforce, Netsuite.\xa0', 'Competitive health, dental, and vision benefits', 'Generous parental leave policy', 'Empower operational teams by integrating key actionable data points into load-bearing operational CRMs, including but not limited to Marketo, Salesforce, Netsuite.\xa0', 'Work from home allowance\xa0\xa0', 'Everyone is welcome at Particle. We are an equal opportunity employer who values diversity and inclusion and look for applicants who understand, embrace and thrive in a multicultural world. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', '\xa0', 'About the Role', 'As Particle’s first data engineer, you will work closely with both business and technical stakeholders to help shape the way we store and retrieve data efficiently. As someone passionate about data, you will build and implement a large-scale data platform that will help engineering, product, sales, marketing, operations teams make use of the data they collect. This is a highly visible role in which you will define best practices for making data-driven decisions across the organization and a result, have a direct impact on the growth and success of Particle.', 'You have:', '          -MongoDB (preferred) or other non-relational databases', 'At least 10 years of experience in data engineering with proven success designing, building, and maintaining big data pipeline systems at scale.', "Particle is the most widely-used Internet of Things (IoT) platform. We've built the largest community of developers and engineers in the industry, and we've shipped more than hundreds of thousands of development kits to 170 countries. Hundreds of IoT products, from smart home appliances to industrial equipment, are being built on Particle's platform. We are committed to making it easy for anyone to get their products online, and we support product creators of any size — from Fortune 500s to blossoming entrepreneurs.", 'Deep knowledge of and extensive experience with:', 'Validate and invalidate key assumptions through the democratization of data.', 'Our people get:', 'Flexible and open vacation policy', 'Build coherent, version-controlled data models in Tableau that empower the entire company to make sense of and make key business decisions using a data-driven approach.\xa0']

['', 'Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured data sets.', 'On the behalf of a client in the health tech industry Skills Pipeline is looking for a savvy Data Engineer to join our growing Technology team. This position will be responsible for expanding and optimizing our data and data pipeline architecture, as well as optimizing data flow and collection for cross-functional teams. ['- Join a newly created team as one of the early engineers and will have significant opportunity to make an impact by building the next generation of extended reality/AR experiences for online and in-store customers ', '- Solve real customer problems and help hundreds of millions of Walmart customers to save money and live better ', 'Software Engineer III ', '- Experience building consumer mobile apps and/or AR/VR products. ', '- An entreprenurial mindset who can do whatever it takes to quickly build new MVPs. ', 'As part of this emerging-tech group we are looking for a software engineer for building the infrastructure and platform for creating the next-generation of extended-realtity/AR experiences. ', 'In this role, you will ', 'As an example, the voice assistant team within this group has launched experiences like AskSam for associates and Walmart Voice Order for customers (https://medium.com/walmartglobaltech/building-a-conversational-assistant-platform-for-voice-enabled-shopping-6d174cdc4131). In addition to the end-user experiences the group also builds platform APIs and tools to enable other teams within Walmart to build and scale expereinces using these next-generation technologies. ', 'Must-Haves : ', '- Background in e-commerce or retail ', '- Prior experience building and launching AR/Vision/VR products and/or services ', '- Strong communication skills ', 'Software Engineer III  \xa0  The Walmart Emerging-Tech group is a new group charted to drive the creation of the next generation retail and shopping experiences for both online and in-store.  The group leads Walmarts efforts in the areas of Conversational AI, Voice Assistants, Extended Reality and more. The groups focus is to explore and build prototypes of innovative shopping experiences and build platforms to enable scaling of these experiences.  As an example, the voice assistant team within this group has launched experiences like AskSam for associates and Walmart Voice Order for customers (https://medium.com/walmartglobaltech/building-a-conversational-assistant-platform-for-voice-enabled-shopping-6d174cdc4131). In addition to the end-user experiences the group also builds platform APIs and tools to enable other teams within Walmart to build and scale expereinces using these next-generation technologies.  \xa0  As part of this emerging-tech group we are looking for a software engineer for building the infrastructure and platform for creating the next-generation of extended-realtity/AR experiences.  \xa0  In this role, you will  - Join a newly created team as one of the early engineers and will have significant opportunity to make an impact by building the next generation of extended reality/AR experiences for online and in-store customers  - Design, prototype and build new and innovative AR retail experiences to demostrate and accelerate AR adoption across the company.  - Design and build APIs, platforms and tools to scale creation of AR experiences across Walmart  - Solve real customer problems and help hundreds of millions of Walmart customers to save money and live better  \xa0  \xa0  Must-Haves :  - Strong design, architecture, and problem-solving skills.  - An entreprenurial mindset who can do whatever it takes to quickly build new MVPs.  - Experience building consumer mobile apps and/or AR/VR products.  - Strong communication skills  \xa0  \xa0  Preferred Qualifications :  - Prior experience building and launching AR/Vision/VR products and/or services  - Background in e-commerce or retail  - Experience building products leveraging computer vision and/or ML/deep learning  \xa0', '\xa0', '- Design and build APIs, platforms and tools to scale creation of AR experiences across Walmart ', 'Software Engineer III', 'Preferred Qualifications : ', '- Experience building products leveraging computer vision and/or ML/deep learning ', '\xa0 ', '- Design, prototype and build new and innovative AR retail experiences to demostrate and accelerate AR adoption across the company. ', 'The Walmart Emerging-Tech group is a new group charted to drive the creation of the next generation retail and shopping experiences for both online and in-store.  The group leads Walmarts efforts in the areas of Conversational AI, Voice Assistants, Extended Reality and more. The groups focus is to explore and build prototypes of innovative shopping experiences and build platforms to enable scaling of these experiences. ', '- Strong design, architecture, and problem-solving skills. ']

['', '-\tMust be able to pass a Government background investigation and clearance, requiring US citizenship.', '-\tBe able to do shift work during mission.', '-\tMS Office skills required.', '-\tRelational database experience with an understanding of SQL.', '-\tSpacecraft subsystems experience in operations or I&T.', 'An Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer, Qwaltec is committed to hiring a diverse and talented workforce. For more information, visit qwaltec.com.', 'Qwaltec is seeking a Satellite Database Engineer on the NASA GSMO II contract in support of the On-Orbit Servicing, Assembly and Manufacturing mission 1 (OSAM-1) program at NASA Goddard Space Flight Center (GSFC). The position is located in Greenbelt, MD.', 'The OSAM-1 mission is a Goddard Space Flight Center Exploration and In-Space Services (NExIS) Projects Division managed mission. OSAM-1 is a robotic servicing mission designed to refuel a Low Earth Orbit (LEO) satellite. It contains 3 elements: the Flight Element comprised of the OSAM-1 Servicing Vehicle (RSV) and development testbeds, the Ground Element comprised of the systems required to conduct satellite operations and their supporting networks and facilities, and the Launch Element comprised of the Launch Vehicle and supporting facilities and services. NExIS is responsible for the design, engineering, development, test and operations of the OSAM-1 Mission through an integrated team at GSFC. The Servicing Payload design, development and RSV integration will be conducted at GSFC.', '-\tCoordinate with NASA Integration and Test (I&T) engineers to understand developments during spacecraft assembly.', '-\tSupport the FOT in meetings with vendors with regards to database contents. This includes coordinating with spacecraft, instrument, and ground system vendors.', 'PM20', '-\tSupport the FOT throughout mission.', 'Qwaltec is a Women-Owned Small Business (WOSB) that specializes in space systems operations. We provide expertise in operations and engineering, mission readiness, technical training, and systems engineering for satellite mission control centers. Our vision is to make a difference on and off the planet, by focusing as much on our customers and team members as we do on the mission. We strive for excellence and accountability, and we do everything we can to exceed expectations while acting with integrity and compassion. We invest in relationships, and we value openness, honesty, and fairness in all our endeavors. ', 'Primary responsibilities include the following:', '-\tHave a basic knowledge of cloud infrastructure. ', ' ', 'About Qwaltec', '-\tPrevious experience/proficiency with tools/languages such as XML, Perl, etc.', '-\tInterface with other spacecraft Subsystem SMEs as well as Spacecraft and Instrument SMEs for database feedback.', "-\tBachelor's degree and 5 years or more related experience; Masters and 3 years or more related experience.", '-\tBecome the Subject Matter Expert (SME) on the verification and validation of satellite databases to support the Flight Operation Team (FOT).', '-\tSupport other duties as assigned.', '-\tProvide support during database installation and testing of post deployment checkout.', '-\tSupport the development of database-related software tools.']

['Senior Data Engineer', 'Required Qualifications:', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Senior Data EngineerDeveloping Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a primary mission for LexisNexis and we are seeing the acceleration of amazing AI work being developed in the Legal space.  AI technology is evolving quickly, but “good AI” is only as good as its training data.   And LexisNexis has over 2PB of the best legal training data in the world!  We are looking for an experienced data engineer who is devoted to developing and maintaining our data pipeline and data lake. This central data platform will be the hub for AI and Business Intelligence across all of LexisNexis.The Data Engineer is responsible for ensuring the collection and storage of data in the LexisNexis Corporate Data Lake. The successful candidate must be able to quickly familiarize themselves with LexisNexis’ diverse data resources and have the ability to leverage the latest in AWS technologies to collect, maintain, and optimize the data platform.  The ideal candidate has built and maintained a large-scale data pipeline, hub, lake utilizing the AWS cloud platform. This position reports to the Sr. Director of Data Engineering.Key Responsibilities:•Add and maintain data flows into the LexisNexis Data Lake•Develop innovation, strategies, processes and best practices•Writing stored procedures, functions, and ETL jobs•Consult on feature design, implementation and relevant metrics like reliability and cost •Identify, analyze and resolve problems with the LexisNexis Data Lake• Recommend different ways to constantly improve data reliability and quality.•Prepare data for prescriptive and predictive modeling•Perform capacity monitoring and short and long-term capacity planning•Schedule and coordinate database jobs, monitor progress and completion of all jobs and take corrective action as needed•Collaborate with product analysts, data scientists and architects on different projectsRequired Qualifications:•5+ years experience with AWS products\xa0- Must include intimate familiarity with EC2, Redshift, RDS, and S3 \xa0 -Should have hands-on experience with Athena, DynamoDB, API Gateway, Lambda, and EMR•5+ years experience with SQL languages (ANSI, PostGres, MySQL, etc.)•3+ years experience with Python •2+ years experience Linux shell expertise. Must be able to analyze loads and tune job scheduling.•3+ years experience parsing data from XML documents•Bachelor of Science Degree in Engineering, Mathematics, or Computer Science Preferred Qualifications:•Exposure to at least one of the following from each category:\xa0- Spark, Hadoop, HPCC, or equivalent\xa0 -Python, Java, Scala, or equivalent\xa0 -SQL, ECL, or equivalent•AWS Certification is a plus•Experience with Google Cloud environment is a plus•Expertise in server backup and recovery•Ability to provide guidance to data scientists, engineers and other team members•Documentation skills for processes and procedures•Test-driven development and maintenance including techniques for applying best practices for overall project benefit.•Experience in data modeling, design and manipulation, optimization, and best practices•Strong interpersonal, communication, and presentation skills applicable to a wide audience including team members, various levels of management, and end users.']

['', 'To be considered for this role, you must have full right to work in the USA.', 'What you’ll do:', 'Ø C++ experience, academic and/or professionally', 'Ø Understanding of test-driven development', 'Ø A flexible benefits package including gym membership', 'Here at mthree, we pair talented graduates with leading global businesses. We’re always on the lookout for ambitious graduates to join the mthree Alumni Graduate Program, kick-starting your tech career within an entry-level C++ Developer role and working onsite with a leading Investment Bank, located in NYC.', 'What you’ll receive:', 'Ø Working knowledge of database concepts (SQL, stored procs, schema design)', 'Ø Solid software engineering principles (data structures, OO, design patterns, multithreading)', "After you've completed the paid training, you will start onsite as a C++ Developer, with a global investment bank in NYC.", 'Ø Ongoing training and pastoral care', 'You will work with key stakeholders across the business to create, test and improve the applications that play a fundamental role in the company’s daily operations. You will work across the software development lifecycle, gaining essential grounding in handling requirements, support and maintenance, while following an Agile methodology to constantly strive for better results and becoming indispensable to your team.', 'Ø 3.0 GPA or higher', 'Junior C++ Developer', 'We take great pride in celebrating the diversity of each and every individual who contributes to making mthree the company\u202fit is today and will be in the future. We value diversity both within mthree and with our partner companies, and we’re proud to provide an\u202fenvironment where all our colleagues can flourish by\u202fpromoting a strong culture of equality but most importantly,\u202finclusion. We never want people to change - only add to the amazing mix of people that work for mthree.', 'Ø Understanding of the formal software development lifecycle (SDLC)', 'Our 24-month graduate program begins with 4-8 weeks of paid training and career coaching, where you will learn everything you need to hit the ground running as a software developer.', 'Ø OOP development experience', 'Ø Pay increases every 6 months', 'What you need:', 'Ø B.S., Computer Science or within a STEM related subject', 'Ø Good trouble shooting and debugging skills', 'Ø Invaluable industry experience and the opportunity to start a career in a desirable and competitive industry', 'Ø A competitive graduate salary', 'If successful, you’ll work with a leading investment bank, as a C++ software developer, designing, developing and maintaining complex applications in a global team environment.', 'Ø Fully paid, in-depth and interactive training with a diverse group of like-minded graduates, delivered by experts with working knowledge of the field.']

['', 'The Candidate Shall Perform The Following Data Conditioning Tasks As Part Of The Data Science Experiment', ' Run a test of the machine learning/artificial intelligence algorithm on an unconditioned dataset.', 'Job Description', 'T Elecommuting Options', 'Work Location:', ' Perform testing of the machine learning/artificial algorithm that includes effectiveness tests using a methodology that is equal to or better than 10-fold cross-validation.', ' Use the labeled data to train a supervised machine learning or artificial intelligence algorithm with these rules.', 'Scheduled Weekly Hours', 'Additional Work Locations:', ' Identify and label a subset of data from a dataset provided by Sponsor, for which manually built ETL rules exist. Determine the amount of data to label based on the machine learning/artificial intelligence technique selected by candidate / team. Run a test of the machine learning/artificial intelligence algorithm on an unconditioned dataset. Perform testing of the machine learning/artificial algorithm that includes effectiveness tests using a methodology that is equal to or better than 10-fold cross-validation. Correct errors that cannot be properly trained with additional training or hand-crafted rules. The Sponsor believes that there will only be a few hand-craftedrules to address most problems. Use statistical sampling to estimate the number of errors in the conditioned dataset. Data conditioning experiments shall be designed to be no longer than 60 days in duration per experiment. Execute the Sponsor-approved data conditioning capability experiments using the existing IDL system(s) and cloud environment. Recommend additional data conditioning methods using advanced data capabilities such as, machine learning and other artificial intelligence capabilities. A subsequent IDL Data Science Experiment Plan every 90 days for the period of the contract. Document the results of the experiments in IDL Data Science Experiment Results no later than 30 days after the completion of each experiment. The IDL Data Science Experiment Results shall include a proposed methodology to implement the machine/artificial intelligence algorithm into the existing ETL processes.', ' Execute the Sponsor-approved data conditioning capability experiments using the existing IDL system(s) and cloud environment.', ' Data conditioning experiments shall be designed to be no longer than 60 days in duration per experiment.']

['', 'Please note this is a full-time role not available on contract/C2C and unfortunately we are not able to sponsor or transfer visas.', "Harrington Starr's client, a top investment firm in New York, is hiring for a junior or mid-level System Engineer to help build and automate the firm's infrastructure with a focus working in the Linux computing environment with a high degree of coding in Python for building out automation and services. You should be spending around 50% of your time coding in Python in your current role. Experience with Linux, basic computing concepts (OS and virtualized environments), Python, automation, shell scripting, configuration management, and provisioning (Chef, Puppet, Ansible, Terraform), and basic knowledge of storage and networking concepts is essential.']

job_text: ['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Lead engagements with the Global Markets business (Equities, Credit, Securitized Products etc.)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Create original insights from data by executing applied empirical research in a timely manner.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A PhD, or Masters with equivalent work experience, with a solid background in machine learning, statistical analytical techniques, quantitative social science research or experimental physical science. ['', 'DATA ANALYSIS:\xa0', "What you'll do:", 'COMMUNICATIONS AND COLLABORATION:', 'To see the full list of qualifications and eligibility criteria, click apply to review the job announcement on USAJOBS.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Consult with customers and apply analytical processes to the planning, design, and implementation of new and improved information systems to meet the business requirements of customer organizations.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Conduct the planning, development, implementation, and administration of systems for the acquisition, storage, and retrieval of data.', 'Meet at least One (1) of Three (3) Additional Competencies:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide technical advice to the Group Director and Deputy Director in the collecting, analyzing,interpreting and communicating insights from data.', 'As a Data Scientist, you will provide technical expertise to accomplish analysis of options and development of the design for advanced data systems, software, and complex programming specifications.', 'About the role:', 'DATA ENGINEERING AT SCALE: Design, develop, and operate systems for acquiring, ingesting, storing, and analyzing data at scale. Use data parallelization techniques or streaming technologies to process data. Monitor data flows and stored datasets to make improvements to data collection and ingestion mechanisms."', 'DATA VISUALIZATION: Use code-based data visualization tools (e.g., R, Python, D3) to implement graphics, charts, and complex data visualizations. Research and design visualizations tailored to specific audiences, including interactivity and narrative storytelling where appropriate.', 'Subject Matter Experts will evaluate the first two pages of your resume based on the competencies below.\xa0\xa0The first three (3) required competencies must be reflected in your resume. Additionally, you must have at lease one (1) of the latter three (3) competencies reflected in your resume.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Identify, adapt, and manage changes to data analysis tools in response to evolving user needs.', 'Meet all Three (3) Required Competencies:', 'DATA WRANGLING :\xa0', 'DATA WRANGLING :\xa0Programmatically transform, combine, and clean data in preparation for analysis. Apply appropriate techniques for dealing with imperfect data such as probabilistic matching and imputation of missing values. Document data definitions and issues for future reference.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop database system proposals and coordinate the efforts necessary to translate business requirements into effective IT data system solutions.', '\xa0', 'DATA SOURCE MONITORING AND IMPROVEMENT: Ensure that data sources are fit for their intended purpose through assessment of current data quality, monitoring for incoming changes in data quality, and improvement of data quality. Recommend improvements to upstream processes to improve data quality.', 'DATA ENGINEERING AT SCALE', 'COMMUNICATIONS AND COLLABORATION:\xa0Translate complex concepts and findings into concise, plain language consistent with mission goals that can be easily understood by a wide audience. Collaborate using tools like GitHub in a reproducible and organized manner on urgent project work while being responsive to a variety of stakeholders and team members with varying technical skills.', "Experience we're looking for:", 'DATA ANALYSIS:\xa0Conduct observational analyses using R or Python to explore data, test hypotheses, predict outcomes, and inform decisions. Derive meaning from structured, loosely structured, and unstructured data. Comfortable working with large datasets and numerous confounding variables.', 'DATA SOURCE MONITORING AND IMPROVEMENT', '*This job will close when we have received\xa0200 applications\xa0which may be sooner than the closing date.', 'DATA VISUALIZATION']

['', 'Role: Big data Engineer', 'We are looking to fill a position for a senior data engineer role that requires experience working with Spark, Scala and Apache Kafka. This position will be responsible in maintaining a highly critical change data capture application that processes streaming data and saves it to our data warehouse and data lake. Any prior experience with AWS services is preferred, especially AWS EMR and AWS S3.', 'Duration: Long Term Contract ', 'Location: 100% remote ', 'No C2C for this role ', 'This position will be responsible in maintaining a highly critical change data capture application that processes streaming data and saves it to our data warehouse and data lake. ', 'Job description: ', 'Aman', 'We are looking to fill a position for a senior data engineer role that requires experience working with Spark, Scala and Apache Kafka. ', 'Any prior experience with AWS services is preferred, especially AWS EMR and AWS S3.', 'Thanks', 'Skill Set: ', 'Skill Set: Scala, Python, Spark, AWS', '609 779 2071', 'aman@compunnel.com']

['', 'Experience in enterprise scale analytic solutions development and deployment with high performance, scalability, availability & reliability.', 'The ability to understand and recognize the economics of technology and the business goals', 'Working Knowledge in IDE environment/Tools like Jupyter, R Studio, GitHub, Docker, Jenkins', ' The ML Engineer works both independently and in collaboration with a cross-functional team of Data scientists and solution system architects to effectively develop, deploy, monitor, manage, and support AI/ML models and advanced analytics technology, data infrastructures, and underlying analytics use cases—primarily focused around open source technologies including cloud infrastructures. This individual evaluates short/long-term business needs required to support key business goals and priorities and works to ensure Advanced analytics solutions are built and deployed in an effective and efficient manner on \xa0Enterprise systems. Under the guidance of the Group’s Director and in cooperation with partners in decision science, technology, and data the Engineer will coordinate the development of on-premise and cloud-based analytical non-production and production infrastructure and tools providing computational and statistical capabilities to enhance business results and monetize on key data assets for business decision management solutions. The Engineer will be working closely with data scientists, data mining experts, and business partner supporting the design of experiments and analytics, data sampling and mining, verification of data quality and information integrity, and best practices around the development and deployment of predictive/prescriptive models, DevOps operational systems and practices, and data visualization solutions. The Engineer has responsibility for advising data scientists, Agile project teams, and solution architects in the integration of analytical models/methods into decision management solutions. The Engineer will assist peers in best practices and in the selection and integration of appropriate tools to support required analytic products in close coordination with the organization’s AI/AutoML analytics, digital intelligence engineers, solution/data architects, data integration developers, and data science community ensuring tight integration of functionality and toolsets.', 'Experience in using NLP, Bi/Visual analytics, Graph Databases like Neo4j/Tiger Graph is preferred,', 'Minimum 3+ Predictive Analytics model implementation experience in production environments using ML/DL libraries like TensorFlow, H20, Pytorch, Sci-kit Learn.', 'Candidate must be a self-starter and creative problem-solver with an innovative and curious mindset.', 'Programming in Python, R or Scala using distributed frameworks like PySpark, Spark, SparkR', 'Extensive Experience with R and Python including language-specific and data science-oriented packages required.', 'ESSENTIAL JOB FUNCTIONS', 'Minimum of 8 years of experience in IT and Big data software development is required', 'Solid understanding of databases such as DB2, Oracle, Teradata, MySQL, PostgreSQL', 'Exposure to Google Cloud services- GCP or any cloud environment.', 'The ability to perform industry analysis and identify business and technology trends specific to the portfolio', 'A broad, enterprise-wide view of the business and varying degrees of appreciation for strategy, processes and capabilities, enabling technologies, and governance', 'Certified Professional Google Data Engineer preferred', 'REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS', 'The ability to recognize pain points within the organization, functional interdependencies and cross-silo redundancies. Those issues may exist in role alignment, process gaps and overlaps, and business capability maturity gaps', 'ABOUT THE JOB', "Bachelor's degree in computer science, electrical/electronic engineering S/he is also the primary conduit for identifying, researching, and evaluating new and innovative technologies that enhance the organization’s enterprise analytics and advanced analytics capabilities.', 'The ability to visualize and create high-level models that can be used in future analysis to extend and mature the business architecture', 'Solid knowledge of data warehousing such as Hadoop, MapReduce, HIVE, Apache Spark, as well as cloud base data storage: Google Cloud Storage with various formats (Parquet, JSON, ORC, Avro, delimited)', 'Experience with Hadoop and Spark cluster, SparkSQL, Spark ML, and other third-party machine learning algorithms using Scala, PySpark and/or SparkR', 'Working experience on Apache Airflow', 'Financial and/or Banking background preferred.', ' ', 'Strong situational analysis and decision-making abilities', 'Big Data Machine Learning Engineer', ' The Decision Sciences team is part of the Enterprise Payments and Analytics organization. Our experienced team of AI/ML and Data Science practitioners focuses on engaging, enabling, and empowering decision-makers across the enterprise by developing, managing and supporting advanced analytics products and scalable digital solutions, such as real time and on demand predictive models and prescriptive analytics, and continuously researching, specifying, and deploying next-generation analytics capabilities. We are an internal consulting and services organization that works directly with users across the firm, including Lines of Businesses and partners in Enterprise Strategy, Marketing, Data Analytics, and Enterprise Architecture, to facilitate the development of innovative solutions that help the company compete and win with analytics.', 'The ability to assist business case creation and realization by aligning business goals to organizational capabilities', 'Strong communication skills and the ability to interact and collaborate with all levels of the organization.', 'Experiences in designing, developing, optimizing and troubleshooting complex data analytic pipelines and ML model applications using Spark, HDFS and other big data related technologies', 'Experience with Linux/Unix required', 'The ability to create capability portfolios and technical roadmaps addressing gaps', "Bachelor's degree in computer science, electrical/electronic engineering or other engineering or technical discipline is required.", 'The ability to apply architectural principles, methods, and tools to business challenges', 'Must have a working knowledge of advanced technology uses cases in financial services including machine learning, interactive data visualization, cloud computing, and streaming analytics.']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Python - Hedge Fund - up to $400,000 total compensation
job_text: ['', 'Fantastic offices in New York, with lots of free food and snacks (and a chef), and the chance to work on great tech platforms with humble, intelligent technologists make this a great place to work.', "Python is the main programming language used in this team, so the absolute must-have is that you're a world-class Python developer. You're familiar with multiple Python libraries and you're keen to explore the power of others. You'll also work with things like AWS, Kafka, Spark, parallel and grid computing, lots of SQL (of course) and much more.", 'The incredible total compensation (could be more than advertised) is just a bonus...', "This role isn't just about the money, or financial experience.", "On to the total compensation. Up to $400k is a conservative estimate, but, aside from that you'll get more technical freedom in this smaller environment (compared to a bank, or Google), where technology is the heart and soul of the business. Investment in tech is huge - as is investment in you.", 'Get in touch for more information - rory@saragossa.co.uk - no up-to-date CV required.', "You don't need to come from a financial background. In the past, they've hired from Google, Facebook, Palantir etc, so you don't have to be coming from a hedge fund or a bank to get a look in. Your talent and personality will be most important.", 'and', 'Technical freedom and the chance to be part of a brand new team within a successful hedge fund should be the key.\xa0', 'You\'ll be joining a team that was formed around 3 months ago. You\'ll work with Quants to build systems responsbile for giving them their data. Think data pipelines and data processing - on a huge scale. The data comes from various sources - social media, market data, weather, companies house, etc. - you\'re creative and you have the ability to solve these "data problems".', "With these huge datasets, you'll get plenty of exposure to machine learning. All of the Quant teams there use various machine learning techniques, so, if you've got strong experience here or want to learn more, this is an extra added bonus."]

['', 'Owning projects through their entire lifecycle, from conception to architecture to implementation to maintenance.', 'You know when and how to develop utilize microservices but you also understand the trade-offs when applying SOA', 'You have strong hands-on experience writing enterprise-grade applications and services in Java or another language on the JVM.', "What we're looking for:", 'The typical candidate who’s reached the necessary level for this role has more than 8 years of professional experience and more than 4 working specifically on distributed systems and/or with the Apache big data ecosystem. But we care more about what you’ve accomplished than about how many years you’ve spent doing it.', 'Our customers are Fortune 500 companies across multiple verticals - including CPG, food & beverage, consumer technology & telecom, and financial services - as well as the world’s largest advertising agencies and media platforms.', 'Solid DevOps experience. You understand that operational systems are everyone’s responsibility, and perhaps you’ve deployed and maintained your own cluster.', 'Experience with Groovy, Grails, Spring Boot, DynamoDB, Athena, Cassandra, EMR, Kubernetes, Hive, Presto.Expertise in designing and developing scalable, robust and high performing backend services including efficient and optimized API and protocol design.You know when and how to develop utilize microservices but you also understand the trade-offs when applying SOASolid DevOps experience. You understand that operational systems are everyone’s responsibility, and perhaps you’ve deployed and maintained your own cluster.Experience with marketing or advertising technology.', 'Growing our team both through helping shape our future hiring and through inspiring, mentoring, and upskilling our existing engineers.', 'Survata is the Brand Intelligence Platform. We make brand marketing more impactful.\xa0', 'You get excited about billions of events and terabytes of data.', 'You know how to design large scale systems that are reliable, scalable, efficient, maintainable, extensible, and elegant.', 'Bonus Points:', 'Instant Insights', 'The most successful companies understand that data and analysis are the foundation of any effective business strategy. Modern enterprises live and breathe data that they leverage through all sorts of dedicated analytics platforms: customer, product, supply chain, finance, etc. But until now, there’s never been an effective software solution to understand, measure, and optimize companies’ most important asset: their brand.', 'Survata’s business is growing rapidly and our data systems have started to become victims of their own success. We’re looking for a deeply experienced, deeply knowledgeable technical leader who can help us architect and build a new generation of big data systems to carry our business into the next phase of growth. Our systems deal with tens of billions of data points each month, and you’ll be the primary person responsible for making sure that our capacity goes up even as our costs go down. Although this isn’t a management role (though it might grow into one, if and only if you’re interested), we do expect you to play a key role in training the rest of our data team and in setting and maintaining the highest technical standards while also serving as a role-model for healthy, collaborative communication.', 'We are backed by leading venture investors (Y Combinator, Uncork Capital, Bloomberg Beta, Initialized Capital, PivotNorth, Ridge Ventures, Industry Ventures, Conductive Ventures,) and leading MarTech founders & CEO.', 'You are deeply familiar with the Apache big data ecosystem. No one has used every tool, but you should have used several of them extensively in production (and you should know the basics of most of the major players). You should be able to intelligently discuss the tradeoffs that different tools make, and e.g. when to use Hadoop vs. Spark or Hive vs. Presto or Hbase vs. Cassandra.', "You get excited about billions of events and terabytes of data.You know how to design large scale systems that are reliable, scalable, efficient, maintainable, extensible, and elegant.You deeply understand the power and promise of distributed systems, and you have enough experience building them to know where the pitfalls are and how to avoid them. Idempotence excites you. You love the feeling of seeing a powerful computing cluster fully and efficiently utilized.You are deeply familiar with the Apache big data ecosystem. No one has used every tool, but you should have used several of them extensively in production (and you should know the basics of most of the major players). You should be able to intelligently discuss the tradeoffs that different tools make, and e.g. when to use Hadoop vs. Spark or Hive vs. Presto or Hbase vs. Cassandra.You’ve used a lot of the services in a major public cloud (preferably AWS). You love some, are frustrated by others, and can’t wait to try the next one.You love to learn. You understand that nothing stands still in technology, and you’re excited when newly available tools unlock new and radically better ways of solving problems. But you also know when to apply tried and tested tools and techniques.You have strong hands-on experience writing enterprise-grade applications and services in Java or another language on the JVM.People tend to look to you as a leader and respect your expertise, even in roles where you don't have formal authority.You understand that your software runs on computers (but you architect things so you spend the minimum amount of time possible thinking about that).You are a strong believer in the best software development principles (e.g. SOLID OO-design, design patterns) and processes (e.g. TDD, peer reviews, automation)You have experience mentoring junior developers, and understand that healthy human systems are essential to developing and maintaining healthy technical systems.You thrive on the energy of operating in a fast-paced, ever-changing startup atmosphere. You are a self-starter and you love working self-driven in a dynamic team.The typical candidate who’s reached the necessary level for this role has more than 8 years of professional experience and more than 4 working specifically on distributed systems and/or with the Apache big data ecosystem. But we care more about what you’ve accomplished than about how many years you’ve spent doing it.", 'Survata plans, measures, and optimizes brand marketing. With our Brand Campaign Measurement and Instant Insights products, we provide a software & data platform to the world’s largest brand marketers.', 'You are a strong believer in the best software development principles (e.g. SOLID OO-design, design patterns) and processes (e.g. TDD, peer reviews, automation)', 'Embodying and modeling the discipline of practical, professional engineering in your day to day development process and practices.', 'Introducing and applying cutting-edge technologies and techniques around big data, distributed systems, analytics, microservices, data pipelines, and observability.', 'Survata is a venture-funded startup building the Brand Intelligence Platform. We offer a comprehensive set of tools that help our Fortune 100 clients understand and improve how they’re perceived in the marketplace, how aware consumers are of the value they provide, and how much consumers trust them to provide the value they promise.', 'Experience with Groovy, Grails, Spring Boot, DynamoDB, Athena, Cassandra, EMR, Kubernetes, Hive, Presto.', 'You’ve used a lot of the services in a major public cloud (preferably AWS). You love some, are frustrated by others, and can’t wait to try the next one.', 'Your responsibilities will include:', 'Expertise in designing and developing scalable, robust and high performing backend services including efficient and optimized API and protocol design.', 'Experience with marketing or advertising technology.', 'You have experience mentoring junior developers, and understand that healthy human systems are essential to developing and maintaining healthy technical systems.', 'You thrive on the energy of operating in a fast-paced, ever-changing startup atmosphere. You are a self-starter and you love working self-driven in a dynamic team.', '\xa0', "People tend to look to you as a leader and respect your expertise, even in roles where you don't have formal authority.", 'We are unapologetically supportive of brand advertising, and work hard every day to prove its value; we know if companies can measure the value of those dollars, they’ll spend more.\xa0 Brand advertising pays for not only the movies we watch and music we hear, but the journalism we read and the information we access.\xa0 In short, brand advertising supports the free flow of information through society.\xa0 So, we’re proud to be the first company dedicated to using data science to show enterprises the true effectiveness of their brand spend.', 'We’re a humble but ambitious team that takes its work seriously but never ourselves.\xa0 Come join us.', 'Creating and maintaining data ingestion, transformation, storage, and analysis systems that are critical to our ability to meet our obligations to our customers and to deliver market-leading new products and features.Introducing and applying cutting-edge technologies and techniques around big data, distributed systems, analytics, microservices, data pipelines, and observability.Owning projects through their entire lifecycle, from conception to architecture to implementation to maintenance.Growing our team both through helping shape our future hiring and through inspiring, mentoring, and upskilling our existing engineers.Embodying and modeling the discipline of practical, professional engineering in your day to day development process and practices.', 'Brand Campaign Measurement', 'You deeply understand the power and promise of distributed systems, and you have enough experience building them to know where the pitfalls are and how to avoid them. Idempotence excites you. You love the feeling of seeing a powerful computing cluster fully and efficiently utilized.', 'You love to learn. You understand that nothing stands still in technology, and you’re excited when newly available tools unlock new and radically better ways of solving problems. But you also know when to apply tried and tested tools and techniques.', 'You understand that your software runs on computers (but you architect things so you spend the minimum amount of time possible thinking about that).', 'Creating and maintaining data ingestion, transformation, storage, and analysis systems that are critical to our ability to meet our obligations to our customers and to deliver market-leading new products and features.', 'Everything we do rests on a foundation of data, and as a data engineer you’ll help us keep extending that foundation and keep it robust and strong. We deal with complex, fast-moving data at massive scale and you’ll need every trick in the distributed systems book to make sure our clients always have the data they need, when they need it, how they need to see it in order to successfully allocate tens of millions of dollars marketing budget.']

['', 'o click-stream / client-side log data collection & analysis tool\xa0', 'Coupang is one of the largest and fastest growing e-commerce platforms on the planet. We are on a mission to revolutionize everyday lives for our customers, employees and partners. We solve problems no one has solved before to create a world where people ask, “How did we ever live without Coupang?” Coupang\u202fis a global company with offices in Beijing, Los Angeles, Seattle, Seoul, Shanghai, and Silicon Valley.\xa0', '• BS in Computer Science or equivalent degree/experience.', '• Ability to use tools for continuous integration & deployment workflows (e.g. Git, Maven/Gradle, Jenkins etc.).', 'Key Responsibilities:', '• 3+ years of experience in development of web applications using Java (or other JVM languages) & Javascript', '• Managing & improving log metadata for data discovery & governance', '• Ability to design & implement web front-end application using modern client-side frameworks (i.e. react.js)', '• Ability to build scripts for monitoring & management', 'Experience in development of:', 'Qualifications:', 'Preferred:', 'Job Overview:\xa0', 'Job Overview:', '\xa0', '• Solving complex issues on our services for log data reliability & quality', 'As a senior back-end engineer, you will be responsible with building our collection pipeline and back-end of the various tools for log data users. You will be responsible for:', '• Building & managing log collection pipeline, from end-point API to data loader application & monitoring batch jobs.', '• Ability to design, build & document REST API with Spring', 'o complex data visualization tool', '• Experience in data processing with Spark & Airflow', 'As part of the Coupang Data Platform organization, Web Logging Platform team is responsible for collecting & providing all client-side event logs from Coupang web sites, mobile apps & other supporting systems. Using Coupang’s big data infrastructure on AWS, we collect, load, process the logs for downstream users to analyze user behavior of their systems. WLP also provides various tools & services for the users to use the log data more productively and to have confidence with quality of the data.\xa0', 'o data governance / compliance tool\xa0', '• Experience in using AWS & Docker']

job_title: Software Engineer - Robotics and Autonomous Systems
job_text: ['', 'Essential Duties', 'Minimum Requirements', 'Must be a U.S citizen.Must possess a current Secret security clearance.A Bachelor degree in a related technical discipline (e.g., BSEE, BSCS) or equivalent in Computer Science or related field.5 to 7 years of relevant work experience are required.', 'Interact with senior customer personnel on significant technical matters, often requiring coordinated activity across organizational lines.', 'A Bachelor degree in a related technical discipline (e.g., BSEE, BSCS) or equivalent in Computer Science or related field.', 'Software Engineer - Robotics and Autonomous Systems', 'Participate in software requirements review, preliminary and critical design reviews, integration readiness review, and software acceptance reviews.Support proposal efforts.Design, write, test, deploy and support software code, as assigned. Frequent inter-organizational and outside customer contacts.Interact with senior customer personnel on significant technical matters, often requiring coordinated activity across organizational lines.Represent the organization in providing solutions to difficult technical problems associated with specific projects. ', 'Support proposal efforts.', 'Represent the organization in providing solutions to difficult technical problems associated with specific projects. ', 'Must possess a current Secret security clearance.', '5 to 7 years of relevant work experience are required.', 'Job Summary', 'Must be a U.S citizen.', 'Design, write, test, deploy and support software code, as assigned. Frequent inter-organizational and outside customer contacts.', 'Participate in software requirements review, preliminary and critical design reviews, integration readiness review, and software acceptance reviews.']

['You’ll be a high-horsepower coding contributor that designs, builds and delivers major features and highly scalable components. You’ll be helping us tackle lots of big challenges, including improving the accuracy of our models and wide-scale forecasts using approaches such as machine learning.', 'WHO ARE WE?', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Superior programmer who consistently delivers tight, finely crafted code', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Join a growing company that expects you to grow with us and invests in your growth', 'Clean Power Research offers competitive compensation and benefits to full-time employees including medical/dental/vision, paid vacation, paid holidays, a bonus plan and 401(k) plan.', 'Clean Power Research is located in Kirkland near the intersection of SR520 and Lake Wash. Blvd NE (Greater Seattle Area). Local, full-time, in-office candidates only, please.', 'the', 'Click on the link below to submit a cover letter detailing your interest in the renewable energy space along with your resume. Due to the large number of applicants for our positions, we regret that we can only respond to candidates who meet our requirements.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Join a growing team of software and energy veterans from companies like Microsoft, Amazon, Oracle and Pacific Gas & Electric', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Passion for solar energy or renewables is a plus', 'WHY WORK HERE?', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bring your passion and ideas to the table', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Participate in writing test automation (unit tests and integration tests) and be part of a combined engineering team', 'We’re adding a Software Engineer to our\xa0SolarAnywhere\xa0team. SolarAnywhere is an innovative software plus science product that performs industry-leading solar prediction for the utility and solar markets. We start with near real-time satellite imagery, and use sophisticated scientific algorithms to measure and forecast how much solar energy hits the ground. There are numerous markets for SolarAnywhere, including utility-scale forecasting and rooftop fleet operation.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa04+ years of professional software development experience', 'DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0BA/BS or MS degree in Computer Science or related technical discipline', 'Clean Power Research is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status. The company’s employment decisions are based on merit, competence, performance and business needs.', 'Software Engineer – SolarAnywhere®', 'WHAT YOU’LL BE DOING AS A SOFTWARE ENGINEER', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Deliver high-quality code and features with a high-degree of ownership', 'HOW TO APPLY', 'WHO YOU ARE', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in building web applications/services using C#/ASP.NET/SQL and running in a cloud-hosted environment is a plus', 'We’re a growing company that counts 10 of the top 10 Fortune 500 utilities and many of the largest renewable energy companies in the U.S. as our customers. We’re focused on expanding our market reach and impact with new software technologies that help solve the energy industry’s hardest problems.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work in a start-up like environment coupled with the stability and customer base of an established, profitable company', 'Looking for a job that makes a real difference in our world today and one that you’ll be proud of when you look back in 20, 30 or 40 years? This is it. Clean Power Research is advancing the energy transformation through cloud software that informs, streamlines and values energy-related decisions and processes for utilities, energy professionals and consumers.', 'This is a full-stack position where you’ll own entire features end-to-end. You’ll be using C#, JavaScript, JS frameworks and SQL in a cloud-hosted (AWS) environment. You’ll be part of an agile, empowered and high-performing team. You’ll have exposure to customers and the business, and be an important participant in product, design and technology decisions.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Go from building solutions to being part of\xa0the\xa0solution', 'At Clean Power Research, every employee has a seat at the table and an important role.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Use your creativity to solve hard problems and make tough decisions', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaborate with other team members to define the product and make it great', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Participate in release testing, monitoring of performance and functionality of the service in production', 'SolarAnywhere']

['', 'Marisha ', 'You may also be required to provide lab support, including system installation, maintenance and support.', 'In addition to excellent technical, and communication skills, this position requires an ability to work with remote teams in different time zones and work effectively as part of a larger highly dynamic engineering team.', 'Description', 'You will work with a team of 2+ automation engineers and work with extended teams in other geographies to define and execute feature testing, software reliability testing, and product release testing for cutting edge deep learning products.', 'For Any Queries, Contact', ' In this position, you will be responsible for researching and automating test procedures to automate a software quality assurance test plan, to validate software related to neural network inference. You will work with a team of 2+ automation engineers and work with extended teams in other geographies to define and execute feature testing, software reliability testing, and product release testing for cutting edge deep learning products. You may also be required to provide lab support, including system installation, maintenance and support. In addition to excellent technical, and communication skills, this position requires an ability to work with remote teams in different time zones and work effectively as part of a larger highly dynamic engineering team. ', 'In this position, you will be responsible for researching and automating test procedures to automate a software quality assurance test plan, to validate software related to neural network inference.']

['', 'REQUIRED EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE:', '- Experience with either Agile or Waterfall development', '- Experience working with Satellite Tool Kit (STK)', '•Assists team in the effort to develop,document, test and debugs application software', 'Millennium Engineering is seeking a JAVA Software Engineer with STK (Satellite Tool Kit) experience on the NASA OMES II contract in support of the Joint Polar Satellite System (JPSS) Ground program at NASA Goddard Space Flight Center. The Joint Polar Satellite System (JPSS) is the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration’s (NOAA) next-generation operational Earth observation program that acquires and distributes global environmental data primarily from multiple polar-orbiting satellites.\xa0The program plays a critical role to NOAA’s mission to understand and predict changes in weather, climate, oceans and coasts, and the space environment, which support the Nation’s economy and protect lives and property.', '•Designs application software', 'The candidate must have a strong technical base in the following areas:', '•Determines computer user needs; analyzes system capabilities to resolve problems on program intent, output requirements, input data acquisition, programming techniques and controls', '•Ensures NASA software standards are met', '- Experience developing and designing JAVA based solutions', 'This is a software engineering position that will be focused on the implementation of a scheduling tool for the Command, Control & Communications (C3S) segment.\xa0It will deconflict the satellite schedule requests for the National Polar Partnership (NPP), Global Change Observation Mission (GCOM), Joint Polar Satellite System 1 (JPSS-1) and JPSS-2 satellites.', '- Bachelors’ Degree and 5+ years’ experience', '- Experience with satellite operations / ground system development']

['**Role can be located in Austin, TX or Newport Beach, CA**Role:We are seeking a hardworking application developer to join our team. Building on top of PIMCO’s modern cloud-based solution infrastructure, we develop and maintain the central applications, platforms and tools that are the backbone of PIMCO’s trading and portfolio management processes by maximizing scalable technology solutions provided by PIMCO’s core engineering team. Dedicated to supporting a culture of diversity, inclusion and acceptance, at PIMCO we work to create an environment where all our people can be their authentic selves. We strive to heighten our employees’ appreciation for diverse perspectives and skills, facilitating increased collaboration and enhancing our ability to attract and engage top talent.In this role, you will be working on:•  Trade risk sizing and capital allocation decision support tools•  Order generation•  Fine-grained trade risk and performance tracking•  Portfolio PnL and historical performance attribution•  Customized Trade Floor reportingResponsibilities:•  Forward development of new system components and enhancements to the existing codebase•  Direct interaction with business users (Trade Floor, PMs, Risk Managers, etc.) in order to define, rollout, and support new platform features•  Detailed understanding of various aspects of PIMCO business and operational processes•  Architecture, design, and coding; solving engineering challenges associated with large data processing volumes, complex calculation dependencies, horizontal compute scale vs centralized data storage, etc. ', 'Requirements:•\xa0Candidates should have 5 years of experience in the investment domain building large-scale application solutions by using modern full stack technologies in a front office environment or supporting a portfolio management technology capacity•  Solid experience in writing backend services using Java or C# (while we are using Java, we will consider strong candidates in other languages as long as they show ability to learn Java)•  Interest in learning about / working with modern UI technologies']

['What you get: ', '• Build systems to evaluate and tune performance of a real-world deep learning system, from data collection to processing to model implementation to post-processing and visualization ', '', '• Read the latest papers in NLP and Deep Learning ', '• Build large scale distributed systems from the ground up ', '• A fast-paced and collaborative environment ', 'What a typical week may look like at Forethought: ', 'What we value and look for in a Backend Software Engineer: ', '• Take product ideas from ideation to implementation ', '• Develop backend services and infrastructure to expand our answer engine to support 10M+ documents and 100K+ QPS ', '• A chance to be a defining member of the team, with equity to match ', '• Make an impact, and help us in our mission to give everyone the opportunity to be a genius at their job; ', '• Experience building large-scale distributed systems ', '• Ship web applications and APIs using Python, Flask, MongoDB, React, Elastic, and/or TensorFlow ', '• Familiarity with containerization and dev-ops (Docker, Kubernetes, Docker Swarms, Jenkins, Continuous Integration, Continuous Delivery) is a plus ', '• 3+ years of experience in Software Engineering ', "We are looking for a world-class Backend Engineer to join our growing team!\xa0 We need someone with a growth mindset, who loves to solve the world's hardest problems, and wants to have an impact on the world. ", ' ', '• BS in Computer Science, Mathematics, or a related technical field ', '• Familiarity with modern Big Data stack (Spark or Hadoop, Kafka or RabbitMQ, ZooKeeper, Redis, Memcached, Lucene, MongoDB, MySQL) ', 'What you get:', 'As a member of the Backend team, you will be responsible for designing, building, and deploying the features and underlying systems that power our core answer engine. You will interact with everything from our document indexing pipeline to our natural language query infrastructure written in Python. Our tech stack leverages top modern technologies, including Docker, Kubernetes, Redis, AWS S3/EC2/RDS, MongoDB, and ElasticSearch. As an early member of the team, you will also be building out custom infrastructure and algorithms on GPU/TPUs for Deep Learning & NLP. ', '• Unlimited PTO policy', 'What a typical week may look like at Forethought:', "• Adaptable, humble, and interested in pushing the boundaries of what's possible ", '• Medical, dental and vision coverage ', '• Familiarity with modern Deep Learning and Natural Language Processing / Natural Language Understanding (NLP, NLU), including Neural Networks, RNNs, seq2seq models, and real-world machine learning in TensorFlow (including regularization, cross-validation, dropout) are a plus ', 'What we value and look for in a Backend Software Engineer:', '• Proficiency in Python ', '• Optimize the performance of our indexing, processing, and query pipelines ', '• Implement state-of-the-art algorithms in Question Answering, Machine Reading Comprehension, Text Summarization, in a scalable, production-ready fashion using Tensorflow and Spark ', '• Work with world-class talent (our team consists of former Facebook, Palantir, Dropbox, and LinkedIn Engineers; we have 3 ACM ICPC World Finalists) ']

['', 'As an Equal Opportunity / Affirmative Action Employer, CDPHP will not discriminate in its employment practices due to an applicant’s race, color, creed, religion, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, transgender status, age, national origin, marital status, citizenship, physical and mental disability, criminal record, genetic information, predisposition or carrier status, status with respect to receiving public assistance, domestic violence victim status, a disabled, special, recently separated, active duty wartime, campaign badge, Armed Forces service medal veteran, or any other characteristics protected under applicable law.', 'Experience with cloud data technologies (EMR, DynamoDB, Redshift, S3, and Lambda).', 'For more than 30 years, CDPHP has been providing outstanding health care coverage in the Capital Region of New York and beyond. Based in Albany, NY, the physician-guided not-for-profit offers plans in 24 counties. CDPHP cares deeply about the health and well-being of its members as well as its employees. The company values integrity, diversity, and innovation, and its corporate culture supports those values wholeheartedly. At CDPHP, the employees have a voice and are encouraged to make an impact at both the company and community levels through engagement and volunteer opportunities. CDPHP invests in employees who share these values and invites you to be a part of that experience.', 'Demonstrated experience with data warehouse architecture and methodologies required.', 'Bachelor’s degree Computer Science or Engineering required. 7 years relevant experience may be substituted for degree.', 'Bachelor’s degree Computer Science or Engineering required. 7 years relevant experience may be substituted for degree.A minimum of five (5) years’ experience implementing large enterprise level data and analytic solutions.A minimum five (5) years of development in medium to large sized development teams covering a variety of creation and delivery roles.A minimum of five (5) years’ experience with release and deployment functions required.Experience implementing big data solutions or other analytics solutions preferred.Prior hands-on knowledge of the following technologies is essential: Shell scripting, PL/SQL, (Python, Java, C#, or Go) and automation tools.Demonstrated experience with data warehouse architecture and methodologies required.Understanding of ETL Tools (Informatica or equivalent) preferred.Experience with cloud data technologies (EMR, DynamoDB, Redshift, S3, and Lambda).', 'QUALIFICATIONS:\xa0', 'A minimum of five (5) years’ experience with release and deployment functions required.', 'Experience implementing big data solutions or other analytics solutions preferred.', 'A minimum five (5) years of development in medium to large sized development teams covering a variety of creation and delivery roles.', 'The Senior Data Engineer works as part of the technical data management team, supporting the needs of data scientists and analytic developers who are looking to build interactive information systems, run queries and algorithms against distributed data assets for predictive analytics, machine learning and data mining purposes. In many cases, data engineers also work with business units and development departments to deliver data aggregations to executives, business analysts and other consumers of more traditional types of data to aid in ongoing operations, downstream data entities and build with an eye towards transfer of support (training/documentation).', 'Prior hands-on knowledge of the following technologies is essential: Shell scripting, PL/SQL, (Python, Java, C#, or Go) and automation tools.', 'Understanding of ETL Tools (Informatica or equivalent) preferred.', 'A minimum of five (5) years’ experience implementing large enterprise level data and analytic solutions.']

job_title: Software Engineer, Algorithms and Machine Learning - New College Grad
job_text: ['', 'Work within our diverse team of engineers.', 'Participate in the research and development towards automation of VLSI backend workflows.You will explore traditional, machine learning or deep learning based algorithms towards solving real word issues in chip design.Work within our diverse team of engineers.', 'Obtaining your BA/BS in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related field.Your GPA is at or above: 3.5.Experience in Machine Learning, Algorithm development or Artificial Intelligence.You are confident with programming languages such as Perl, Python, C/C++.Motivated to work towards helping build the integrated chips which are used in worlds best computing platforms.', 'What You’ll Be Doing', 'What We Need To See', 'You are pursuing MS/PhD in CS, AI, ML, or related field.', 'You are confident with programming languages such as Perl, Python, C/C++.', 'Participate in the research and development towards automation of VLSI backend workflows.', 'We are now looking for a Software Engineer, Algorithms and Machine Learning – New College Grad:', 'Ways To Stand Out From The Crowd', 'Your GPA is at or above: 3.5.', 'Motivated to work towards helping build the integrated chips which are used in worlds best computing platforms.', 'Obtaining your BA/BS in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related field.', 'Experience in Machine Learning, Algorithm development or Artificial Intelligence.', 'You will explore traditional, machine learning or deep learning based algorithms towards solving real word issues in chip design.']
