job_text: ['', ' Apply analytical rigor and advanced statistical techniques to analyze 1st and 3rd party data for insurance or other client(s) for marketing analytics and insight ', ' Core Benefits: Fully paid medical and dental insurance premiums for employees and dependents, MPF employer contribution, employer-paid life & disability insurance ', ' Experience using statistical computer languages (R, Python, SQL, etc.) to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets ', ' Develops and/or uses algorithms and statistical predictive models to derive insight on target audience’s demographics and behavioral attributes to increase and optimize conversion ', ' Partner with Two Sigma’s global offices on projects and initiatives ', ' Support strategy development for building up TS’ data science capabilities in insurance or other fields in the region ', ' Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills ', ' Time Off: Generous vacation and unlimited sick days, paid caregiver leaves ', ' Support insurance or other client(s) to develop end-to-end strategy and execution for paid social, paid search, and other programmatic channels ', ' 5+ years post-Bachelor experience in marketing analytics or related field ', ' Bachelor’s degree from a top tier University, Master’s degree preferred – majors in engineering, computer science, data science, mathematics, or related scientific disciplines preferred;  5+ years post-Bachelor experience in marketing analytics or related field  Experience using statistical computer languages (R, Python, SQL, etc.) to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets  Knowledge of a variety of machine learning, advanced statistical techniques and concepts (regression, properties of distributions, statistical tests and proper usage, etc.) and experience with applications.  Experience in analyzing data from 3rd party providers: Google Analytics, Facebook Insights, etc.  Experience with distributed data/computing tools and data visualization / dashboard tools  Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills  Excellent written and verbal communication and collaboration skills for coordinating across teams internally as well as with with insurance or other client(s)  A demonstrated passion for technology, financial services and investment managementFluency in English and at least one Asian language (preferably, Mandarin Chinese) ', ' Learning: Tuition reimbursement, conference and training sponsorship ', ' Knowledge of a variety of machine learning, advanced statistical techniques and concepts (regression, properties of distributions, statistical tests and proper usage, etc.) and experience with applications. biology/chemistry/physics, or mathematic modeling or other relevant areas is desirable.Passionate about creating replicable, scalable systems around data and analytics.Expertise and experience in engineering data pipelines using big data technologies on large scale data sets.Understand the Data Lifecycle and concepts such as lineage, governance and retentionConceptually familiar with AWS cloud resources (S3, EC2, RDS, etc.)Knowledge of United States Food and Drug Administration (FDA), European Medicines Agency (EMA) and other regulatory schemas is a plus.', 'The ideal candidate will have a strong background in distributed data processing, have great and demonstrable data intuition.', 'Passionate about creating replicable, scalable systems around data and analytics.', 'Conceptually modeling, computational biology/chemistry/physics, or mathematic modeling or other relevant areas is desirable.', 'You will create database structures for data streams that will input, process, and output visual, audio, text, and image data and meta-data in a 21 CFR Part 11 compliant eQMS environment.\xa0The database structures will work with applications developed in PHP and hosted on commercial cloud services.', 'Understand the Data Lifecycle and concepts such as lineage, governance and retention', 'PSC Software is seeking a Data Scientist to analyze and map inputted, extracted, processed, exported, and outputted data types, structures, and flows to design a database structure for a scalable, reliable, distributed data pipeline, and to assist in building the applications that use the database structure as a foundation.']

['', '• Advanced (Master or PhD) degree with specialization in Statistics, Computer Science, Data Science, Economics, Mathematics, Operations Research or another quantitative field or equivalent.', 'Lead Data Scientist, Peacock', 'Collaborate with software and data architects in building real-time and automated batch machine learning pipelines that include data preprocessing, validation, model training, serving, testing, and measurement.', '• Understanding of algorithmic complexity of model training and testing, particularly for real-time and near real-time models. ', '• Experience building streaming data pipelines using Kafka, Spark or Flink', '• Experience with large-scale video assets', 'Work with business stakeholders to define business requirements including KPI and acceptance criteria.', '• Working experience with commercial recommender systems or a lead role in an advanced research recommender system project.', 'Lead development of recommendation system using advanced machine learning techniques such as deep learning, graph modeling, collaborative filter, and reinforcement learning', 'Qualifications/Requirements:', '• Working experience with deep learning, particularly in the areas such as NLP, adversarial learning, autoencoders, wide & deep learning, and computer vision', 'We’re growing our team of smart, hungry, and upbeat doers who crave the chance to build something new at the\xa0epicenter of content, tech, and culture. We need fearless leaders and pop-culture fiends who work hard and fan hard.\xa0Creative problem-solvers who just so happen to be the reigning champs at\xa0Parks & Rec\xa0trivia night. So if this sounds\xa0like you, join our flock. And we promise, we won’t put your stapler in Jell-O.\u200b', '• Strong skills in data processing using SQL and Spark.', 'In this role, the Lead Data Scientist will use advanced data science methodologies including collaborative filtering, deep learning, reinforcement learning, on-line modeling etc. and work closely with business owners, teammates and engineers to build a state-of-the-art real-time video streaming service.', '• Team oriented and collaborative approach with a demonstrated aptitude and willingness to learn new methods and tools', '• Pride and ownership in your work and confident representation of your team to other parts of NBCUniversal', 'Meet Peacock, NBCUniversal’s new, wildly entertaining streaming service that combines timeless shows and movies\xa0with timely news, sports and pop-culture.\u200b', 'Are you ready to go beyond classic predictive analytics to the new areas like deep learning and reinforcement learning? Do you want to be a part of the team that builds and advanced recommender engine, active leaning platform, personalized solutions for marketing and advertisement? Join the world-class international team of smart, hungry and fearless professionals who are working at the cutting edge of technology and science at the epicenter of content, technology and culture.', 'Position Overview:', '• 5+ years of combined experience in advanced analytics in industry or research. We also provide all employees with reimbursement for relevant conferences, training, and education. We care about your physical, financial and mental well-being. We offer competitive health, dental, and vision benefits for employees and their dependents, a monthly gym reimbursement to support your physical health, and a commute or internet allowance to make your trips to your office or your desk easier. We offer generous parental leave with transition time built-in upon return to work. We offer competitive compensation and a 401k plan with up to a 4% employer match.  We support our remote employee experience. While we have great office spaces in NYC, Cambridge and Palo Alto, we’re very distributed—we use a number of communication tools to connect across the company—and all remote employees have the opportunity to visit our offices and meet their teams face-to-face at team offsites. We also have an annual company offsite, Shark Week, to get quality in-person time with the entire company at least once a year. We also allow employees to outfit their workstations to meet their needs—whether remote or in office. We value diversity and inclusivity. We are an equal opportunity employer and we do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. ['#LI-SLT1', 'Combining CVS Health and Aetna was a transformative moment for our company and our industry, establishing CVS Health as the nation s premier health innovation company. Through our health services, insurance plans and community pharmacists, we re pioneering a bold new approach to total health. As a CVS Health colleague, you ll be at the center of it all. ', '', 'Applies in-depth knowledge of systems and products to consult and advise on additional efforts across organization/enterprise. ', 'Demonstrates advanced in-depth specialization in mathematical analysis methods, machine learning, statistical analyses, and predictive modeling.Superior ability to communicate technical ideas and results to non-technical clients in written and verbal form. ', 'FUNDAMENTAL RESPONSIBILITIES of the Lead Analytics Consultant', 'Expertise in advanced analytics tools and languages to analyze large data sets from multiple data sources.Expertise in innovating and implementing novel machine learning techniques. ', 'It s a new day in health care! ', 'Provides strategic leadership for the development, validation and delivery of algorithms, statistical models and reporting tools. Acts as the analytic team lead for highly complex projects involving multiple resources and tasks, providing individual mentoring in support of company objectives. Leads development and execution of new and/or highly complex algorithms and statistical predictive models and determines analytical approaches and modeling techniques to evaluate scenarios and potential future outcomes. Establishes analytical rigor and statistical methods to analyze large amounts of data, using advanced statistical techniques and mathematical analyses. Manages highly complex analytical projects from data exploration, model building, performance evaluation and testing. Applies in-depth knowledge of systems and products to consult and advise on additional efforts across organization/enterprise. Motivates team members and probes into technical details, and mentors others to do the same. Provides thought leadership and direction for analytic solutions, tools and studies. ['', 'Engage in the business goals as well as the technology', 'Believe in true DevOps; Developers write code, test code, deploy code, monitor and support code in production.', 'Write & test code that truly works— code that is elegant & scales well', 'Ensure performance, scalability, availability & security in everything you do', 'Requirements', 'Build high performance, highly available, applications in the cloudMigrate existing on-premise applications to the cloudWork closely with our product managers to understand product needsWrite & test code that truly works— code that is elegant & scales wellFocus on fast, iterative & agile developmentEnsure performance, scalability, availability & security in everything you doContribute to platform-level technology, strategy & decisionsEngage in the business goals as well as the technology', 'Build high performance, highly available, applications in the cloud', 'Smarsh is the leader in communications compliance, archiving, and analytics. job_title: Staff Software Engineer, Data Platform Integration
job_text: ['', 'Experience in building large data streaming platform will be a huge plus. ', '2+ years of experience with cloud deployments, AWS experience preferred. Proficiency with linux/unix based systems ', 'Collaborate with internal & external teams to define requirements and delivery schedules for projects ', 'Design and implement cloud-based distributed systems for CI/CD tools Create self-reinforcing feedback loops that will scale across departments and teams Monitor data streams for anomalies, triage any issues found and report problems to stakeholders Evaluate the development processes of widely disparate teams to ensure consistency based upon industry standards Manage individual project priorities, deadlines and deliverables Contribute to Architecture, implementation and operations of core Platforms and Content Distribution systems Collaborate with internal & external teams to define requirements and delivery schedules for projects Design and deliver high quality code for large projects and make critical contributions working with others on projects Mentor and provide technical leadership to the team to iteratively improve development practices and processes Tackle challenging engineering problems involving high throughput web applications Build strong relationships with the team while collectively finding opportunities for improvements around quality and automation ', 'highly adaptable and committed to learning ', 'Create self-reinforcing feedback loops that will scale across departments and teams ', 'Strong problem-solving skills and critical thinking abilities. ', 'Bachelor’s degree, with equivalent work experience in MIS, Computer Science or related discipline ', 'Must be hands-on on latest technologies such as Scala, Apache Spark, Apache Kafka, Hadoop, API design and development, No-SQL databases such as Cassandra, OLAP columnar storage systems, Bit Map indexes to handle millions of consumers and thousands of attributes while allowing real-time querying/ segmentation. ', 'Experience in programming in Python. Numpy and Pandas experience is a plus. ', 'Tackle challenging engineering problems involving high throughput web applications ', 'Front-end engineering experience (especially with React) is a plus ', 'work with front-end and back-end developers as a full-stack delivery team ', 'continuous integration/automated testing ', 'Capability to think strategically, balancing a broad range of internal and external factors when identifying problems, proposing solutions, and making decisions. ', '5+ years of hands-on experience in data and analytics technology, with focus on data architecture and large volume data processing. Experience with Python. ', 'highly adaptable and committed to learning have a deep understanding of web architectures and software design patterns have a track record of delivering scalable solutions utilizing Python, Scala or similar high level programming language. thrive in an agile and collaborative environment. ', 'thrive in an agile and collaborative environment. ', '5+ years of experience building, coaching and leading software professionals 5+ years of hands-on experience in data and analytics technology, with focus on data architecture and large volume data processing. Experience with Python. Front-end engineering experience (especially with React) is a plus Experience in building large data streaming platform will be a huge plus. 2+ years of experience with cloud deployments, AWS experience preferred. job_title: Software Engineer, Applied Technologies - New York
job_text: ['The Applied Technologies team is rebuilding from the ground up. An ideal candidate is an engineer looking to grow their responsibilities and work with the team to have a significant technical and business impact.* Security', "The Applied Technologies business unit is a highly profitable entity that funds Enigma's R&D. We provide large, stable clients with specialized capabilities essential for their business operations.We're looking for someone who:* Builds scalable, highly-available, high-throughput systems, deployed either in a cloud environment or on-premise* Solves problems with containers, cloud infrastructure and infrastructure as code (we use Docker, AWS and Terraform)* Prides themselves on writing highly readable, thoroughly tested code (we use Python)* Gets excited when working as part of a motivated, collaborative team* Identifies problems that others aren't seeing and makes sure they get solved* Is driven to work with customers to have an impact on the real worldAbout Us:Enigma builds world-class data infrastructure, developer-friendly APIs, and intelligent tools so that our customers can easily access and seamlessly integrate ?the data they need to better understand, engage, and serve their small business customers. Powered by next wave data science and proprietary machine learning, Enigma transforms thousands of online and offline sources into the freshest, most reliable data on the identity, activity, and risk profile of every small business. Our core values - generosity, curiosity, ingenuity, & drive - guide everything we do from how we make our most important product decisions to how we work with and support one another on a daily basis. We're a team of curious, driven individuals with diverse backgrounds and skills, but we're all passionate about engineering deeper understanding through data-together. If this resonates with you, we would love to hear from you!", 'You will be building and scaling high-throughput, high-availability ML-driven systems on cloud infrastructure. These systems drive critical decision making at multi-billion dollar companies.* Ownership']

['', 'Strong background in software architecture', 'Comprehensive health benefits and unlimited PTO', 'Passion for optimized, well-covered code and using types to prevent developer error', 'Competitive compensation package with meaningful equityCollaborative start-up culture with a close-knit, all star teamTremendous opportunities for personal growth\xa0Comprehensive health benefits and unlimited PTOOpportunity to make a huge impact and define the future of the product', 'Opportunity to make a huge impact and define the future of the product', "As a Senior C++ Engineer for Tempo, you will help us improve the stability and performance of the pipeline that powers our computer vision systems, tracking and analyzing the technique of our customers during their workouts. You'll work tightly with our Computer Vision team, contributing to the core software running on our product as well as GUI tools that help us develop new product features. You'll also work with our data collection team to optimize our cloud tools for storage and analysis of our extensive human motion dataset.", 'Fluency with C++17', 'Collaborative start-up culture with a close-knit, all star team', 'Tempo is the next-generation home fitness system—and the first and only strength training solution that can track your motion and use that data to give you a richer, more effective, and safer workout in live and on-demand classes. Using 3D sensors and A.I., Tempo enables expert coaches to correct your form and provide personalized feedback in real-time. It captures motion by emitting pulses of infrared light 30 times a second, generating a 3D model of your body made up of 80,000 individual points.\xa0', 'Comfortable with modern multithreading primitives and techniques', 'Please apply and we will contact you!', '8+ years professional experience developing C++', 'Strong communication skills', 'Tremendous opportunities for personal growth\xa0', '8+ years professional experience developing C++Familiarity with basic OpenGL, DirectX, and 3D graphics programmingFluency with C++17Comfortable with modern multithreading primitives and techniquesStrong background in software architectureExpertise in modern CMakeExperience with C++ test, CI/CD, and code quality standardsPassion for optimized, well-covered code and using types to prevent developer errorStrong communication skills', 'About You:', 'Familiarity with basic OpenGL, DirectX, and 3D graphics programming', 'Competitive compensation package with meaningful equity', "Tempo is thriving and we’re experiencing growth of over 300% in sales. We recently raised $17.5M\xa0in Series A funding from Founders Fund, Khosla Ventures, DCM, Bling Capital, and Signal Fire. Tempo's all-star team includes alumni from Apple, Pixar, Airbnb, YouTube, Netflix, Equinox, and Orangetheory.", 'What We Can Offer You:', 'Experience with C++ test, CI/CD, and code quality standards', 'Expertise in modern CMake']

['', ' Developing and automating predictive modeling processes that can be deployed through the organization to solve reoccurring analytics needs (ex: state specific implementations).', ' Good generic communication skills and ability to communicate technical findings to peer group.', 'Position Summary', ' Ability to work with various data formats – from delimited text files to ODBC connections and relational databases.', 'Alliance United Insurance Company is not rated.', ' Graduate degree in a quantitative field preferred: Mathematics, Statistics, CS, Physics etc. Some prior work experience in a data science/ predictive analytics environment preferred. ['', '- Typescript', '- Help drive the technical and product direction of Quill.org.', '- Learn to understand the needs of teachers, students, and administrators, and channel that into better products', 'About You:\xa0', '- You have experience with the software development lifecycle, git, pull requests, code reviews, iterative development.', 'Technologies we use heavily:', 'Please apply with your resume and a note about why you think you would be a good addition to the Quill.org team.', '- You have experience working with one scripting language in production, Ruby or Python, and experience with an associated web framework: Rails, Django, Flask, etc.\xa0', 'As part of our commitment to fight for equality, we work to ensure a fair and consistent interview process. We celebrate diversity and we are committed to an inclusive work environment.', '- Python', '- In April 2019, we won a grant from Google’s AI for Social Good initiative which provides us with both funding and mentorship from Google’s NLP experts.', '- You have production experience with Javascript and one of its frameworks: React, Vue, Angular.', 'In this role you will:', '- Postgres', '- You have 5+ years of full stack software development experience working on team and delivering large projects.', '- Firebase', 'Technologies we are starting to use more (or will be using in the near future):', '- You believe in Quill’s mission of improving education.', '- You value sharing knowledge, personal growth, positive feedback, and continuously improving engineering and team practices.', '- Work with teachers, designers, product stakeholders, and other engineers to deliver software products particularly in Ruby/Rails/React.', '- Work on a wide variety of projects from machine learning backends to React components,\xa0', '- You are an independent worker who can own full projects.', 'Nice to Have (but not necessary to apply):', '- We’ve been funded by the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, AT&T, Black Rock, and the Chan Zuckerberg Initiative to name a few.', "During COVID-19, we've transitioned our organization to be fully distributed. We take the health and safety of our employees very seriously. We shut down our office on Monday, March 9th, well before many companies, and will be conservative about re-opening the office. This role will be a fully remote position. For employees that are interested, this could convert to an onsite role in NYC at a yet-to-be-determined date in the future.", 'Some info about Quill.org:', '- You consider the broader impacts of your work through building accessible UI, quality & testing patterns, code readability, documentation and considering performance and data integrity.', 'As a member of our engineering team, you will be directly involved in building tools for students, teachers, and administrators. We are looking for developers who can take features from a user story to production. We are a rapidly-growing team of 20 who, pre-COVID-19, were based near Union Square in New York City. We cannot sponsor a visa at this time.', 'Interested in joining a mission-driven nonprofit company focused on building online educational tools powered by machine learning? We’re looking for full-stack engineers to help expand our product line. This is a fully remote role.', '- React', '- RethinkDB', '- Work on a growing machine learning application written in Python.', 'Contribute to continuous learning and improvement of our team and organizational work, systems, technology and processes.', '- Experience as a teacher or in the education system.', '- We served over 1 million students last year and are continuing to grow.', '- Help millions of students improve their reading and writing comprehension.', '- Experience with machine learning', 'At Quill.org, we’ve created an online learning platform to help middle school students, primarily lower income ones, improve their reading and writing ability. Our pedagogy is based on years of research that shows that once students understand the logic behind constructing sentences, their ability to read and write improves dramatically. Unlike common multiple-choice-based learning tools, our tools allow students to practice writing sentences and passages in their browser, while still receiving real-time, focused feedback. This is a challenging engineering problem that we use a variety of methods to solve, from simple regex to machine learning.', '- Tensorflow', '- We were named one of Fast Company’s Top 10 Most Innovative Education Companies in 2018: https://www.fastcompany.com/40458272/this-machine-learning-powered-software-teaches-kids-to-be-better-writers', '- GraphQL', '- You enjoy working collaboratively and participating in team discussions and planning.', '- Ruby / Rails', '- You love writing tests to ensure you deliver high-quality software and experiences.']

['', 'Job Description:', 'A significant need at the moment is primarily for an individual who can take ownership and deliver effective user interfaces based on web-technologies, with an emphasis on to be on-site and in the office, this is not a remote position.', 'Flexibility, adaptability, dependability, and ability to learn new things is far more important in this role than prior paradigms and languages, since we do everything from device drivers, embedded applications, distributed databases, user interfaces, and automating manufacturing tasks.', 'Skills and Expertise:', listed below.', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0GitLab experience.', 'Company Culture/Introduction:', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience working with graphic designers and converting designs to visual elements.', related field is a bonus.', '\xa0', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Refined, rational, and patient troubleshooting skills.', 'Software Engineer', 'General Abilities:', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Be able to communicate effectively, including verbally and in writing.', 'As we move into the manufacturing phase of our product lifecycle development our emphasis is shifting from being primarily a hardware development shop to software.\xa0The successful candidate will be someone who can take ownership of a task, see it to completion and employ good judgment along the way, if/when exceptions occur, remedy those with logic and with the greater good in mind.', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Embedded systems experience would be a bonus.', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Core web development\xa0- Javascript, CSS, ReactJS, Node.js', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with Object oriented imperative languages, such as C++, C# or Java, Ruby or Python', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Maintaining code integrity and ['', 'Job Description:', 'You will be building interfaces for new and existing products in the React framework both for web and mobile applications. Jolt uses Docker, running in Kubernetes, and hosted in AWS. You will work in a collaborative team environment to develop and refine the Jolt Software for the end user. You will have autonomy in moving prototypes into production for all Jolt products. Your role is essential for the growth of the Jolt platform. Your creativity, diligence, and focus will enable you to be successful in this role. Your desire and determination to consistently take on new challenges will be imperative in becoming a contributing member of the Jolt team.\xa0', 'Experience in React\xa0Experience in React-NativeMobile development experience (Android, Objective-C and swift)Experience in Node, Java, PHP, Kubernetes, Docker and Amazon AWS.Leadership experience', 'Competitive health, dental, and vision insuranceGenerous PTO program, including 10 paid company holidaysShort and long-term disability insuranceLife insurance benefitsSubsidized UTA passMaternity/Paternity benefitsOffice located in Lehi, UTFully stocked fridges, in addition to snacks and treats!', "5+ years of professional coding experience in a JavaScript frameworkExperience with a REST API and web socketsA Bachelor's degree in one of the following fields or equivalent years of work experience: Computer Science, IT, technology or other related field.", 'Who Jolt Is:', 'Jolt is looking for engineers who:', 'Experience in React\xa0', 'Experience with a REST API and web sockets', 'Generous PTO program, including 10 paid company holidays', 'Preferred:', 'Fully stocked fridges, in addition to snacks and treats!', 'Competitive health, dental, and vision insurance', '5+ years of professional coding experience in a JavaScript framework', 'Minimum Requirements:', 'Here at Jolt, we are serious about delivering value to our customers, and our development process shows it. We arrange ourselves into vertically integrated product teams who own the entire product experience from conception and design all the way through implementation and delivery to a customer. We are so serious, in fact, that our new building has individual 6-10 person rooms for each product team so we can work without the distraction of noisy neighbors.', 'Mobile development experience (Android, Objective-C and swift)', 'Have a solid foundation in JavaScript, front-end principles, and proper testingAre comfortable interacting with REST and/or GraphQL APIsCreate holistic solutions using maintainable codeExhibit and strive for domain mastery and sound architecture principles', 'Short and long-term disability insurance', 'Office located in Lehi, UT', 'Exhibit and strive for domain mastery and sound architecture principles', 'Life insurance benefits', 'Maternity/Paternity benefits', 'Experience in React-Native', 'You will be responsible for a variety of different front end projects in various languages and frameworks such as React-Native, React, GraphQL and others. It is essential that you are able to learn quickly and work in languages with which you may not already be familiar.', "A Bachelor's degree in one of the following fields or equivalent years of work experience: Computer Science, IT, technology or other related field.", 'Jolt is the leading operations platform for desk-less workers. Our integrated product suite is used by businesses all over the world. From Chick-Fil-A using our Tasks and Checklists to manage their employees, to McDonald’s using our Labeling to monitor food expiration, our customers love our products!', 'Subsidized UTA pass', 'Are comfortable interacting with REST and/or GraphQL APIs', 'Have a solid foundation in JavaScript, front-end principles, and proper testing', 'Create holistic solutions using maintainable code', 'Benefits:\xa0', 'Leadership experience', 'Experience in Node, Java, PHP, Kubernetes, Docker and Amazon AWS.']

['', 'Strong interpersonal skills.', 'Strong .NET C# knowledge.', 'As a technology leader in the AEC industry, Estimating Edge\xa0https://www.estimatingedge.com\xa0has been a trusted provider of construction takeoff, estimating and project management software for 30 years. The market leader,\xa0the\xa0Estimating Edge was the first company to build a solution that has a complete construction estimating solution–Takeoff and Cost Estimating in just one software application. The EDGE enables commercial subcontractors to prepare job estimates with greater accuracy, increased efficiency and consistent estimates across companies, resulting in better forecasting for job profitability.', 'Relational database knowledge (SQL Server)', 'Generous Benefits Package', 'Experience in SVG /2D drawing JavaScript libraries.', 'Strong experience with:', 'Ability to interface with all levels of internal staff and external customers in a professional manner.', 'Strong .NET C# knowledge.MVC/ Web API.Strong JavaScript knowledge and familiarity with jQuery and Vue.Experience in SVG /2D drawing JavaScript libraries.Relational database knowledge (SQL Server)Experience with SignalR and Entity Framework is a plus.5+ years of software development', 'Estimating Edge is looking for a software engineer to join our engineering team and build out the next evolution of The EDGE Estimator. The ideal candidate should possess a strong passion for coding and creating a quality product that meets and exceeds the needs of the Company’s customers.', 'Experience with SignalR and Entity Framework is a plus.', 'Company Overview', 'Basic Life Insurance and AD&D', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills.', 'Paid Time Off', 'Must be able to succeed in a dynamic team environment.', 'Medical, Dental, and Vision (Company will contribute a percentage of employee’s health care premium)Basic Life Insurance and AD&D401k with company match11 paid company holidays per yearPaid Time Off', 'Must be analytical, flexible, innovative, and self-motivated.', '401k with company match', 'MVC/ Web API.', '11 paid company holidays per year', 'Pleasant personality and ability to clearly communicate with people.Demonstrated interest in, knowledge of, and enthusiasm for software development and Microsoft technologies.Must be analytical, flexible, innovative, and self-motivated.Must be able to succeed in a dynamic team environment.', 'EDGE On Site extends the power of The EDGE estimating software into the field, allowing customers to track production, time and materials in real-time with virtually no data entry. ['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Extract use cases and requirements from data warehouse users.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Deep experience with database optimizer paths and data warehouse performance features.', "Here's what you’ll be doing:", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with building data warehouses on cloud infrastructure preferred.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Regular team meetings and one-on-ones with your manager to make sure you are heard, and you are on track Career development and lots of internal promotion – this group is growing!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design dimensional data models that satisfy data requirements and address ease of use and performance.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with users to mock-up dashboards and proof of concept data models.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0BEER30s/Snacks -once COVID passes', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Matching 401k contributions', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience dimensional data modeling for data warehousing using star schemas or Snowflake schemas.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design and build out monitoring and support elements to ensure data quality and timeliness.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent experience.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Minimum of three years of experience implementing dimensional data models (star schemas).', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Tuition reimbursement', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You will enjoy working with some of the smartest engineers in Boise', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Working on the latest and coolest technologies', 'Here’s what you get:', 'Here’s what you bring to the table:', 'The Data Warehouse Engineer gathers and interprets user analytics requirements, then transforms those requirements into dimensional data models. They collaborate with data analysts, data scientists, and other data consumers within the business to gather and populate data warehouse table structures. The Data Warehouse Engineer implements dimensional models, from building the logical model to implementing the physical model and loading the data with ETL. The engineer makes big data easy through intuitive query writing, performance, and integrating BI tools. They run the full DW stack from design through implementation.', 'Data Warehouse Engineer ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Fun, collaborative work environment', 'We are working on an exclusive retained search for a Data Warehouse Engineer for our client an industry leader experiencing hyper-growth headquartered in Boise, ID.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0GREAT benefits', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0yearly bonuses', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Charitable contributions and activities that make you feel like a better person', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0WORK/LIFE Balance', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Instantiate the dimensional data models on the Snowflake cloud platform.']

applications;', 'This specific Senior Software Engineer holds a challenging responsibility unique within this Software Development Organization. This position will serve as the technical lead within the Quality Assurance team to design and direct the activities that test the suite of applications that make up the Infor Location Based Intelligence software portfolio. In addition, this individual will take an active part in the overall design of the products under development. Goals of this position will be, among others, to strive for 100% QA test case automation, enhance system scalability test strategy, enhance system performance test strategy, ensure our systems are designed with testability in mind, and reduce our system test regression cycle time. job_title: Senior Data Engineer - Scala/Spark - Lower Manhattan - 170-225K
job_text: ['Experience      with cloud deployments (they use GCP) ', '3+      Years of Software/Data Engineering Experience ', 'As a professional company we gladly welcome applications from persons of any age and background and do not intend to discriminate with advert text and terminology.', 'Technical requirements: ', 'Roc is currently looking for a Senior Data Engineer to join one of the premier NYC tech companies located right in the Financial District in Manhattan. They are building out a brand new team to rebuild a part of their payment system. Right now they are looking for Senior Data Engineers with a background in Scala and experience building data pipelines, ETL, data warehousing, as well as ideally some exposure to Big Data. Experience working on large scale consumer products is a huge plus for this role. ', ' 3+      Years of Software/Data Engineering Experience  Professional      experience working with Scala or Java Experience using Spark  Experience      with cloud deployments (they use GCP)  ', 'If you feel that you have a strong mix of the above skills and experiences and wish to be considered, please apply for immediate consideration. ', '\xa0 ', 'Professional      experience working with Scala or Java ', '(Roc Search, Scala, Java, Python, Data Engineer, Senior Data Engineer, Software Engineer, Google Cloud, GCP, Backend Developer, Data, Senior Software Engineer, Manhattan, New York) ', 'The successful candidate will also have strong communication skills, along with an ability to pick up new skills quickly, and a desire to learn. ', 'Experience using Spark ']

['', 'Your main responsibility is to develop software (new, adapt and extend) to make sure our software products meet the business and functional requirements.', 'Ability to receive detailed information through oral communication at normal speaking levels', 'Must be able to lift up to 30 lbs. on occasion', 'As a Software Engineer at Aprimo R&D, you’ll be building, testing and deploying an Azure cloud-based web application which allows users around the world to collaborate within the Marketing enterprise space. Our customers are well known enterprise brands such as: Ubisoft, AT&T and Bank of America.', 'React Native – Nice to have', 'Similarly, we are open to people who are into front-end or back-end development only or want to work on the complete stack. We expect each team member to be open to help in any domain and to show interest in the product quality (e.g. automated testing) and deployment (e.g. release scripts)', 'Must be able to convey detailed or important spoken instructions to others accurately, loudly, or quickly', 'We take accountability (e.g. we take initiatives and don’t wait until we’re asked, and we are persistent until a solution is available)We want to learn and growWe like to collaborate and for this we embrace honesty, respect, speak out, positivism and leadershipWe like focus to be able to deliver results on which we are proudWe are entrepreneurial/innovation-minded (e.g. think outside the box, remain practical, and look at alternatives)', 'When designing software, you take performance, upgradability, supportability, maintainability, product compliancy, and high-level architectural fit into account.', 'In memory data structure stores (e.g. Redis)', 'Physical Requirements', 'Job Description', 'If you are passionate about software quality, who cares about the end product, would like to work with the latest technologies and tools, and want to be part of a dynamic company, we would like to talk with you.', 'What kind of culture do we have? ', 'We are entrepreneurial/innovation-minded (e.g. think outside the box, remain practical, and look at alternatives)', 'You’re detail oriented and enjoy challenges', 'About You', 'HTML5/CSS, CSS media queries', 'The goal is to frequently deliver value to our customers without violating our 99.9x% uptime to our customers. Once the solution is available to our customers, you and the team should follow the new capability by checking the behavior, customer acceptance and resolve issues, if needed. You will be challenged to work with different technologies and to come up with realistic and technically sound solutions. Creating intuitive and performant software should be seen as obvious, because our solutions work with lots of data and have a broad, geo-graphical spread, and customer base. This you will do in a co-located team which is one of many teams across the globe (e.g. Amsterdam, Beijing, Birmingham, Manila, and Indianapolis). The teams work in an agile work environment where we continuous challenge ourselves to improve and take employee experience into account.', 'Travel: < 5%', 'ESSENTIAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Basic / Entry Level:', 'Your main target is to deliver an excellent, innovative SAAS solution which contains complex, state-of-the-art and yet user friendly and intuitive functionalities and provide global customers an excelling user experience. This user experience goes from scoping until customer support. In our technology we use many frameworks and technologies such as .Net, React, AngularJS, Powershell, Elasticsearch, Redis, SignalR, and others.', 'Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in business or computer-related discipline or equivalent years’ experience', 'Design patterns, unit testing, continuous integration', 'Powershell, Containers, Kubernetes', 'Perform in constructive team environment helping colleagues and co-creation.', 'Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in business or computer-related discipline or equivalent years’ experienceYou enjoy working with several technologies and you’re eager to learnYou have solid coding skillsWhen designing software, you take performance, upgradability, supportability, maintainability, product compliancy, and high-level architectural fit into account.You come up with realistic solutions related towards timing, technical complexity, and budget.You have experience working or would like to work on large scale enterprise applications, and know how to create performant applications which can handle big data and user loads.You like working on long-term software products and are not looking for consultancy gigs.You have excellent analytic skills to analyze customer issues, you’re persistent to resolve them and have good communication skills to keep all parties up-to-date.You have a passion for understanding customers and their needs.You have strong communications skills and are enthusiastic about cross-team collaboration.You’re detail oriented and enjoy challengesYou’re fluent in English (writing and conversation)You’re proactive: add to this list and let us know about it!', 'You like working on long-term software products and are not looking for consultancy gigs.', 'Must be able to remain in stationary position 50% of timeMust be able to move 50% of timeMust be able to lift up to 30 lbs. on occasionThe worker is required to have close visual awareness to perform an activity such as: preparing and analyzing data and figures; transcribing; viewing a computer terminal; extensive reading.Ability to receive detailed information through oral communication at normal speaking levelsMust be able to convey detailed or important spoken instructions to others accurately, loudly, or quicklyThis job operates in a professional office environment. This role routinely uses standard office equipment such as computers, phones, photocopiers, filing cabinets, and fax machines.', 'You have a passion for understanding customers and their needs.', 'Latest Microsoft .NET Framework and .NET Core', 'You have experience working or would like to work on large scale enterprise applications, and know how to create performant applications which can handle big data and user loads.', 'You have strong communications skills and are enthusiastic about cross-team collaboration.', 'Expert / Master:', 'Aprimo is required to make a reasonable accommodation to the known disability of a qualified applicant or employee if it would not impose an "undue hardship" on the operation of the employer\'s business. job_title: Staff Data Scientist - League Data Central, Gameplay
job_text: ['', 'Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization', 'Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience ', "It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. Riot Games makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters and does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, criminal history, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law, including the City of Los Angeles’ Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance relating to an applicant's criminal history (LAMC 189.00).", 'Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs', 'Staff Data Scientist on the League Data Central team', 'Improve our data science practice by identifying novel techniques and technical approaches', '.', ' Experience with elo rating or similar ranking and match-making systems Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop) Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP) Experience working in an Agile environment ', 'Work with stakeholders across the organization and on initiatives, gathering requirements, designing project plans, determining approaches, and defining success criteria', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively present and share information across a wide array of technical expertise and seniority within the organization', '===', 'Act as a mentor to advise and level up data scientists in both data science and technical best practices', 'Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience', 'Our Perks', 'Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game', 'Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL', 'Stakeholder management skills. Ability to build alignment, define scope, deliver, and maintain data science products', ' Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing) Stakeholder management skills. Ability to build alignment, define scope, deliver, and maintain data science products Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively present and share information across a wide array of technical expertise and seniority within the organization ', 'Experience working in an Agile environment', ' Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience  Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs Identify opportunities for data-driven approaches that deliver value to teams across the organization, and champion data solutions to product leads and engineers Work with stakeholders across the organization and on initiatives, gathering requirements, designing project plans, determining approaches, and defining success criteria Improve our data science practice by identifying novel techniques and technical approaches Act as a mentor to advise and level up data scientists in both data science and technical best practices ', 'Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing)', 'Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP)', 'Experience with elo rating or similar ranking and match-making systems', 'Identify opportunities for data-driven approaches that deliver value to teams across the organization, and champion data solutions to product leads and engineers', 'Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop)', 'Required Qualifications', 'Responsibilities']

['What it’s like to work here:', 'Hands on experience with one or more ML pipeline automation frameworks — MLFlow, Kubeflow, or TFX.', 'We are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer in San Francisco to help us ship AI-powered products and services.', 'Excellent problem solving and critical thinking skills', 'Advanced SQL skills', 'Today, unfortunately, financial management and services are universally manual, tedious, and error prone. At the same time, these processes often follow well-defined rules, abide by industry standardization, and have become increasingly data-rich. Our team, within the Medium Segment Native Cloud Solutions at Sage, builds cloud-based AI-powered features and products that fundamentally change the way businesses operate.', 'Writing production-quality code to support our machine learning systems', 'Ability to work independently and deliver results on-time', 'You’re a deeply curious person.', 'You’re comfortable with investigating open-ended problems and coming up with concrete approaches to solve them.', 'Preferred Qualifications:', "Designing and implementing features and product enhancements that use machine learning to automate our customers' business processesWriting production-quality code to support our machine learning systemsBuilding and operating pipelines for accessing and enriching data for machine learningExperimenting, training, tuning, and shipping modelsWorking with our AI Infrastructure team to extend the capabilities of our machine learning platformWorking with product managers and data scientists to translate product/business problems into tractable machine learning problems.Exploratory data analyses and investigations.", 'Every business on Earth must, in some way, do bookkeeping, accounting, and financial planning to operate. At the outset, these functions may seem like mundane facts-of-life in the process of running a business; however, the skill with which a company does them can have a profound impact not only on their business, but also the world. A poorly forecasted budget, could mean the abrupt end to the clinical trial of a potentially life-saving drug. production software in Java', 'Experience with Amazon Web Services or other cloud services', ' Analyze requirements, create complex software designs, vet them with multiple stakeholders and cross-functional teams and incorporate feedback prior to implementation', 'Privacy Notice for Job Applicants', '.', 'Job Description', 'As a Member Of The Software Team, You Will', 'All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.', 'You enjoy an agile, fast paced and highly technical environment. You are comfortable with every aspect of the software development lifecycle, from requirements to production support.', '2+ years of experience of development on commercial off-the-shelf platform (such as SalesForce, Oracle ERP or others) is highly desired ', 'Build and maintain an ecosystem of services and applications that provide unique value add ', 'http://www.guardanthealth.com/jobs/', 'In Addition, You Bring', 'At Guardant Health our mission is to conquer cancer with data; as such software sits at the core of everything we do. While we’re best known for our molecular diagnostics, which unlock the genomic signatures of cancer, these tests are just the first step in the equation. Turning this genomic data into actionable insights shared with thousands of patients, physicians, and researchers in a scalable, reliable, and secure fashion is a software product challenge.', 'To learn more about the information collected when you apply for a position at Guardant Health, Inc. and how it is used, please review our ', 'Work with very interesting technologies and datasets (human genomics)', 'You can collaborate within and across teams, understand the big picture, create software designs, implement and prove your code is great with automated test results. You are able to work both independently and collaboratively. You are eager to learn new technologies and languages. You are dedicated to engineering excellence yet pragmatic enough to balance quality principles and business needs. You are a champion of agile/scrum. You know the value of written word and can create right-size documentation. You seek feedback and integrate it in a professional manner.', '2+ years of experience customizing commercial Lab Information Management Systems (LabVantage preferred) ', 'We are building a unique software stack to manage an ecosystem of microservices, RESTful APIs, and data integrations with internal and external systems to deliver useful and elegant user experiences in the extraordinarily complex oncology diagnostic and therapeutic landscape. We connect patients with clinical trials, help clinicians order our test and receive our clinical reports, and deliver valuable genomic datasets to researchers to help uncover important insights into treatment paradigms and drug discovery. Our technology stack reflects our views of using the best tools for the job, employing Java, Python, Ruby along with Kubernetes, Docker, Mulesoft, MySQL, MongoDB, high-performance computing clusters (HPC), and a variety of AWS services to analyze and disseminate vast volumes of genomic data.', 'Have a holistic view of processes and systems involved in taking patient samples from order to result in a multi-product clinical laboratory', 'Understanding of laboratory operations, regulations and compliance in the healthcare industry is highly desired', 'Company Description', 'Please visit our career page at: ', 'Provide operational platform support such as user and license management and audit documentation ', 'Guardant Health is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.', 'Qualifications', '6+ years of enterprise software development6+ years of experience developing production software in Java6+ years of experience developing and consuming RESTFul APIs using RAML, Swagger / OpenAPIHands-on experience with data modeling, developing schemas (relational databases, XML/JSON), data management and processing (relational and NoSQL data stores)2+ years of experience customizing commercial Lab Information Management Systems (LabVantage preferred) 2+ years of experience of development on commercial off-the-shelf platform (such as SalesForce, Oracle ERP or others) is highly desired Understanding of laboratory operations, regulations and compliance in the healthcare industry is highly desiredExperience with Amazon Web Services or other cloud servicesExperience working in a fast-paced environment leveraging an agile development framework, understanding of test automation and continuous integrationBachelor degree in software engineering, CS, or EEExperience with integration platforms such as Mulesoft is a big plus', '6+ years of experience developing and consuming RESTFul APIs using RAML, Swagger / OpenAPI', 'Experience working in a fast-paced environment leveraging an agile development framework, understanding of test automation and continuous integration', 'Develop and maintain automated tests for regular releases', 'The Software team is looking for an experienced and energetic senior software engineer to build and enhance laboratory workflows within Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) and across other systems and services that interact with LIMS to facilitate lab operations. ', '6+ years of enterprise software development', 'Hands-on experience with data modeling, developing schemas (relational databases, XML/JSON), data management and processing (relational and NoSQL data stores)', 'Code for efficiency, reusability, scalability and all other -ilities by following existing frameworks and practices or creating new ones when needed']

job_title: Azure Data Consultant - A*zure Data Engineer - Remote - East Coast
job_text: ['Work hands-on to create proofs-of-concept to demonstrate ideas and concepts that may be foreign to customers or prospects ', 'Utilize tools such as Azure Data Factory, Azure Functions, and Azure Stream Analytics to perform data orchestration and transformation ', 'Significant experience with utilizing Azure Analysis Services ', 'Extensive T-SQL experience on SQL Server ', 'Expert experience with Azure SQL Data Warehouse and Azure SQL Server offerings. ', 'Present audience-appropriate explanations of data engineering practices to technical teams ', 'Experience with Azure Stream Analytics is a plus ', "There will be no technical test as part of the interview process. Instead, you'll talk with other people at the top of their game, sharing your passion for Azure and data. ", 'Expert experience with organizing and using Azure Data Lake Storage ', 'Experience setting up and using Azure Data Factory v2 ', 'Azure services: Azure Cosmos DB, Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Data Warehouse, Azure Data Lake Storage, Azure Data Factory, Azure Stream Analytics, Azure Databricks, and Azure Blob storage.', 'This role will be 100% remote, with limited travel once safe to do so. The company is headquartered in Georgia, with customers all over the U.S. ', "Please apply with your profile or resume now, and I'll call you to discuss the role in more detail. ", 'Build environments for storing raw data, utilizing Azure Data Lake Storage ', "'Rock star' is a term that is perhaps now over used, however we are looking for one to join a top-tier Azure consultancy. A rock-star wizard of an Azure Data Engineer. ", 'Implement data warehouses and analysis services as part of a modern data warehouse (MDW) design ', 'Responsibilities: ', '5+ years hands-on development experience with SQL Server and SQL Data Warehouse ', 'Skills ', 'Experience with Spark SQL or Hive SQL is a plus ', "You'll either already be Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Engineer Associate / MVP, or be on your way to being so. You'll be working alongside other leaders in their field, passionate about delivering excellence and learning along the way. ", "Below is a list of the areas you'll be an expert in, but hopefully you'll already know that this is an opportunity worth looking into. ", 'Experience with other NoSQL storage, document databases, and graph databases is a plus ', 'Experience with Azure Functions, Service Bus, and Event Hubs is a plus ', 'Experience with Azure Databricks (or Spark) is highly desirable, and a basic understanding of Databricks and Spark is required ', 'Experience with CosmosDB ', '3+ years of hands-on Azure experience ', 'Expert experience with SQL ', '\xa0 ', 'You will have the opportunity to design and implement data solutions at the most exciting companies. ', 'Skills', 'Responsibilities:']

['', 'Position Summary', 'GIT, ROS, C / C++, Python, Image Processing, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Deep Learning, Object Detection, Feature Detection, 2D, 3D', 'Must be U.S. Citizen or Permanent Resident\xa0', 'RE2 is an Equal Opportunity / Affirmative Action employer. We believe there is great value in having a diverse workforce and we take pride in being an inclusive and accepting work environment for all people.', 'Lead the development of solutions in the areas of autonomous and vision-aided robotic systems.Work closely with mechanical, electrical, and software engineering teams to develop systems from concept to production level.Develop and execute autonomous and vision-aided robotic systems projects including guiding the technical approach and managing the development of the autonomous system.\xa0', 'Keywords', 'RESUMES ACCEPTED IN PDF FORMAT ONLY.', 'RE2 offers competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits package including maternity/paternity leave, flexible schedules, half-day Fridays, stock options, 401k plan, training and professional development stipends, paid time off, and medical/dental/vision/life and disability insurance for all regular full-time employees.', 'Benefits and Perks', 'The person filling this Software Engineer role will help us turn this vision into a reality including in nontraditional environments such as underwater. Primarily, this Software Engineer will be responsible for developing autonomy and vision processing algorithms for use in a variety of products and projects. This position requires someone who can learn, develop, dream up and apply new techniques for novel problems focused on controlling robotic manipulators. Candidates must possess the following in order to apply.', 'If you are a technologist specializing in robotic autonomy and vision processing, and you have an entrepreneurial spirit, RE2 Robotics has the perfect role for you. This Software Engineer position is open to people who are passionate about developing the next generation of autonomous robotics.', 'Minimum of 2 years of industry work experience in computer vision, artificial intelligence, automation, and/or vision processing', '\xa0', 'RE2 also offers our monthly Taco Tuesday lunches, free snacks, coffee, and espresso, weekly fresh fruit delivery, holiday and summer parties, birthday bonuses, cell phone stipend, and more!', 'Work closely with mechanical, electrical, and software engineering teams to develop systems from concept to production level.', 'M.S. or B.S. in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Robotics, or other related field ', 'M.S. or B.S. in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Robotics, or other related field Minimum of 2 years of industry work experience in computer vision, artificial intelligence, automation, and/or vision processingMust be U.S. Citizen or Permanent Resident\xa0', 'Lead the development of solutions in the areas of autonomous and vision-aided robotic systems.', 'RE2 Robotics has become a leading developer of mobile manipulation by working closely with universities, research institutes, and the federal government to create manipulation systems that are light-weight, rugged, and powerful. Through our research, we have developed manipulators that are highly dexterous and easily controlled. In our vision, the next horizon to mobile manipulation is the addition of greater autonomy so that our systems can run with less supervision and in environments with highly limited bandwidth.', 'Develop and execute autonomous and vision-aided robotic systems projects including guiding the technical approach and managing the development of the autonomous system.\xa0', 'Responsibilities']

job_title: Systems Software Engineer - Tech-Driven Hedge Fund
job_text: ['', 'You’ll work closely with developers to decompose and re-invent systems & tooling utilized by teams across the firm, whilst ensuring the flawless operation of live trading systems. The role provides a rare mix of Development, Operations, Networking, and Systems Engineering, in a fast-paced, dynamic environment that provides new technical challenges constantly and demands that you learn new things daily.', 'Experience in automating routine tasks', '*Remote interviews & Remote Start*', 'Great pay and bonus schemeWorking in a small team of highly talented engineers & mathematiciansDirect business impactFree food, smart offices, flexible working, opportunities to learn new skills outside of work expertise', 'Building industry leading compute, network & storage infrastructure', 'Experience in configuration management and infrastructure provisioning (e.g. Chef, Puppet, Ansible, Terraform)', 'My client is looking for top-tier engineers with a passion for working on massively distributed, fault-tolerant systems, to scale out an industry-leading team of systems engineers. The team comes from varying professional backgrounds including FAANG, Unicorn Start-Ups and competing hedge funds to collaborate on building best-in-class trading infrastructure.', 'Experience building and managing Compute, Network, and/or Storage systems and/or componentsProficient in PythonExperience in automating routine tasksExperience in configuration management and infrastructure provisioning (e.g. Chef, Puppet, Ansible, Terraform)Excellent design, debugging, and problem solving skills', 'Direct business impact', 'Excellent design, debugging, and problem solving skills', 'Working in a small team of highly talented engineers & mathematicians', 'Get in touch for extra info', 'Deploy code that reaches every office utilizing the latest technologies and techniques in Software Engineering to drive improvements to all our systems.', 'Proficient in Python', 'Ensure and improve the reliability, availability and performance of infrastructure and infrastructure-related applications', 'Summary', 'Free food, smart offices, flexible working, opportunities to learn new skills outside of work expertise', 'Building industry leading compute, network & storage infrastructureElimination manual tasks through automationEnsure and improve the reliability, availability and performance of infrastructure and infrastructure-related applicationsLearn from industry leaders, distinguished engineers and investment professionalsDeploy code that reaches every office utilizing the latest technologies and techniques in Software Engineering to drive improvements to all our systems.', 'Experience building and managing Compute, Network, and/or Storage systems and/or components', 'Great pay and bonus scheme', 'Rewards and Incentives:', 'Elimination manual tasks through automation', 'Learn from industry leaders, distinguished engineers and investment professionals', 'Responsibilities:', 'Requirements:']

['', 'Strong skills across relevant server-side technologies, including networking, security, databases, RESTful services and REST/GraphQL API development.', 'Architect and build server and browser based systems that will integrate with our 3D printers and other Carbon machines.', 'Experience building out testing infrastructure\xa0', 'Experience utilizing and optimizing build infrastructure: e.g. Bazel, Webpack, Jenkins', '6+ years of production level experience shipping successful software.Experience with full-stack frameworks such as Ruby on Rails or Express/ Node as well as some experience with front-end development in React.Strong skills across relevant server-side technologies, including networking, security, databases, RESTful services and REST/GraphQL API development.Practical experience building and maintaining distributed systems utilizing distributed message queues and search engines (e.g. ElasticSearch)\xa0DevOps and/or operational experience and familiarity, e.g. AWS, Docker, Kubernetes experience preferred.BS or MS degree in Computer Science or equivalent.', 'Experience with full-stack frameworks such as Ruby on Rails or Express/ Node as well as some experience with front-end development in React.', 'Our company is built on the idea that when diverse fields of study come together, we are able to solve challenging problems. We have grand dreams to build technology that will influence industries around the world. You will be joining a diverse team with a dynamic culture, where team success is as important as celebrating individual contributions.', 'We are looking to hire an engineer to build full-stack software that interfaces with our printers and other hardware. You’re comfortable with both frontend and backend software technologies, have the ability to break down complex problems into individual tasks. Ideally you are familiar with multiple languages and have the desire to continue to expand your skill set with new languages and tools.\xa0', 'DevOps and/or operational experience and familiarity, e.g. AWS, Docker, Kubernetes experience preferred.', 'Manufacturing background (worked at a company in the manufacturing space before)', '6+ years of production level experience shipping successful software.', '\ufeffYou do not need to match every listed expectation to apply for this position. Here at Carbon, we know that diverse perspectives foster the innovation we need to be successful, and we are committed to building a team that encompasses a variety of backgrounds, experiences, and skills', 'Architect and build server and browser based systems that will integrate with our 3D printers and other Carbon machines.Build both back-end infrastructure and user-facing features.Participate in design and code reviews, identify and communicate best development practices.', 'BS or MS degree in Computer Science or equivalent.', 'Working at the intersection of hardware, software, and molecular science, we are committed to delivering on the promise of 3D printing, enabling commercial customers to go beyond basic prototyping to 3D manufacturing.', 'Practical experience building and maintaining distributed systems utilizing distributed message queues and search engines (e.g. ElasticSearch)\xa0', 'Participate in design and code reviews, identify and communicate best development practices.', 'Experience building out testing infrastructure\xa0Experience utilizing and optimizing build infrastructure: e.g. Bazel, Webpack, JenkinsManufacturing background (worked at a company in the manufacturing space before)', 'Build both back-end infrastructure and user-facing features.', 'Preferred Experience:', 'Responsibilities:', 'Requirements:']

We’re not sure if you’re using a Time-Turner or some sort of Tesseract, but you seem to be in more than one place at a time.System thinker: Like a string theorist, you believe there's a connection among all things. You know there’s no such thing as a coincidence because fate and karma are 100% real. Serendipity is one of your superpowers and you see the patterns everywhere.Team Player: You’re a team player and it’s official cheerleader. Your capacity to create balance and infuse the team with positive energy is key to its success, which is why you’re always seeking and sharing feedback. You’re most happy when the whole team is shining.", 'The Abarcan Data Fields are full of complex circuitry, storage houses, and data processing facilities. They require specialized artisan hands and minds that, not only know how to work the coded fields, but also love them. These people are hard to find and we need more than one!\xa0Are you one of these people? Does your heart skip a beat at the thought of a new code language? Is your smart phone password written in C#? Are you mentally fixing the disastrous code of the most recent update on your phone? If yes, then you are probably perfect for Abarca. As Software Engineer II you would be responsible for participating in the analysis, design, development, implementation, maintenance and automatization of critical business processes for the Company and its internal and external clients. You will work to automate processes that allow for the exchange of data within the Company and between the Company and its external partners/clients.\xa0', 'You can communicate effectively (read, write, speak, debug, code, mumble in your sleep, and text, among many other activities) in both English and Spanish.', 'You’ll be writing, translating and coding software programs, applications, tools, and prototypes according to specifications (', 'Bachelor or Master’s Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or related field. (In lieu of a degree, equivalent relevant experience may be considered.)3-5 years of experience in Software Engineering/Development (hopefully, preferably, with fingers crossed)Obviously you’re computer proficient (Software, Hardware, Anyware) with experience in computer programming using NET 1.1 / 2.0 / 3.5, ASP.NET, AJAX, VB / C#, JavaScript, VB Script, HTML and XML - XSLT.\xa0Your knowledge of Web and Windows Applications architecture and Microsoft programming is basically innate.You’ve explored de lands of Visual SourceSafe and Microsoft’s .Net Framework and survived.Minimum of 2-3 years of experience with SQL Server, Database Design, T-SQL and Stored Procedures (The more, the merrier. And remember that Database replication is a +plus+).You know your way around Object‐Oriented languages and Design Patterns.We’ll let you have an extra cookie if you bring knowledge of the Healthcare, Pharmacy, and Pharmacy Benefit Management industries, Medicare Part D, and CMS regulations.You can communicate effectively (read, write, speak, debug, code, mumble in your sleep, and text, among many other activities) in both English and Spanish.You think critically and analytically and like to play for the team, bringing out the best in every member. You’re accountable and true to your word. Business and software development are part of your game zone, and your sharp focus on customer service puts the rest of us in the legally blind category. Debugging is an eternal task, much like evolution.', 'We’ll let you have an extra cookie if you bring knowledge of the Healthcare, Pharmacy, and Pharmacy Benefit Management industries, Medicare Part D, and CMS regulations.', 'Minimum of 2-3 years of experience with SQL Server, Database Design, T-SQL and Stored Procedures (The more, the merrier. And remember that Database replication is a +plus+).', 'The fields are enormous. One code loving software engineer is not enough, which is why you will collaborate with other analysts and designers in the development and initiation of new software programs, applications, and tools.']
