[' \u200bProven      ability of successful interaction with creative disciplines  4+      years of professional programming experience  3+      years of experience in C++  Comfort      working with large complex codebases  Ability      to execute feature requests within a highly constrained environment  Willingness to dig into the details of complex      problems\u200b  ', 'Develop      deep understanding of our high-level gameplay and scripting systems ', 'Provide      scalable and re-usable solutions for a variety of gameplay problems ', '\u200bExperience      with modern game engines and technologies ', '\u200bProven      ability of successful interaction with creative disciplines ', '\u200b\u200bConsider      user impact features for designers and artists when designing low-level      systems and features\u200b\u200b\u200b ', '\u200bResponsibilities\u200b', ' \u200bExperience      with modern game engines and technologies  Experience      with Lua or similar scripting systems  History      of successful feature execution in a legacy environment', 'Willingness to dig into the details of complex      problems\u200b ', 'History      of successful feature execution in a legacy environment', 'Minimum Qual\u200bifications and Skills', 'Our content engineering team is a team of skilled generalists, and our mandate is to bring the vision of our content creators to life in ways that are stable, scalable, performant and re-usable. The focus of the role will be on implementation of both high-level gameplay systems and specific gameplay experiences in a combination of C++ and Lua. ', 'Comfort      working with large complex codebases ', '4+      years of professional programming experience ', 'Work      with other engineers to review and evaluate script architecture and system      designs ', "343 Industries, the studio developing titles in the Halo universe, is looking for a talented Gameplay Engineer to join the World Content Development team working on the next big Halo shooter experience. As a Gameplay Engineer, you'll focus on close collaboration with a team of environment artists, gameplay designers, and level designers to build out the player experiences in our upcoming title. \u200b ", 'Ability      to execute feature requests within a highly constrained environment ', '3+      years of experience in C++ ', 'Experience      with Lua or similar scripting systems ', 'Work      closely with designers and level artists to iterate daily on gameplay      experiences ', 'Investigate      complex issues arising in the engine, underlying script ', '\xa0 ', " Work      closely with designers and level artists to iterate daily on gameplay      experiences  Develop      deep understanding of our high-level gameplay and scripting systems  Provide      scalable and re-usable solutions for a variety of gameplay problems  Work      with other engineers to review and evaluate script architecture and system      designs  Improve      existing systems that aren't performing to required standard  Investigate      complex issues arising in the engine, underlying script  \u200b\u200bConsider      user impact features for designers and artists when designing low-level      systems and features\u200b\u200b\u200b  ", 'Candidates should expect to work across a range of technologies to fit the needs of the team – and all candidates should be comfortable diving into and working in lower-level engine code in order to debug any problems that might arise during day to day development. The ideal candidate will enjoy working in a highly collaborative environment, and will need to have both solid technical and communication skills.\u200b ', 'Pluses', "Improve      existing systems that aren't performing to required standard "]

We treasure curiosity, communication, passion for security, a bias towards collaboration and action and the desire to embrace and extend standard methodologies and patterns. You can develop novel new software libraries, features and entire services or applications from scratch with little direction and can design and socialize important software updates across the team and organization. Flexport is on a mission to make global trade easier for everyone because we believe it can help connect the world and break down economic barriers. We know this industry is complex. That’s why we invest in education starting day one with Flexport Academy, a one week intensive onboarding program designed specifically to set every new Flexport employee up for success. ', 'Engineering Culture And Values', 'You Should Have', ' Take point on complex product initiatives and run them to completion with minimal supervision. Design flexible, maintainable code. Work closely with designers and product managers to distill complex business problems into elegant technical solutions. ['', 'EZCORP is an essential business that is here and ready to help when needed. ['', 'Advanced analytical skills, with proven experience solving complex problems.', 'As a member of Sentek’s PMW 770 Engineering Support Services (ESS) team, you’ll provide support to the Program Executive Officer (PEO), Command, Control, Communications, Computers, and Intelligence (C4I) Undersea Integration Program Office, PMW 770. PMW 770 delivers vital C4I capabilities to the Navy by connecting the architecture of undersea vehicles, both manned and unmanned, and mobile communication in support of Nuclear, Command, Control, and Communications (NC3) to maximize joint warfighting capability. PMW 770 meets its unique and challenging mission by integrating products from partner program offices to provide C4I system-of-systems communication architectures to the warfighter. PMW 770 not only develops undersea communication systems but also performs communication system hardware and software integration, modernization and sustainment. The program office supports both land and sea assets that play a role in undersea communication systems.', 'Evaluates in-house and contracted systems designs, interfaces, and integration work for job_text: ['Ability to communicate technical findings to non-technical audiences', '• Experience with cloud architectures including AWS', '• Experience with distributed computing and storage technologies', 'Experience/ knowledge of computer science concepts, data architecture, and experience/knowledge of statistics', 'Experience working with data manipulation, analytic/business insight tools, and data visualization experience', 'This role is responsible for analyzing, interpreting, and extracting\xa0data using IT techniques to support decision-making. This role works with customers to understand changing requirements and recommends solutions based on quantitative analysis. Responsibilities include working independently and collaboratively in a team to develop data models and solutions. This role compiles and reviews data, often disparate and inconsistent, to address complex intelligence issues or problems for customers. This role requires constructing and performing complex statistical, mathematical, and data analysis independently, or in partnership with other data scientists or analysts. This role provides recommendations for the development of tools and applications that improve process effectiveness and efficiency.\xa0', 'Desired Optional Skills:', 'TS/SCI clearance with polygraph Ensures adherence to established technology standards and consults with senior leadership on technology solutions. Supports existing systems and is responsible for leading technical aspects of a project. Responsible for assigning resources and delegating tasks to meet project deliverables. Other roles that fit this definition within a different function may include: Data Center Engr, Network Engr, System Engr, and Telecom Engr. Specific team is identified by use of the Engineer Role in conjunction with the function they support.']

['', "Experience:• 4-8 years of directly related experience.***Candidates should be local to the LA to be able to work on-site at the Burbank Office once\xa0 the Client's WFH policy has been lifted.", 'Description: ', '-IIS/Apache/Nginx-Active Directory-F5 Load Balancer-VMware-SAN & Fiber Zoning-Overall Windows & Linux Server proficiencyPOSITION OVERVIEW: ', 'ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS/RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Must', ' ', 'Senior Systems Engineer .', 'QUALIFICATIONS', 'Skills:', 'Senior Systems Engineer', 'Education:', 'Description:', 'AllSTEM Connections is looking to hire a\xa0 Senior Systems Engineer . ', 'Experience:', 'The Senior Systems Engineer supports both internal and external users with technical and application issues. Working under general/minimal supervision, provides support to development team and escalations from tier 2 support, by responding to and diagnosing problems using troubleshooting skills and tools. Includes problem recognition, research, isolation, resolution and follow-up steps. Will interact with network services, software systems engineering, and/or applications development to restore service and/or identify and correct core problem. Works with team ensuring systems are available and up. Takes proactive actions to ensure environment is healthy. Assists development team with deployments.ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS/RESPONSIBILITIES• Level three support role, providing support to internal and external customers.• Provide support utilizing internal ticketing system, being on-call, and responding system alerts.• Provide accurate and creative solutions to system problems from moderate to large nature to ensure availability and system stability. Able to speak to network, SAN, Windows, IIS, clustering, and F5 Load balancing issues.• Monitor systems and proactively identify trends.• Acquire and maintain domain knowledge of relevant products (software and hardware) and support policies in order to provide accurate solutions to customers.• Deploy machines in a VMware environment, utilizing multiple SAN environments• Assist in the developing and maintaining of a problem resolution knowledgebase.• Recommend systems modifications.• Work with internal business stakeholders to understand business needs and create solutions using knowledge of systems.• Work with and directly communicate with Sr. Leaders and Executives with minimal oversightQUALIFICATIONSSkills:• Aptitude for providing excellent customer service.• Good communication, problem solving skills and written skills.• Ability to use Service Desk standards and follow guidelines.• Broad range of infrastructural (network, Windows server, storage, load balancer, and systems) knowledge is required.• Maintains currency and high level of technical skill in field of expertise.• Able to be on call and work “off hours” when necessary.• Able to actively assist with large multi-million-dollar projects.• Knowledge of advanced System Administration functions.• Must work well with a distributed team of equally qualified coworkers.• Ability to troubleshoot and take the lead on technical issues and find root cause.• Must be skilled in Microsoft technologies including IIS, .NET (infrastructurally), Windows 20XX, and conversant in Microsoft SQL.• Must be skilled in Linux environments (CentOS, Red Hat, Ubuntu, etc.), including advanced Linux administration and patching.• Must be skilled in VMware & SAN environment, with the ability perform daily and maintenance tasks, including vacating hosts for maintenance as well as expanding storage on existing VM• Need working knowledge of networking, FTP, and load balancing.• Advanced scripting abilities, including ability to leverage various scripting languages to automate repetitive tasks.Education:• Two-year technical degree or equivalent work-related experience required.• ITIL Certification (preferred) ', 'Senior Systems EngineerTop Candidate Must Haves: ', 'POSITION OVERVIEW:']

job_title: Software Engineer - Enterprise Private Cloud / Infrastructure / Kubernetes
job_text: ['', 'Location:', ' ', 'Duration:', 'Experience operating applications running on Kubernetes at scale in a production environment ', 'Experience configuring and deploying monitoring and alerting for applications running on Kubernetes and Kubernetes itself ', 'Title:  Enterprise Private Cloud / Infrastructure / Software Engineer - Kubernetes   ', 'Job Description: ', '\xa0 ', 'Duration: 6 – 12+ months ', 'Experience deploying, tuning and debugging applications running on Kubernetes ', '\xa0', 'Experience with some of the following services: Ingress, Ingress Controller, Network Policies ', 'Specific technology keywords: Kubernetes, Ansible, Terraform, Istio, Envoy, Nginx, HAProxy, MetalLB, Helm, Rancher, Elastic, Prometheus, Grafana ', 'Location: Cambridge, MA – Remote Work ', 'Title:', 'The project is called Private Cloud. Think of it as building a small version of a public cloud like AWS or Azure for client own private use to develop and deploy new services. ']

['', ' The AI and Data Science team is centralized across the entire organization. We work with various product teams across various business units to define high-impact business problems, solve them using novel techniques, and execute and monitor them throughout their lifecycle. Most of our models make it to production, they never sit in a research lab. But we also do quite a bit of research to stay up-to-date with the latest technologies/algorithms. We are very collaborative, you will likely get lots of ideas from the team.', ' Design and develop (almost) production ready code.', 'Norfolk Southern Corporation (NYSE: NSC)', ' We use Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, and MXNet for Deep Learning, and OpenCV for traditional Computer Vision.', ' You will have your own dedicated GPU (!) in addition to a GPU cluster to run parallel training and inference jobs.', ' We always have the latest versions of our tools/packages/libraries available.', ' We are very collaborative, you will likely get lots of ideas from the team.', ' Hands-on and theoretical knowledge of various Machine Learning algorithms and tools, e.g. xgboost/LightGBM, Random Forests, SVMs, PCA, t-sne, kmeans, DBSCAN, etc. or hands-on and theoretical knowledge of various Deep Learning algorithms and frameworks for Localization, Segmentation, Object Detection, etc.', ' Evaluate accuracy and quality of data sources, as well as the designed models', ' The AI and Data Science team is centralized across the entire organization.', ' Provide guidance, support and mentoring to junior team members.', ' Excellent knowledge of Python and/or R, knowledge of Spark is a plus', ' Effectively utilize appropriate statistical, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Computer Vision models and techniques to solve various business problems Collaborate with various departments to identify opportunities for process improvement and developing analytics use-cases. Provide guidance, support and mentoring to junior team members. Evaluate accuracy and quality of data sources, as well as the designed models Stays up to date with the latest models and changes in the technology Design and develop (almost) production ready code. Communicate results to colleagues and business partners. Coordinate with application development teams to integrate developed models with existing applications.', ' Communicate results to colleagues and business partners.', 'Job Description', ' Minimum of 2-3 years of relevant industry experience (as a Data Scientist, Research Scientist, Machine Learning Engineer, Computer Vision Scientist, etc.), 3+ preferred; or proven qualifications.', ' We work with various product teams across various business units to define high-impact business problems, solve them using novel techniques, and execute and monitor them throughout their lifecycle.', 'What Tools Do We Use', ' There are high-frame cameras beside our tracks, capturing images of trains and rail cars as they pass. We design various Deep Learning and Computer Vision algorithms to detect certain objects of interest or issues and defects. We then optimize their performance and deploy them at the edge for real-time scoring and notification of our mechanical personnel upon detections.', 'Company Overview', ' We use Jupyter notebook, Emacs, PyCharm, Rstudio as IDEs.', ' Stays up to date with the latest models and changes in the technology', ' Most of our models make it to production, they never sit in a research lab. But we also do quite a bit of research to stay up-to-date with the latest technologies/algorithms.', ' Expertise with Time Series problems is a plus', ' We use Python, R, and Spark (PySpark, SparkR, Scala) for modeling and EDA. You will have a local machine with 512GB of memory, so feel free to load the data in memory if it makes sense or if it fits (!) You will also have terabytes of memory in our Spark cluster that is not shared by anyone. We use Jupyter notebook, Emacs, PyCharm, Rstudio as IDEs. We use Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, and MXNet for Deep Learning, and OpenCV for traditional Computer Vision. You will have your own dedicated GPU (!) in addition to a GPU cluster to run parallel training and inference jobs. We always have the latest versions of our tools/packages/libraries available.', ' There are high-frame cameras beside our tracks, capturing images of trains and rail cars as they pass. We design various Deep Learning and Computer Vision algorithms to detect certain objects of interest or issues and defects. We then optimize their performance and deploy them at the edge for real-time scoring and notification of our mechanical personnel upon detections. Our locomotives stream 350+ sensor information in real-time. We create predictive models to predict various component failures hours, days, and sometimes months in advance. Want to learn more? Apply today!', 'What Will Be Your Duties', ' Effectively utilize appropriate statistical, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Computer Vision models and techniques to solve various business problems', 'What are our requirements:', 'New Headquarters – Atlanta, GA', ' Want to learn more? Apply today!', ' You will also have terabytes of memory in our Spark cluster that is not shared by anyone.', 'Senior Data Scientist(Machine Learning or Computer Vision)', ' Collaborate with various departments to identify opportunities for process improvement and developing analytics use-cases.', ' We use Python, R, and Spark (PySpark, SparkR, Scala) for modeling and EDA.', ' Coordinate with application development teams to integrate developed models with existing applications.', ' You will have a local machine with 512GB of memory, so feel free to load the data in memory if it makes sense or if it fits (!)', 'What Kind Of Problems Do We Solve', 'Who We Are And What We Do', ' Master’s or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Machine Learning, Statistics or related field, or Bachelor’s degree with 5+ years of industry experience Minimum of 2-3 years of relevant industry experience (as a Data Scientist, Research Scientist, Machine Learning Engineer, Computer Vision Scientist, etc.), 3+ preferred; or proven qualifications. Hands-on and theoretical knowledge of various Machine Learning algorithms and tools, e.g. xgboost/LightGBM, Random Forests, SVMs, PCA, t-sne, kmeans, DBSCAN, etc. or hands-on and theoretical knowledge of various Deep Learning algorithms and frameworks for Localization, Segmentation, Object Detection, etc. Expertise with Time Series problems is a plus Excellent knowledge of Python and/or R, knowledge of Spark is a plus', ' Master’s or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Machine Learning, Statistics or related field, or Bachelor’s degree with 5+ years of industry experience', ' Our locomotives stream 350+ sensor information in real-time. We create predictive models to predict various component failures hours, days, and sometimes months in advance.', 'Education And Experience']

Collaborates with other relevant stakeholders and team members to ensure that features meet business needs. Follows industry-standard agile software design methodology for development and documentation. Mentors junior software engineers on the team. ', 'Ability to manage many competing priorities/requests in a fast-paced environment (Performs more complex functions, understands principles, may teach others.)', 'Degree in an Engineering/Technology discipline or equivalent experience.', 'Collaborates with other relevant stakeholders and team members to ensure that features meet business needs.', 'Evaluates and implements enhancement design solutions to improve cost, quality, and performance of software applications.', 'Main Responsibilities', 'Mentors junior software engineers on the team.', 'Qualifications', 'Develops, codes, configures, and tests programs and systems.']

['', 'Learning the nuts and bolts of Service-Oriented Architecture (SOA) and building robust RESTful APIs.', 'The prerequisites for joining our development team are simple. We care more about your attitude and aptitude than the specific tools and technologies you have used in the past. You need to have a strong passion for software development and must take pride in your coding. You should also have great analytical skills and the ability to handle complex, modular software development in a collaborative team-based environment.', 'We are looking for a Software Engineer (mid-level) to join our rapidly growing Technology Team. Cvent’s Product Development Team is responsible for the design, development, and operation of the company’s suite of cloud-based software products. We are also currently engaged in a major initiative to build our next-generation software platform, utilizing the most cutting edge tools and technologies.', 'Experience with using and implementing RESTful APIs', 'What You Will Be Doing', 'Gaining experience with different database technologies, ranging from traditional relational to the latest NoSQL products such as Couchbase and Elastic Search.', "Bachelor's in Computer Science OR related technical discipline. Equivalent experience will also be considered.", 'Need more reasons to consider us?\xa0We offer competitive salary packages, an extensive benefits package for all full-time employees, including medical, dental, vision, semi-annual bonuses, 401K match, gym membership discounts, and other great perks! If you would like to learn more about Cvent and our products, visit our website at www.cvent.com', 'Creating beautiful, interactive and easy-to-use web applications using modern client-side frameworks and libraries', 'Experience with one or more of the following databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, Couchbase, MongoDB, Redis or other NoSQL technologies', 'Any experience working on a public AWS platform or working with Docker containers would make a candidate stand out.', 'For this specific position, you will have a leg up if you also meet the following criteria:', '\xa0', 'Cvent maintains a drug-free workplace', "3+ years of overall development experience which ideally includes working with an object-oriented language (Java, C#)Experience with using and implementing RESTful APIsExperience with one or more of the commonly used javascript libraries and frameworks.Experience with Facebook’s React framework would be a big plus.Experience with one or more of the following databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, Couchbase, MongoDB, Redis or other NoSQL technologiesExperience with automation testing tools like webdriver.io, Karate, Postman, JUnitBachelor's in Computer Science OR related technical discipline. Equivalent experience will also be considered.Any experience working on a public AWS platform or working with Docker containers would make a candidate stand out.", 'Working on Internet-scale applications, where performance, reliability, and scalability, are critical design goals – not after-thoughts.Learning the nuts and bolts of Service-Oriented Architecture (SOA) and building robust RESTful APIs.Creating beautiful, interactive and easy-to-use web applications using modern client-side frameworks and librariesGaining experience with different database technologies, ranging from traditional relational to the latest NoSQL products such as Couchbase and Elastic Search.Creating innovative mobile applications on a wide range of platforms including iOS, Android, and others.', 'At Cvent we celebrate support and are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive environment.\xa0We’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer.\xa0All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, veteran status or any other legally protected characteristics.', 'What You Need For This Position', '3+ years of overall development experience which ideally includes working with an object-oriented language (Java, C#)', 'Experience with automation testing tools like webdriver.io, Karate, Postman, JUnit', 'Creating innovative mobile applications on a wide range of platforms including iOS, Android, and others.', 'Cvent offers a fun, collegial work environment tailored to sharpening your technical skills and growing as a software professional. While we have evolved from startup to mid-sized company, our Technology Team has preserved an entrepreneurial and merit-driven culture where meaningful initiative and contribution are recognized and rewarded.', 'Working on Internet-scale applications, where performance, reliability, and scalability, are critical design goals – not after-thoughts.', 'Experience with Facebook’s React framework would be a big plus.', 'Experience with one or more of the commonly used javascript libraries and frameworks.']

['', 'Experience working with Java, JavaScript, React, HTML, CSS, Relational Database and SQL', 'Support and resources to continue learning, a brilliant team with which to collaborate, and a commitment to your career so you can grow with the company under a management team that has experience building startups into profitable, publicly traded companies.', 'Monthly website/mobile traffic: 27 million+ unique visitor', 'Total closed home sales as of 2018: $85 billion+', 'Homes bought and sold with Redfin as of 2018: 170,000+', 'Skills & Experience\xa0', 'The Search Experience team takes an incredibly complicated home search process and brings it online into an addictive, empowering, and delightful map-based experience. The map is the core of Redfin’s search experience: our users love it and tell us time and time again that it helps them in their home searching journey. The team owns user experience that shows data about hundreds of homes in a performant way, and creates search APIs that are used by all of Redfin Engineering. We want to go further—drive user growth via word of mouth, SEO, and SEM; improve performance; find ways to differentiate and personalize our home search experience in ways no other real estate site can, and much more.', "When you disagree, you disagree constructively, with respect for everyone else's opinions and ideas.", 'More than anything, you share a passion for our mission to radically change the way people make one of the biggest decisions of their lives.', 'Better those around you by driving team efficiency improvements, mentoring teammates to strengthen individual skills and share your learning for building simple and effective user interfaces and API’s', 'The ability to handle ambiguity, communicate well with partner teams, and empathize with customers', "Lead complex multi-person technical projects from initial design to national launch, identifying pitfalls and coaching colleagues along the wayYou are a very hands-on coder and lead by example to demonstrate what software craftsmanship is all about.Better those around you by driving team efficiency improvements, mentoring teammates to strengthen individual skills and share your learning for building simple and effective user interfaces and API’sWhen you disagree, you disagree constructively, with respect for everyone else's opinions and ideas.More than anything, you share a passion for our mission to radically change the way people make one of the biggest decisions of their lives.", 'Lead Real Estate Agents: 1,300+', "You'll see the fruits of your labor shipped every day and you'll share in our joy as we hear back from customers, bloggers, and national media.", 'Redfin is an equal opportunity employer committed to hiring a diverse workforce.', 'Total closed home sales as of 2018: $85 billion+Lead Real Estate Agents: 1,300+Homes bought and sold with Redfin as of 2018: 170,000+Monthly website/mobile traffic: 27 million+ unique visitorMetro area served: 85+ marketsStates served: 42 plus Washington, D.C.', 'The Role', 'Experience working with complex web applications and backend service', '5+ years of industry experience in the area of full-stack development and technical lead', "Support and resources to continue learning, a brilliant team with which to collaborate, and a commitment to your career so you can grow with the company under a management team that has experience building startups into profitable, publicly traded companies.You'll get far more responsibility than at a big company, while at the same time far less stress than you will find in a 2-person garage startup.You'll see the fruits of your labor shipped every day and you'll share in our joy as we hear back from customers, bloggers, and national media.Competitive compensation packages with a salary, bonuses, and restricted stock grants", 'Lead complex multi-person technical projects from initial design to national launch, identifying pitfalls and coaching colleagues along the way', 'As Senior Software Engineer for the Search Experience Team, you will get to use your judgment and guide the team on when to reuse existing Redfin technologies and when to champion the adoption of new ones. You’ll need to balance advocacy for our ambitious long-term technical vision with delivering results amidst our ever-evolving business needs.\xa0', 'Metro area served: 85+ markets', 'What We Offer', 'Redfin facts:', 'States served: 42 plus Washington, D.C.', '5+ years of industry experience in the area of full-stack development and technical leadExperience working with Java, JavaScript, React, HTML, CSS, Relational Database and SQLExperience working with complex web applications and backend serviceExperience working on web and backend service performanceExperience with architectural patterns, API design and building large-scale applicationsThe ability to handle ambiguity, communicate well with partner teams, and empathize with customers', 'Experience working on web and backend service performance', 'Competitive compensation packages with a salary, bonuses, and restricted stock grants', 'You are a very hands-on coder and lead by example to demonstrate what software craftsmanship is all about.', "You'll get far more responsibility than at a big company, while at the same time far less stress than you will find in a 2-person garage startup.", 'Experience with architectural patterns, API design and building large-scale applications', 'Redfin is revolutionizing the $75 billion real estate industry. We use data, beautiful software, and innovative design to put customers first at every step in the home-buying and selling process. Get ready to dive headfirst into our award-winning website and mobile apps, solving complex business problems in a highly visible, customer-centric way. If you value doing great work in a collaborative environment, join our team!']

job_title: Director, Data and Integration Engineering - Remote
job_text: ['', 'Broader experience across IT or across different industries (for external hires) is a must. ', 'License and Certifications - Preferred', 'Strong verbal and written communication skills.', 'May manage vendors.', 'Selects and builds strong teams through formal training, diverse assignments, and coaching, mentoring, and other development techniques.', 'Experience in health care, insurance or related field.', 'Influences changes/enhancements to business processes, policies, and system infrastructure.Manage the selection, evaluation, contracting, and integration of externally available hardware, software, and data to deliver business solutions.Directs and manages though analysis, planning, design, development, testing, installation, and maintenance of support systems for business areas.Selects and builds strong teams through formal training, diverse assignments, and coaching, mentoring, and other development techniques.Manages and develops project cost estimates, benefits and assessment of potential project risks.Manages projects, people, customer expectations, and business priorities to achieve customer satisfaction.Manages budgets, plans and expenses; may have cost center responsibilities.May manage vendors.Shares best practices throughout IT.', 'Work Experience', 'Shares best practices throughout IT.', 'Must have 2+ years of experience leading teams.', 'Manages budgets, plans and expenses; may have cost center responsibilities.', '10+ years of experience in Data and Integration Engineer and leading teams through the development and support of applications. ', 'License And Certifications - Required', 'Manage the selection, evaluation, contracting, and integration of externally available hardware, software, and data to deliver business solutions.', 'General Job Information', 'Critical thinker.', 'Influences changes/enhancements to business processes, policies, and system infrastructure.', 'Other Job Requirements', 'Manages projects, people, customer expectations, and business priorities to achieve customer satisfaction.', 'Ability to coach and build skills within the team.', 'Education', '10+ years of experience in Data and Integration Engineer and leading teams through the development and support of applications. Must have 2+ years of experience leading teams.Broader experience across IT or across different industries (for external hires) is a must. Experience in health care, insurance or related field.Critical thinker.Demonstrated problem solving techniques.Strong verbal and written communication skills.Ability to coach and build skills within the team.', 'Manages and develops project cost estimates, benefits and assessment of potential project risks.', 'Directs and manages though analysis, planning, design, development, testing, installation, and maintenance of support systems for business areas.', 'Demonstrated problem solving techniques.', 'Responsibilities']

['', ' Write clean, stable, and safe code in short time frames and frequent increments.', ' Strong knowledge and experience on source code management systems - like git, github, bit bucket etc.', ' Collaborate with Engineering and Operations teams to improve automation of workflows, infrastructure, code testing and deployment.', ' Establish, maintain, and evolve concepts in continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) pipelines for existing and new services. Write clean, stable, and safe code in short time frames and frequent increments. Collaborate with Engineering and Operations teams to improve automation of workflows, infrastructure, code testing and deployment. Identify systems that can benefit from automation, monitoring and infrastructure-as-code and develop and scale products and services accordingly. Brainstorm new products, updates, and solutions to continuously challenge and improve products, performance, system/data backup, security, and customer experience. Remain up-to-date on industry trends, share knowledge among teams and abide by industry best practices for configuration management and automation.', ' Extensive experience as Site Reliability Engineer/DevOps Engineer on preferably a consumer facing web application platform build using Java, NodeJS Expertise in Unix shell scripting and log aggregation and management tools like Splunk, Sum logic etc. Strong knowledge and experience on dependency, package management and build systems like Maven, Jenkins, NPM, Gradle, Babel, Webpack etc. Strong knowledge and experience on source code management systems - like git, github, bit bucket etc. Strong knowledge and experience on containerizations tools & CICD platforms- Docker, Kubernetes, Spinnaker etc Strong knowledge and experience on cloud platforms - GCP and/or AWS. Good teamwork and collaboration with a go-getter attitude.', ' Extensive experience as Site Reliability Engineer/DevOps Engineer on preferably a consumer facing web application platform build using Java, NodeJS', ' Strong knowledge and experience on dependency, package management and build systems like Maven, Jenkins, NPM, Gradle, Babel, Webpack etc.', ' Strong knowledge and experience on cloud platforms - GCP and/or AWS.', 'What You Bring To The Table', ' Good teamwork and collaboration with a go-getter attitude.', 'Day To Day Summary', ' Remain up-to-date on industry trends, share knowledge among teams and abide by industry best practices for configuration management and automation.', ' Strong knowledge and experience on containerizations tools & CICD platforms- Docker, Kubernetes, Spinnaker etc', ' Establish, maintain, and evolve concepts in continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) pipelines for existing and new services.', ' Identify systems that can benefit from automation, monitoring and infrastructure-as-code and develop and scale products and services accordingly.', ' Expertise in Unix shell scripting and log aggregation and management tools like Splunk, Sum logic etc.', ' Brainstorm new products, updates, and solutions to continuously challenge and improve products, performance, system/data backup, security, and customer experience.']

architectures', 'Description:', 'Enhance the performance and reliability of our current solutions.', 'BA/BS degree in Computer Science, related field, or equivalent experience\xa0Advanced technical Services technologies.\xa0', 'What we look for:\xa0', 'Current and recent experience leveraging REST, and MVC technologies such as AngularJS or ReactJS', 'Angular', 'Your Role:\xa0', 'Knowledge of session management, object-relational mapping is a plus.', 'Technologies we use:', 'BA/BS degree in Computer Science, related field, or equivalent experience\xa0', 'Write readable, maintainable, and efficient code.', '.NetSQL & Cosmos DBAngularAzure Services.\xa0', 'Design and implementation of REST APIs, services, system tasks, and cloud solutions.', '.Net', 'As a Software Engineer, you will work within a collaborative environment that encourages you to perform at your best. You will be challenged to engineer right-sized solutions for complex business problems. You will apply your knowledge of modern software design, best practices, design patterns, and frameworks, with an understanding of application performance and maintainability. You will aspire to use new technologies and challenge yourself to develop innovative solutions. You will be alongside engineers on a team where collaborative programming and mentoring is regularly practiced.\xa0', 'Description:\xa0', 'Be a passionate and flexible engineer, collaborate with your team to achieve and exceed the goal to build, deploy, monitor, and manage a highly performing and highly available production system.', 'Our Software Engineers are energetic influencers who thrive on designing simple and scalable solutions to complex problems and delivering leading-edge software products for our customers. We are looking for the Software Engineer to be an exceptionally ambitious and communicative hands-on individual who is comfortable collaborating within the Agile methodology as part of a cross-functional team. Additionally, the Software Engineer will have experience working in fast-paced environments and have the passion and skills to take our product offerings to the next level.\xa0']

['', 'Implement real time communication tools to connect our customers.Create a fast and responsive work-scheduling application for use in the field.Build an automation platform so our customers can customize their workflow to reduce wasted movement.\xa0Solve advanced mapping and geolocation problems.Build out our public RESTful API.Review junior Engineering team members’ work for accuracy and provide coaching and feedbackPerform other related duties as assigned', 'Experience with our stack: Vue.js, C#, Sql Server, Redis, ElasticSearch, Git', 'Competitive health coverage (medical, dental, vision)', 'Review junior Engineering team members’ work for accuracy and provide coaching and feedback', 'Remote work flexibility', 'Architect, design, develop, deploy and operate services that serve AccuLynx’s thousands of users', 'Smart and gets things done', 'Your Qualifications:', '7-10\xa0years of software development experience', 'Build an automation platform so our customers can customize their workflow to reduce wasted movement.\xa0', 'What might you work on?', 'Implement real time communication tools to connect our customers.', 'Contributions to OSS projects or Stackoverflow.', 'Attractive\xa0compensation packagesRemote work flexibilityFlexible paid time off - 3 weeks off in your first year!Competitive health coverage (medical, dental, vision)Free snacks and drinks401K matching and safe harbor contributions', 'What You Will Do:', 'Create a fast and responsive work-scheduling application for use in the field.', 'Perform other related duties as assigned', 'Collaborate on the design, implementation, testing and review of new features and fixes', 'Excellent written, verbal and interpersonal communication skills', 'AccuLynx’s success as the #1 business management software for roofing contractors over the past 11 years is thanks to us investing in our employees, maintaining company values and focusing on a strong company culture. Our positive work environment has allowed us to retain employees that have been with us since our company’s inception and has provided the solid groundwork for us to develop an industry-leading product while exceeding our customer’s expectations.\xa0Because of our commitment to our company values and culture, we were recently officially recognized as a Great Place to Work Certified™ organization, with 90% of our employees naming AccuLynx as a great place to work.', 'Solve advanced mapping and geolocation problems.', 'Bonus Points If You Have:', '7+ of full-stack web development: frontend, backend and database', 'AccuLynx is actively looking for a smart and passionate\xa0Senior Software Engineer\xa0to join our growing Engineering team! We do not hire based on buzzwords or popular acronyms. We expect you to have mastered at least one language and be eager to master any technology or language in the future. If you want to be part of a collaborative team committed to providing a best-in-class software user experience, please read on!', 'AccuLynx is an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to inclusion and employing a diverse workforce. All applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, veteran status, disability, or other legally protected characteristics.', 'Support Engineering team in delivering well-written, well-tested code to complete new features or address issues in the product', 'Attractive\xa0compensation packages', 'Review code and contribute feedback to improve the quality, readability, and testability of the code base across Engineering', '401K matching and safe harbor contributions', 'Confidence you will make a difference in our product', 'Understanding of HTML5 and mobile responsive development.', 'Position is based in Beloit, WI, and full-time remote work is not an option at this time.\xa0Applicants must be able to work legally within the United States, and we currently do not offer H1B Visa sponsorship.\xa0Please, no 3rd party inquiries.', 'Familiarity with Agile methodologies.', 'Senior Software Engineer', 'Availability for after hours support. We work at a sustainable 40h/week pace but sometimes things go bump in the night.', 'Flexible paid time off - 3 weeks off in your first year!', 'AccuLynx is a fast-growing SaaS provider of CRM/project management software for roofing contractors. With more than 10 years in the business and impressive year-over-year revenue growth, we have quickly established ourselves as the leading software product in this multi-billion dollar industry.', 'Why We Love AccuLynx:', "We’re proud to regularly be recognized for software, product and company culture achievements. Our team’s shared belief in AccuLynx's mission promotes a culture of collaboration, innovation and fun. We have built a benefits program to match the strength of our team. This program includes:", 'Build out our public RESTful API.', "Due to the unprecedented situation of COVID-19, AccuLynx has decided to protect our current and future employees by managing our business remotely. This is inclusive of interviewing, onboarding and each role day-to-day. technical problem solver, working on the most challenging and exciting issues our clients face.Proactively making recommendations to our clients on how to make their people more efficient, the systems customers. Our customers are small to medium sized businesses that require IT support ranging from supplemental support to total IT management.Establishing and maintaining networks, servers, and systems by designing, proactively managing, and troubleshooting network problems.Traveling to local customer sites to provide scheduled network maintenance, address outstanding concerns, and aid with project implementations and consulting when appropriate.Interacting with clients on a daily basis, and effectively communicating with management.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Great opportunity for advancement.', 'We at Simplegrid Technology, believe in becoming an extension of our clients’ business. That begins with our dedication to hire and cultivate the most talented individuals in the industry. Our people are technically exceptional, resourceful and thrive in collaborative environments focused on efficient problem solving. Most importantly – our team members have a common goal of going above and beyond for our clients and coworkers, with a passionate focus on making a positive impact.\xa0We are a group of people that work hard, but also have a lot of fun along the way.\xa0We believe in constantly learning and evolving and giving our best every single day. If this is the sort of culture you look for in an organization, we want you as a part of our team. Team member qualities that contribute to our company culture: sweating the small stuff, obsessing about your reputation, teamwork, attention to detail, professional, personable and balanced, not-weird, excellent communication skills, GIVING, showing that awesome ability to be open to learning new things and respecting the direct relationship between achieving our common goal and the discovery of one’s potential. We pride ourselves on providing cutting edge, comprehensive and informed computer services to our clients and know the only way to make that happen is to cultivate a diverse and talented team focused on that very goal.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Generous bonus levels.', 'Managing on-site and cloud based networks and providing technical support/consulting to an assigned set of customers. Our customers are small to medium sized businesses that require IT support ranging from supplemental support to total IT management.', 'A great understanding of how networks work, and how the various parts of a network (switches, servers, desktops, etc) all interact with each other.\xa0You most likely have a mini lab at home where you play with technology to gain a deep understanding of how networks work.', 'Citrix', 'Leading new implementations of systems, working with the CTO to design new networks using the latest technologies, and then building and migrating clients’ those newly built systems.', 'Traveling to local customer sites to provide scheduled network maintenance, address outstanding concerns, and aid with project implementations and consulting when appropriate.', 'A Bachelors Degree in a related technology curriculum.', 'All-star verbal and written communication skills', 'Only local candidates need apply.', 'Working with the CTO as his right-hand man, helping with designing of new technical standards, security guidelines and working to make existing processes more efficient.']

job_title: Lead Big Data Engineer in PE environment
job_text: ['', '8+ years of experience in Hadoop ecosystem using GCP. Strong expertise in Hadoop, HDFS, MapReduce, Hive, Spark-core, Spark-SQL, Spark-Streaming, Kafka, BigQuery, Bigtable, etcKnowledge of Hadoop architecture and various components such as HDFS, Job Tracker, Task Tracker, Name Node, Data Node and Map Reduce programming paradigm.Experienced in handling different file formats like Text file, Avro data files, Sequence files, Xml and Json files.Need to be expert in Core data structure as well as algorithm and has ability to implement them using Java /Python programming languages.Must have experience in production support and ready to do PE role.Functional knowledge in Retail Campaign Management would be ideal for this role.Experience in working with teams spread across the globe', 'Description:', 'Experienced in handling different file formats like Text file, Avro data files, Sequence files, Xml and Json files.', 'Job Type: Long Contract/ Full time', 'Experience in working with teams spread across the globe', 'Job Locations: Milpitas, CA', 'Need to be expert in Core data structure as well as algorithm and has ability to implement them using Java /Python programming languages.', 'Knowledge of Hadoop architecture and various components such as HDFS, Job Tracker, Task Tracker, Name Node, Data Node and Map Reduce programming paradigm.', 'Strong expertise in Hadoop, HDFS, MapReduce, Hive, Spark-core, Spark-SQL, Spark-Streaming, Kafka, BigQuery, Bigtable, etc', 'Functional knowledge in Retail Campaign Management would be ideal for this role.', '\xa0', 'Must have experience in production support and ready to do PE role.', 'About GSPANN', 'Or connect on social media platforms: LinkedIn, Twitter and Facebook.', 'To know more about GSPANN, visit our website www.gspann.com', '8+ years of experience in Hadoop ecosystem using GCP. ', 'Job Title: Lead Big Data Engineer in PE environment', 'We work in an exploding market of retail and e-commerce. We have served as a trusted business partner for some of the world’s most respected brands. We’ve worked with more than 200 organizations and have served as a trusted business partner for some of the world’s most respected brands. Our solutions have the businesses create custom-designed technology platforms, which have transformed the way our clients connect with their employees, partners, and customers. GSPANN is headquartered in Milpitas, CA with satellite offices around the world.']

', ' Clear ability to translate architectural concepts into concrete system designs to address product and business needs, and able to lead the execution of key initiatives for the team. Document technology decisions and implementations, and support epic and story refinement. ', ' EMPOWER OTHERS: Interact extensively across all functional teams within Twilio and encourage collaborative solutions. ', 'About Us', '  WRITE IT DOWN: Communicate effectively and distill complex thoughts and concepts to technical and non-technical audiences including but not limited to group and team leadership, product managers and engineering peers. Document technology decisions and implementations, and support epic and story refinement.   DRAW THE OWL: Identify opportunities for improvement across both technology and process. BE INCLUSIVE: Collaborate to support strong team results and build effective working relationships. Be an expert to mentor, teach and lead while championing engineering best practices.   RUTHLESSLY PRIORITIZE: Exhibit good priority and time management skills to support sprint commitments.   BE AN OWNER & BE BOLD: Lead or assist in all aspects of technology decisions, including strategy, efficiencies, open source offerings, and integration details. Champion meticulous, high quality engineering and be a role model for software development habits and practices for distributed systems.   EMPOWER OTHERS: Interact extensively across all functional teams within Twilio and encourage collaborative solutions.   NO SHENANIGANS: Ensure the consistent exercise of appropriate judgment and transparency in all your communications and interactions. Use your advanced engineering, communication and organizational skills to ensure we deliver what the business wants and needs.  ', ' Proficiencies with MySQL, Redis and Kafka. DynamoDB a plus. ', ' BE AN OWNER & BE BOLD: Lead or assist in all aspects of technology decisions, including strategy, efficiencies, open source offerings, and integration details. Clear ability to translate architectural concepts into concrete system designs to address product and business needs, and able to lead the execution of key initiatives for the team. Experience working with Docker and Kubernetes.   Knowledge of AWS or other cloud computing services is a plus. ['', 'Ability to work independently and as part of a team.', 'ePropelled is looking for a skilled “hands on” senior software engineer with experience in the design of motor controllers for its line of high efficiency brushless motor/generators for use in a variety of applications. The ideal candidate will have successful experience taking high power motor controller design projects from concept to manufacturing. Familiarity with a variety of software simulation tools is also desired.', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer or Electrical Engineering.', 'Experience with RS232, RS485, CAN bus, ModBus, USB interfaces, Ethernet and I2C interfaces as well as Wi-Fi and Bluetooth.', 'Develop firmware/software for embedded processors and DSP based motor controller/power system to support required features.', 'Experience in C/C++ and assembly language for microprocessors and DSPs', 'Must be organized and have methodical approach to problem solving.', 'Create technical documentation, i.e. concept documents, system functional and design specifications, technical specifications and test reports for all designs.', 'Experience with sensor based control desired', 'Experience with software build tools, version control and scripting languages', 'Experience in design of SW architecture, user interfaces, and documentation for embedded controllers', 'Implement software based digital filtering for sensor monitoring', 'Experience with digital devices microprocessors, DSPs, memory devices, OPAMPs, A/D and D/A converters.', 'Strong oral and written communication skills', 'Responsibilities\xa0:', 'Expert knowledge of Sensor-less torque control and closed loop position control', 'Implement motor control firmware based on sensor-less FOC principles. Understand and create control methods and algorithms for controlling Brushless motors and their systems.', 'Experience with a variety of sensors i.e. thermal, current, voltage etc.', 'Qualifications\xa0:', 'Develop control models in Matlab/Simulink.', 'Minimum of five (5) years of experience in design and implementation of control algorithms for power conversion circuits, active converters or motor control', 'ePropelled is the leader in magnetic engineering innovations that dramatically improve electric motor and generator efficiency for propulsion applications such as aviation, aerospace and electric vehicles.', 'Develop motor control software design concepts in support of system requirements.Create technical documentation, i.e. concept documents, system functional and design specifications, technical specifications and test reports for all designs.Develop firmware/software for embedded processors and DSP based motor controller/power system to support required features.Implement motor control firmware based on sensor-less FOC principles. Understand and create control methods and algorithms for controlling Brushless motors and their systems.Expert knowledge of Sensor-less torque control and closed loop position controlExperience with sensor based control desiredImplement software based digital filtering for sensor monitoringDevelop control models in Matlab/Simulink.', 'Develop motor control software design concepts in support of system requirements.', 'Knowledge of MATLAB Simulink for controls development', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer or Electrical Engineering.Minimum of five (5) years of experience in design and implementation of control algorithms for power conversion circuits, active converters or motor controlExperience with digital devices microprocessors, DSPs, memory devices, OPAMPs, A/D and D/A converters.Experience with RS232, RS485, CAN bus, ModBus, USB interfaces, Ethernet and I2C interfaces as well as Wi-Fi and Bluetooth.Experience with a variety of sensors i.e. thermal, current, voltage etc.Experience in C/C++ and assembly language for microprocessors and DSPsExperience in using SW debugging tools, emulatorsExperience in design of SW architecture, user interfaces, and documentation for embedded controllersExperience with software build tools, version control and scripting languagesKnowledge of MATLAB Simulink for controls developmentMust be organized and have methodical approach to problem solving.Strong oral and written communication skillsAbility to work independently and as part of a team.', 'Experience in using SW debugging tools, emulators']

Candidates submitted or presented by Employment / Recruitment Agents without a fully executed contract or submitted through this site shall not be deemed to form part of any Engagement for which the Agency may claim remuneration. ', 'OBJECTIVES ', 'Experience in monitoring metrics on EC2, EBS, Elastic Load Balancer, CloudWatch, and backup services such as EBS snapshots and S3 backups', 'Architect technology solutions and platform with emphasis on AWS services meeting business future requirements and strategic goals. Develop solutions architecture and blueprints for different projects utilizing technologies in compliance with Enterprise Architecture standards adhering to strong architecture principles. ', 'Experience in virtualization and container technologies such as Docker containers, source code repository and versioning tools such as GitHub, and managing AWS infrastructure using CloudFormation.', 'A broad familiarity and understanding of overall IT landscape and ecosystem including but not limited to web, mobile, front office, middleware, back office systems. Familiarity with AWS services, agile methodology, JIRA process, CI/CD, and release management.', 'Responsible for defining and reviewing various artifacts within the Enterprise framework such as Project Initiation Document and Project Deployment Document which are critical for Enterprise project approval.', 'AWS DevOps Engineer or Architect Certification preferred', 'Understanding the Software Development Life-cycle (SDLC) and different automation tools required to develop digital pipelines. Work in collaboration with other Enterprise IT teams and developers to deploy and monitor the code releases.', 'Education, Behavioural Competencies And Skills', 'Collaborate with business stakeholders and technology teams to ensure the solution architecture is aligned with enterprise principles meeting business requirements.Must have the ability to analyze current state and architect future state ecosystem/solutions based on business strategies and requirements.Responsible for defining and reviewing various artifacts within the Enterprise framework such as Project Initiation Document and Project Deployment Document which are critical for Enterprise project approval.Collaborate with other Enterprise Architects to understand technology standards and enterprise architecture vision as well as articulate and defend proposed solution at the Architecture Review Board.Expertise in the design, development and deployment of enterprise-grade architecture that will include AWS cloud services, system integration, network, database, security framework, emerging technologies, and analytics; compliance with design patterns and asset reuse principles.Understanding the Software Development Life-cycle (SDLC) and different automation tools required to develop digital pipelines. services into readiness.Provide different levels of architecture support including conceptual design, solutions architecture, high-level design (HLD), infrastructure architecture support throughout components using AWS CloudFormation templates.', 'Performing design reviews and provide oversights for system implementation and deployment.', 'Serving as the AWS SME and/or system administrators with the ability to code and script AWS services into readiness.', 'Excellent verbal and written communication required.', 'Provide different levels of architecture support including conceptual design, solutions architecture, high-level design (HLD), infrastructure architecture support throughout the SDLC.', 'Ensuring that all application meta-data and business capabilities that they support are maintained in the Enterprise Asset Management System.', 'Notice to Employment / Recruitment Agents ', 'Expertise in the design, development and deployment of enterprise-grade architecture that will include AWS cloud services, system integration, network, database, security framework, emerging technologies, and analytics; compliance with design patterns and asset reuse principles.', 'Leverage different technologies and industry solutions with the ability to decompose system into functional units, architecture building blocks, and design blueprints. ', 'ACCOUNTABILITIES ', 'Provide hands-on support for product teams ensuring a successful project implementation based on the planned architecture as well as technologies, platforms, and services readiness.', 'Providing technical leadership to the application development team.', 'Collaborate with other Enterprise Architects to understand technology standards and enterprise architecture vision as well as articulate and defend proposed solution at the Architecture Review Board.', 'The System Architect will interact with Enterprise Architecture, Cloud CoE, Enterprise Data, network, security, and infrastructure teams ensuring solutions are properly aligned, executed, and deployed meeting business SLAs and DR expectations with minimum service interruption.', "Bachelor's Degree and at least 3 years of experience in an IT, Engineering and/or Architecture role.AWS DevOps Engineer or Architect Certification preferredExperience in deploying and provisioning new cloud resources and managing implementation as well as automating infrastructure components using AWS CloudFormation templates.Experience in virtualization and container technologies such as Docker containers, source code repository and versioning tools such as GitHub, and managing AWS infrastructure using CloudFormation.Experience in monitoring metrics on EC2, EBS, Elastic Load Balancer, CloudWatch, and backup services such as EBS snapshots and S3 backupsExperience in developing contextual, conceptual, solutions architecture, data flows diagram, and database design including graph technology.A broad familiarity and understanding of overall IT landscape and ecosystem including but not limited to web, mobile, front office, middleware, back office systems. Familiarity with AWS services, agile methodology, JIRA process, CI/CD, and release management.Software skills and experience with AWS tooling such as Lambda, S3, RDS, SQS, Step Functions, DMS, RDS, Databricks, etc., as well as microservices, Microsoft technologies, .NET Framework/C#, J2EE, nodejs, MuleSoft, Informatica, etc. preferred.Excellent verbal and written communication required.", 'Architect technology solutions and platform with emphasis on AWS services meeting business future requirements and strategic goals. Develop solutions architecture and blueprints for different projects utilizing technologies in compliance with Enterprise Architecture standards adhering to strong architecture principles. Leverage different technologies and industry solutions with the ability to decompose system into functional units, architecture building blocks, and design blueprints. The System Architect will interact with Enterprise Architecture, Cloud CoE, Enterprise Data, network, security, and infrastructure teams ensuring solutions are properly aligned, executed, and deployed meeting business SLAs and DR expectations with minimum service interruption.Provide hands-on support for product teams ensuring a successful project implementation based on the planned architecture as well as technologies, platforms, and services readiness.', 'Experience in developing contextual, conceptual, solutions architecture, data flows diagram, and database design including graph technology.', 'Must have the ability to analyze current state and architect future state ecosystem/solutions based on business strategies and requirements.', 'Ability to learn new technologies, identify potential use cases, develop quick prototypes.', 'Collaborate with business stakeholders and technology teams to ensure the solution architecture is aligned with enterprise principles meeting business requirements.']

['', 'Schedule:* Full-time', ' Knowledge of Linux device driver and application development.', 'Req ID:* 314180', ' Knowledge of Oscilloscope/Logic Analyzer.', '_ _**', ' Work closely with the production floor to gain valuable feedback from actual systems shipping to customers. Software developers are integral to the troubleshooting process and work with test engineers to resolve bugs.', ' Fix and maintain embedded code written in C.', ' Knowledge of device drivers, BSPs and real time OS concepts.', ' Program in Perl, C#, LabView, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, etc, in addition to the majority of the development which is in C.', ' Master’s degree.', ' Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, etc.', ' Experience with Web programming including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSON, AJAX,CGI.', ' Experience in real time environments along with some web development experience.', ' Scripting in Python or Perl.', 'Recruiter:* Michael Bodner', ' Minimum 1+ years of strong embedded software experience.', ' Experience developing software applications in C & C++ in a real time environment.', "Cobham** is one of the world's leading companies engaged in the development, delivery and support of leading-edge aerospace and defense systems in the air, on land and at sea. Our clients and partners trust **Cobham** to deliver the mission-critical technology they need, and we trust our employees to draw on their ingenuity and passion to deliver those solutions. This leads to an empowering culture for our people. Our Leadership team is open, sharing plans for the next five years, driving retention by offering demanding, exciting work, and providing full guidance and mentoring.", 'Job Posting:* 05-Jun-2020, 9:30:37 AM', ' This position requires access to technology, materials, software or hardware that is controlled by export laws of the US. In order to be eligible you must be either a US Citizen or Permanent Resident', ' Software work on SeaTel products is full of engaging challenges as the product line allows for many different customer variations. Time is spent making the code re-usable and flexible for the next challenge.', ' Experience utilizing popular development tools including Bugzilla and Subversion.', ' Working knowledge of VSAT technology and communication.', ' Support bare metal drivers at the chip level and complicated protocol requirements.', 'Cobham** is seeking an **Embedded Software Engineer** that will work with a small dedicated group of other software engineers to bring to life a systems responsible for providing internet and television connectivity to the maritime community. This position is located in Concord, CA.', 'Primary Location:* US-California-Concord', ' Knowledge of SMX RTOS desired.', ' Working knowledge of VSAT technology and communication beneficial.', ' Develop and document code for use on a three axis stabilized antennas. The antennas range in size from 0.6 meters to 4.3 meters. Software is used to stabilize the antenna, identify the target, control the RF radio mounted to the antenna, and interface with the modems to ensure connectivity.', ' Work closely with the electrical engineers, test engineers, system engineers, and production engineers to realize challenging requirements.', ' Experience with Windows programming.', ' Fulfill the critical role of implementing the new features that our customers demand.', ' Knowledge of PID and control system concepts.', ' Knowledge of TCP/IP, multithreading, SPI, I2C, GPIO, Serial, USB and CAN bus.', 'Job Category:* Engineering', 'Organization:* CCC - SATCOM', '_Cobham is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer and embraces diversity in our employee population. It is the policy of Cobham to provide equal opportunity to all qualified applicants and employees without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, protected veteran status, or genetic information. Cobham will refrain from discharging, or otherwise discriminating against, employees or applicants who inquire about, discuss, or disclose their compensation or the compensation of other employees or applicants._**', "Cobham's** values of Trust, Talent and Technology have driven us from our launch in 1934 by Sir Alan Cobham, an aviation innovator, to becoming a global leader in state-of-the-art aerospace and defense systems. And it’s the insights of our innovators today that will secure our collective future. Innovators like you."]

['MSc degree in rigorous quantitative science (such as mathematics, computer science, engineering)Extensive hands-on experience applying data science tools in practice.Practical software development skills in standard data science tools (such as R or python)Extensive knowledge of mathematical modelling and statistical modelling techniques, and drive to continue to learn and develop these skills.Communication, business analysis, and consultancy.Minimum 5+ years of work experience', 'Practical software development skills in standard data science tools (such as R or python)', 'Collaborate in a multidisciplinary environment with world leading clinicians, data scientists, biological experts, statisticians and IT professionals.', 'Leads small (2-3 person) data science projects of defined scope.', 'Extensive knowledge of mathematical modelling and statistical modelling techniques, and drive to continue to learn and develop these skills.', 'Education, Qualifications, Skills and Experience', 'Provides advanced quantitative expertise to AstraZeneca projects and researches and recommends appropriate data science solutions, appropriately communicating with a range of stakeholders.', 'PhD degree in rigorous quantitative science (such as mathematics, computer science, engineering).', 'In-depth experience of working in a global organization with complex/geographical context', 'Works within established frameworks to deliver a variety of tasks that support projects in meeting their objectives.', 'Coaches/mentors junior data scientists and others to drive the development of data science as an AZ capability.', 'As a Principal Data Scientist you will play a key role on the front line in this rapidly growing team working to extract insight from complex biomedical data. You will apply and develop your leadership skills and your expertise in rigorous quantitative data science to provide solutions to a variety of data science problems, researching, recommending and delivering novel methodologies to solve the problems that matter to the oncology pipeline.', "Examples of projects the team works on include machine learning models for developing digital biomarkers, patient risk stratification for clinical trials, new algorithms for survival analysis, approaches to quantitatively analyse wearable data, linking of medical imaging data with 'omics and longitudinal outcomes to identify and/or validate new drug targets, and much more!", 'Essential', 'Communication, business analysis, and consultancy.', 'Job Description / Capsule', 'Experience within the pharmaceutical industry.', 'Principal Data Scientist', 'Reviews working practices and ensures non-compliant processes are escalated.', 'Develops novel data science solutions where off-the-shelf methodologies do not fit.', ' ', 'Independently keeps own knowledge up to date and learns from senior team members, proposing appropriate training courses for personal development.', 'PhD degree in rigorous quantitative science (such as mathematics, computer science, engineering).Experience within the pharmaceutical industry.In-depth experience of working in a global organization with complex/geographical context', 'Oncology Data Science & Analytics', "The Machine Learning and AI team in AstraZeneca's Oncology Data Science & Analytics group is where we develop and apply sophisticated algorithms and techniques to solve the hardest problems in oncology drug discovery and development. The team uses their scientific, quantitative, and problem-solving skills to work on a broad range of challenges across the whole oncology portfolio, working collaboratively with other scientists across a range of disciplines to scope, define, and deliver projects that both advance the state of the art in data science and accelerate the delivery of innovative medicines to patients.", 'Desirable', 'Ensures own work is compliant within Clinical Development.', 'MSc degree in rigorous quantitative science (such as mathematics, computer science, engineering)', 'Typical Accountabilities', 'Machine Learning and AI', 'Minimum 5+ years of work experience', 'Provides advanced quantitative expertise to AstraZeneca projects and researches and recommends appropriate data science solutions, appropriately communicating with a range of stakeholders.Develops novel data science solutions where off-the-shelf methodologies do not fit.Leads small (2-3 person) data science projects of defined scope.Independently keeps own knowledge up to date and learns from senior team members, proposing appropriate training courses for personal development.Coaches/mentors junior data scientists and others to drive the development of data science as an AZ capability.Works within established frameworks to deliver a variety of tasks that support projects in meeting their objectives.Reviews working practices and ensures non-compliant processes are escalated.Ensures own work is compliant within Clinical Development.Collaborate in a multidisciplinary environment with world leading clinicians, data scientists, biological experts, statisticians and IT professionals.', 'Extensive hands-on experience applying data science tools in practice.']

job_text: ['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Take on Architecture and Design assignments by working with the Manager or Architect', '3+ years of working with systems deployed to Linux servers', 'REMOTE', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Contribute to the continual improvement of the product and development processes', '7-10 years of designing and developing applications using Java', 'Experience working in\xa0an Agile environment with frequent release cycles', 'Experience with continuous deployment and automated testing', 'Experience using Spring', 'ExamSoft is seeking a talented and driven Senior Software Engineer. ', 'Ability to plan well and execute with high quality level', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Participate in software development process following Agile/Scrum methodology', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Participate in code reviews and other techniques to improve code quality', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or Engineering', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Assist with building automated tests', 'ExamSoft is seeking a talented and driven Senior Software Engineer. This person is\xa0attentive to detail, driven to problem solve, and adaptive to new technologies and best practices.\xa0The Senior Software Engineer must be able to\xa0work effectively and efficiently with a variety of members within the organization to achieve roadmap deliverables.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Deliver multiple commits where possible each day and be able to context switch effectively', '3+ years of writing unit tests with JUnit or a comparable framework.', 'NO SPONSORSHIP AVAILABLE', 'ExamSoft offers a market-leading assessment-management solution that supports the entire testing process, including exam creation, administration, delivery, scoring, and analysis.
