['', 'Design, develop and enhance presentation mobile platform frameworks and components for mobile gaming ', 'Strong Object Oriented programming skills ', 'The roots of our company are simple and strong: Our founder fell head over heels for casino games and had a vision to create the most entertaining free-to-play casino games for gamers around the world. We’ve grown into a company that makes games we are truly proud of and that are enjoyed by millions of players every day. Our history is extensive, but we’re just getting started. In 1998, we got our start as Phantom EFX and in 2019, we reintroduced ourselves as SciPlay and went public on the Nasdaq. ', 'Follow quality engineering processes to deliver high quality products and services ', 'Education:', 'Ability to prioritize tasks ', 'Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Ability to prioritize tasks Casual games development experience ', 'Essential Job Functions: ', 'Competitive salaries and annual bonuses alongside matching 401k, employee stock options, and other competitive benefits. ', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Math, Statistics or relevant area or equivalent experience ', 'Knowledge, Skills, & Abilities: ', 'We are SciPlay! We make games!', ' SciPlay currently offers seven core games, including social casino games Jackpot Party Casino, Gold Fish Casino, Hot Shot Casino and Quick Hit Slots, and casual games MONOPOLY Slots, Bingo Showdown and 88 Fortunes Slots with offices all over the world! ', 'Required Experience:', 'We are SciPlay! We make games! ', 'Identify potential solutions and liaise with Development teams to determine technical feasibility and level-of-effort to implement ', 'Participate in relevant Project meetings ', 'Fully stocked kitchen ', 'SciPlay is a leading developer and publisher of digital games on mobile and web platforms, providing highly entertaining free-to-play games that millions of people play every day for their authenticity, engagement and fun. ', 'Qualifications:', 'Fully stocked gameroom featuring current generation consoles and titles, shuffle board tables, foosball tables, and arcade cabinets (including our prized 5v5 cabinet ultra-rare copy of Killer Queen!) ', 'Brand new, shiny, and aesthetically pleasing 10,000 sq ft office located in the Arboretum area in Austin ', 'Knowledge of Unity 5+ years of software experience1+ years of experience in cross-platform software architecture Strong Object Oriented programming skills ', 'Education: ', 'Strong commitment to work life balance ', 'Knowledge of Unity ', ' ', 'Estimate engineering effort, prioritize projects, plan implementations, and help roll out system changes ', 'SciPlay Corporation and its affiliates (collectively, SciPlay) are committed to creating a workforce of credibility and dependability. As a prerequisite to employment with SciPlay (to the extent permitted by law), you shall be asked to consent to SciPlay conducting a due diligence/background investigation on you. This job description should not be interpreted as all-inclusive; it is intended to identify major responsibilities and requirements of the job. The employee in this position may be requested to perform other job-related tasks and responsibilities than those stated above. If you’d like more information about your equal employment opportunity rights as an applicant under the law, please click here ', 'Casual games development experience ', 'At SciPlay, we are programmed to think untraditionally. We believe that if we continue to stay passionate, set ambitious goals, live our values and play together, we will become the #1 social casino and casual gaming company in the world. When you join BlueWave, you join a collaborative team doing all that we can to be transparent, sustainable, and inclusive as we fight for our shared vision of protecting the planet. ', 'The BlueWave Solar Technology team is seeking an experienced Salesforce Software Engineer to join the team and be part of our mission to build an industry-leading platform that allows customers to switch to clean, local energy sources. They should also be capable of leading other members of the team on best practices around application development. As a Sr Solutions Engineer/Architect you will be responsible to define and execute a roadmap of certifications, reference architectures, automations/workflows, sales collateral and best practices. You will also drive to create technical presentations for customers, field and partner use. In addition, you will prepare and conduct all aspects of system demonstrations including independently setting up developmental equipment, operating/trouble-shooting the system and presenting its values to customers and partners. ', 'Pavilion Data Systems is the leader in the third wave of storage, delivering unmatched performance, density, and ultra-low latency at scale, without the cost and complexity of traditional storage. Pavilion enables global customers to shatter expectations today, tomorrow, and beyond by deploying storage solutions that scale linearly utilizing NVMe and NVMe-oF technology. Customers include Sony Innovation Studios, CBS Netherlands, Federal Government. ', '• Plan and develop technical collateral to highlight best practices resulting from functional and performance testing. This includes developing architecture white papers, solution design guides, integration guides, and reference architectures. This analysis will also include determining the ideal method for simulating and testing the product/solution in a "real environment". Significant experience in server, network and storage areas and testing is desirable. ', '• Strong customer-facing and relationship building skills at the executive level ', '• Highly proficient in Linux, Windows, VMWare environments • Oral and written communication skills with ability to communicate to technical teams as well as to business users and executives ', "• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent with at least 5+ years as a Solutions Engineer/Technical Marketing Engineer. ", 'This individual will be significantly involved in characterizing performance requirements across a wide range of workloads spanning from industry standard benchmarks to specific applications. You will also work with established and potential business development partners on interoperability testing, and product evangelism. ', '• Lead all aspects of system validation and customer implementations to ensure successful deployment. Provide subject matter expertise in validation exercises and guide Sales, Customer Success and Product teams. ', '• Technical expertise or working knowledge with parallel filesystems like BeeGFS, Lustre & Spectrum Scale ', '• Support business development through technical writing for RFIs and RFPs. ', '• Proven Track record of designing complex storage solutions for customers. ']

Expose data and tools to internal teams through APIs and libraries Account for quality and security as you build ', 'You have got grit and recognize that the harder things in life are more rewarding ', 'Bonus Points for Deep understanding and experience developing in the JVM', 'The Role', 'Responsibilities: ', '5+ years of experience in Data Engineering or Software Engineering ', 'Experience with one or more distributed computing frameworks, such as Spark ', ' ', 'Always be learning and teaching ', 'Design, build, test and deploy massively parallel graph algorithms ', 'You are a senior software engineer with a solid mathematical foundation and experience building and launching highly-scalable algorithms. ', 'Research, Design, Implement, Test, and Maintain new identity resolution and matching algorithms ', 'Work on the Identity Resolution team as Principal Algorithm Engineer to design and construct performant algorithms, infrastructure and data pipelines to manage our graph database for our identity resolution offering. Our identity graph is constructed from billions of observations leveraging the latest in big data technologies. The Identity Resolution team is primarily focused on providing identity resolution capabilities to our internal customers enabling identity resolution across the board for our external customers. This involves integrating data sets, developing our patented identity resolution graph algorithms and scaling all this to a very large amount of data. The team works on both live streaming and batch systems and leverages machine learning so that we can be the best in class for enterprise identity resolution. ', 'Bonus Points for Machine Learning and Graph Theory experience ', 'Solid Linux experience - CLI tools, scripting ', '\xa0 ', 'Responsibilities:', 'Account for quality and security as you build ', 'Requirements:']

As a market-leading provider of cyber security solutions, Optiv has the most comprehensive ecosystem of security products and partners to deliver unparalleled services. Our rich and successful history with our clients is based on trust, serving more than 12,000 clients of varying sizes and industries, including commercial, government and education. Optiv remains committed to championing Diversity, Equality and Inclusion within our organization and throughout the industry.With Optiv You Can Expect Work/life balance. The ability and technology necessary to productively work remote/from home (where applicable).Optiv is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants for employment will be considered without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, status as an individual with a disability, veteran status, or any other basis protected by federal, state, or local law.']

job_title: Sr. Full Stack Software Engineer, LIMS
job_text: ['', 'Previous experience leading and managing projects', 'Competitive salary', 'Own projects end-to-end, from initial design, to prototype, to large-scale rollout.', 'Write and test clean, scalable code that solves problems for today and tomorrow', 'Experience with cloud-based microservice architectures and design', 'Fully stocked kitchen and snacks', 'Synthego moves fast. New technologies, instruments, workflows, and optimizations are constantly introduced onto the factory floor, fueling our ever-growing pursuit of cutting-edge products. Consequently, our LIMS team must also move fast. As Synthego’s brain, LIMS must properly model, track, and illuminate everything that happens in our factory, empowering production to maintain their high level of operational excellence.', "What You'll Do", 'Previous experience in the Biotech or Factory Systems domainExperience working with React, Redux, gRPCPrevious experience leading and managing projects', 'Previous experience in the Biotech or Factory Systems domain', 'Robust medical, dental and vision benefits, 401k Plan', 'About You', 'Experience working with Python and Django', 'BS in CS/EE and 5+ years industry engineering experience', 'Nice to Haves', 'Experience working with React, Redux, gRPC', 'Competitive salaryGenerous equity at an early stage companyRobust medical, dental and vision benefits, 401k PlanDaily Shuttle bus to & from San Francisco (more locations to come)Fully stocked kitchen and snacksFree catered lunches and dinners', '\xa0', 'Collaborate with engineers and scientists across the organization to define, design and ship new features', 'Daily Shuttle bus to & from San Francisco (more locations to come)', 'Company Benefits & Perks', 'Generous equity at an early stage company', 'Free catered lunches and dinners', 'Design and implement backend data models and APIs to represent complex lab processes.', 'Build solutions on our web applications that enable new capabilities and improve quality, efficiency and automation in Synthego’s production laboratoriesOwn projects end-to-end, from initial design, to prototype, to large-scale rollout.Design and implement backend data models and APIs to represent complex lab processes.Collaborate with engineers and scientists across the organization to define, design and ship new featuresWrite and test clean, scalable code that solves problems for today and tomorrowMentor junior engineers on the team and lead by example, encouraging software development best practices', 'Strong desire to work in a fast-paced, collaborative start-up environment', 'Build solutions on our web applications that enable new capabilities and improve quality, efficiency and automation in Synthego’s production laboratories', 'Synthego is transforming scientists into designers with the first fully automated molecular biology lab. Lab automation is no cakewalk, though. Any given order moves through dozens of instruments, and our factory can manage throughput in the thousands. To orchestrate the chaos, our Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) sits as manager of all scientists and instruments. LIMS both juggles the task of coordinating all factory systems and analyzing the resulting instrument data generated.\xa0', 'BS in CS/EE and 5+ years industry engineering experienceExperience working with Python and DjangoExperience with cloud-based microservice architectures and designStrong desire to work in a fast-paced, collaborative start-up environment', 'Mentor junior engineers on the team and lead by example, encouraging software development best practices']

['', 'Description', 'You will participate in small, but connected Agile development teamsYou will design, build and maintain the Java web services which comprise the ItemSense backend', "You've worked with distributed queuing systems such as RabbitMQ", 'It Will Be Great If You Have The Following', "What You'll Need To Be Successful In This Role", 'Full understand software development release cycles and experience breaking down work tasks and providing predictable work estimates.', 'You will need serious CS chopsYou should have 7+ years’ experience developing software in an object-oriented language such as Java, C++ or C#.Full understand software development release cycles and experience breaking down work tasks and providing predictable work estimates.You have a passion for metrics and data driven engineering', 'Fundamentals of Java 8 functional APIs', "What You'll Do Every Single Day", 'Understanding of a variety of data stores such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis or Elasticsearch', 'You will participate in small, but connected Agile development teams', 'You should have 7+ years’ experience developing software in an object-oriented language such as Java, C++ or C#.', 'You have a passion for metrics and data driven engineering', 'You will need serious CS chops', "Crafting and building REST web services is your forteFundamentals of Java 8 functional APIsYou're familiar with frameworks such as Spring, Jersey or DropwizardYou've worked with distributed queuing systems such as RabbitMQUnderstanding of a variety of data stores such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis or ElasticsearchExperience with embedded development", "You're familiar with frameworks such as Spring, Jersey or Dropwizard", 'Crafting and building REST web services is your forte', 'Experience with embedded development', 'You will design, build and maintain the Java web services which comprise the ItemSense backend']

job_title: Senior/Principal Software Engineer - Roblox Cloud Services - Interface
job_text: ['', 'A coding champion: your prowess in a multitude of programming languages such as Go, Node.js, Python, Java, empower your understanding of the challenges of building large-scale systems.', 'Develop and deliver groundbreaking tools and API solutions that enable our teams and systems to scale to meet the large scale and real-time requirements of our Imagination Platform™ and ultimately ensure our community has an awesome experience anywhere in the world.', 'Develop and share best practices with development teams to improve the scalability and reliability of the Imagination Platform™', 'A Roblox Admin badge for your avatar', 'Experienced: you have a BS degree (or equivalent professional experience) in Computer Science or related engineering field with at least 5 years of hands on experience.', 'Flexible vacation policy', 'Onsite fitness center and fitness program credit', ' Develop and deliver groundbreaking tools and API solutions that enable our teams and systems to scale to meet the large scale and real-time requirements of our Imagination Platform™ and ultimately ensure our community has an awesome experience anywhere in the world. Identify and solve critical problems and prevent them from reoccurring via root cause analysis and automation. Create, influence, and improve the development platform, infrastructure, standards, and methods to ensure our goals of scalability and high availability. Develop and share best practices with development teams to improve the scalability and reliability of the Imagination Platform™ ', 'You will:', 'Adaptable: ', 'You Are', 'WHY ROBLOX?', 'Adventurous', 'Roblox – Powering Imagination.', 'A rewarding 401k program', 'Identify and solve critical problems and prevent them from reoccurring via root cause analysis and automation.', 'Passionate about microservices, API’s, and automation: you love building API’s that enable people and computers to do more with less effort.', 'Free catered lunches five times a week and several fully stocked kitchens with unlimited snacks', 'Passionate about microservices, API’s, and automation: ', 'Adventurous: you boldly go where no human has gone before; GraphQL, Docker, Hashistack, Traefik, Hubot, InfluxDB etc. might not be technologies you’ve used, but you are keen to learn and grow.', 'Experienced:', 'Adaptable: you are capable of adjusting to new challenges, and experimentation is in your blood.', 'Create, influence, and improve the development platform, infrastructure, standards, and methods to ensure our goals of scalability and high availability.', ' Experienced: you have a BS degree (or equivalent professional experience) in Computer Science or related engineering field with at least 5 years of hands on experience. A coding champion: your prowess in a multitude of programming languages such as Go, Node.js, Python, Java, empower your understanding of the challenges of building large-scale systems. Passionate about microservices, API’s, and automation: you love building API’s that enable people and computers to do more with less effort. Adventurous: you boldly go where no human has gone before; GraphQL, Docker, Hashistack, Traefik, Hubot, InfluxDB etc. might not be technologies you’ve used, but you are keen to learn and grow. Adaptable: you are capable of adjusting to new challenges, and experimentation is in your blood. ', 'Annual CalTrain Go Pass', 'Excellent medical, dental, and vision coverage', 'A coding champion:', "You'll Love", ' Excellent medical, dental, and vision coverage A rewarding 401k program Flexible vacation policy Free catered lunches five times a week and several fully stocked kitchens with unlimited snacks Onsite fitness center and fitness program credit Annual CalTrain Go Pass A Roblox Admin badge for your avatar ']

job_text: ['Problem solving skills and can-do attitude are essential in this role', 'Background developing quality Smalltalk code and delivering product feature documentation', 'We offer a competitive base salary plus benefits', 'Passion for and experience with Smalltalk (Cincom Smalltalk experience a plus)Significant C experienceLanguage design involving SmalltalkExperience with assembly language, possibly JIT, a plusBackground developing quality Smalltalk code and delivering product feature documentationProblem solving skills and can-do attitude are essential in this roleMust be able to work individually and in a distributed team environmentExperience with API calls and platform libraries on various operating systems (Windows, Mac, Linux, Unix) ', 'Note: The Cincom Smalltalk Development Team is a fully distributed/remote team.', 'Cincom creates and delivers software and services to clients worldwide who need to innovate and simplify complex business processes. Cincom’s easy-to-use, high-value software solutions empower clients to overcome operation obstacles, paving the way to higher productivity, sustainability, and profit. Cincom serves thousands of clients on six continents.', 'Must be able to work individually and in a distributed team environment', ' ', 'Experience with assembly language, possibly JIT, a plus', ' ...an equal opportunity employer', '\xa0', 'Language design involving Smalltalk', 'Experience with API calls and platform libraries on various operating systems (Windows, Mac, Linux, Unix) ', 'Passion for and experience with Smalltalk (Cincom Smalltalk experience a plus)', 'About Cincom Systems', 'Qualifications', 'Significant C experience', 'If you are interested in joining the Cincom Smalltalk Development Team, please APPLY NOW. job_text: ['• \xa0 \xa0  Create Implementation Plans for network changes and projects. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 10 years of experience and a B.S. degree. Bachelor of Science (BS) can be substituted with an additional 12 years of related experience. ', "The Senior Network Engineer will need to have experience working in highly available Data Center environments. As the Engineer you will oversee the installation of networking hardware in addition to maintaining, supervising, and troubleshooting the existing network. Network engineers work to install and maintain a network on which a company's information and communications are stored and transmitted. This could include local area networks (LANs) and wireless Internet networks. Cisco administrators have experience specifically in Cisco software and technology products. When a problem arises, the engineer must work quickly to determine a solution and maintain the system's security. Cisco engineers also monitor the company's network and let their superiors know about any emerging requirements or necessary updates. ", '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 1-3 years direct experience with Cisco Firepower ASA ', '• \xa0 \xa0  Assist in developing, implementing, testing, and maintaining disaster recovery plans. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 1-3 years direct experience with F-5 Load Balancers ', '• \xa0 \xa0  Performing a wide range of network administration duties including installations, debugging, maintenance, upgrades, and general support for Cisco, Juniper, F-5, HP, Nortel, Brocade, and Extreme network equipment. ', '• \xa0 \xa0  Work closely with the fellow tech team members to provide end-user support and issue resolution. ', ' ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 1-3 years direct experience with Cisco ACI ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 1-3 years direct experience with Cisco 9k/7k/5k/2k/1k, Data center SDN ', '• \xa0 \xa0  Proactive monitoring of all network devices, services, and servers using a combination of tools to ensure high availability and SLA’s. ', '• \xa0 \xa0  Collaborate with and support the work of other staff engaged in similar functions ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 1-3 years direct experience with Juniper Firewalls', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 1-3 years direct experience with Application Policy Infrastructure Controller (APIC) ', '• \xa0 \xa0  Research, evaluate and recommend technologies to support business requirements. ', '• \xa0 \xa0  Manage & troubleshoot network and Internet connectivity throughout the organization. ', '• \xa0 \xa0  Maintain up-to-date knowledge of emerging tools and technologies. ', '\xa0 ', '• \xa0 \xa0  Assist in the configuration and deployment of core and peripheral network devices, which will require continuous learning of new devices (i.e. Nexus switches, ASR routers, Cisco Firepower, and long-haul optical equipment). ', 'Required MS Degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience. ', '7+ years of overall experience with at least 2 in Big Data related positions. ', 'You already know that ServiceNow is changing the way people work. Accelerate your career and succeed in an environment where you can make an impact daily. We invite you to join in and stand out.All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, sex, color, religion, national origin, or on the basis of disability. Working at Megaphone also means full benefits, competitive salary, and a friendly work environment. This role is open to fully remote candidates, as well as candidates near our Reston, VA office. ['2021 Intern', 'Software Engineer (Applied Technologies)', '284629Who We AreTextron Systems is part of Textron, a $14 billion, multi-industry company employing 35,000 talented makers, thinkers, creators and doers worldwide. We make things that fly, hover, zoom and launch. Things that move people. Protect soldiers. Power industries. We serve customers in industries spanning aerospace and defense, specialized vehicles, turf care and fuel systems.This role is in Textron Systems Unmanned Systems division. Visit TextronSystems.com & Lycoming.com to read more about who we are and the products we make!About This Role We believe people should love what they do in this role, you will be responsible for: Providing engineering support on both next generation technologies and proven platforms that support and protect our deployed warfighter Participating in software development of new products across all phases of the design lifecycle from concept development to lab integration and evaluation concepts Opportunities that range from embedded control systems, to operator interfaces, to mobile device applications Working cohesively on a multi-functional team with a wide diversity of exciting technologies and productsQualifications Currently pursuing or have completed a bachelors degree in Computer Science/Computer Engineering/CIS/MIS or a related field Ability to work 40 hrs/week over the course of a summer C/C++, C#, Python, and/or Java programmingHow We CareAt Textron Systems, our talented people make us successful. We promote an inclusive environment where we value individuality, differences, and unique perspectives.Our Company is committed to offering employees opportunities to grow and develop. Our benefits and compensation packages are designed to help our talented employees excel and achieve their goals, so they can make a difference every day in and outside of the workplace. Below are just a few examples!- Flexible Work Schedules', "Education Assistance- Career Development & Training Opportunities- Wellness Program (including Fitness Reimbursement)- Medical, Dental, Vision & 401(K) with Company Funding- Paid Parental Leave Are you a Military Veteran? Textron'sproducts and services are trusted everyday by those who protect ourcountry. We are dedicated to hiringthese Veterans and aim to translate their skills to make an impact on ourCompany.EEO Statement Textron is committed to providing Equal Opportunity in Employment, to all applicants and employees regardless of, race, color, religion, gender, age, national origin, military status, veteran status, handicap, physical or mental disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any other characteristic protected by law.Pay Transparency Policy Statement The contractor will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant. However, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise, have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the contractors legal duty to furnish information.Job FieldPrimary Location US-Maryland-Hunt ValleySchedule Full-timeJob LevelShift First ShiftJob Posting 08/25/2020, 4:27:47 PMTextron (and its subsidiaries) participates in E-Verify. We will provide the U.S. Social Security Administration (SSA) and, if necessary, the U.S. Department of Homeland Security (DHS) with information from each new employers Form I-9 to confirm work authorization.Textron values diversity to enhance our businesses.", 'Software Engineer (Applied Technologies) (284629)2021 Intern']

', 'You’ll own technical strategy for broad or complex requirements with insightful and forward-looking approaches that go beyond the direct team and solve large open-ended problems. ['', 'SageMaker', 'Our data science team takes ideas from inception to new machine learning-powered features that ship to our hundreds of thousands of users. You’ll be central to creating features that help our customers learn and grow from their data. For this role, we’re looking for people who are first and foremost software engineers with an interest in data science.', 'HTML, JavaScript, React', 'Python', 'Have experience processing cloud-scale data using parallel, elastic, streaming and similar techniques.', 'Understand how to profile code and optimize performance.', 'We love programming and the excitement that comes with building something people use. And unlike other marketing platforms, Klaviyo doesn’t force companies to compromise between advanced functionality or ease of use - so companies of all sizes are able to maximize their sales quickly. That’s why over 45,000+ innovative companies like Unilever, Custom Ink and Eventbrite sell more with Klaviyo.', 'Design and implement systems that run correctly, securely and reliably at scale.', 'Have experience building software solutions for customer needsHave experience implementing machine learning models, data pipelines and testing frameworks for research and production use.Have experience processing cloud-scale data using parallel, elastic, streaming and similar techniques.Understand how to profile code and optimize performance.Aspire to correctness (e.g. in your code, in drawing conclusions from data)Have a bachelor’s or advanced degree in computer science, applied math, statistics or other relevant quantitative discipline, or equivalent industry experience.', 'Numpy, Scipy, Pandas', 'Have experience building software solutions for customer needs']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Creative Tools and Environments
job_text: ['', 'We have a lot of fun bringing wild ideas to life at Hack Day!', 'We’re bringing unique stories from around the world to a global audience at a scale never done before, powered by Netflix Studio Engineering', 'Curious to learn new technologies and flexible to confront a variety of work', 'You’ll collaborate with product managers and designers and content creators, to build exciting new features', 'Ability to design and build microservice-based distributed systems', 'Leverage existing Netflix technology via cross functional partnerships.', 'Engage with top creative professionals to define new workflows and techniques', 'Independent, proactive, and able to deliver production-ready code with minimal guidance', 'Connect Animation and VFX artists across the globe to tell unique stories in novel ways', 'Our culture is something we strive to constantly improve and practice daily', 'Experience with Java and its ecosystem of frameworks and build tools.', 'You’ll work with other senior, high-performing engineers so you will be constantly learning and sharpening your skill set', 'Elevate filmmakers worldwide with cutting edge creative tools', 'Great communication and collaboration skills working cross-functionally with other engineers, product managers, and designers']

', 'Create data pipelines capable of transforming disparate data into a common format ', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, etc. or equivalent years of experience Deep experience with a variety of programming languages such as: Java, C++, Python, Go, Rust HL7 knowledge and experience is required, certification preferred Expertise with healthcare data formats, particularly parsing and transformation of: JSON (FHIR), XML (C-CDA and IHE profiles), X12 (Claims), DICOM, and EDI (HL7 v2) 3+ years of integration experience Prior experience with data integration engines such as Rhapsody, Ensemble, etc is preferred Prior experience with EHS systems such as EPIC, Cerner, Meditech, Allscripts, or Athena is preferred', '3+ years of integration experience', 'They essentially need someone who has an extensive background dealing with healthcare data/standards/interoperability!', 'Our client, a healthtech startup, is actively looking for a Senior Healthcare Data Engineer to join their team based out of NYC! ['', ' Intern Program Perks ', 'Professional & Personal Development: We’ll help you prepare for your future with resume reviews, weekly round-table discussions, and specialty skills trainings (ex: negotiation, efficient meetings, feedback techniques).', 'Donation Matching: ', 'Casual Dress: Come as you are. Wear what makes you most comfortable so you can focus on making a difference.', 'Department Cross Training', 'Discount on Products: Enjoy a 20% discount on the products we sell. ', 'Build and maintain strong relationships with technology partners and business stakeholders.', 'Community Impact Project: Bring your passion for social impact as you will collaborate with other interns to implement an initiative to make positive change in our communities.', 'Mentorship: ', 'Workshops and Trainings: You will take part in an intern-wide workshop called “Spreetail Connect” where you will be developed as a professional, take deep dives into our company/departments, and learn new technology/tools.', 'Real Life Experience', ' Who You Are ', 'Willing to learn and ability to adapt.', 'Competitive Pay: We know the work that you’ll do is valuable, so we want to make sure you receive that value in return.', 'Create software that can be monitored, analyzed, and optimized to automate.', 'Department Cross Training: We want to show you all aspects of our business and help you learn about the world of ecommerce.', 'Workshops and Trainings: You will take part in an intern-wide workshop called “Spreetail Connect” where you will be developed as a professional, take deep dives into our company/departments, and learn new technology/tools.Real Life Experience: The work that you will do at Spreetail is meaningful and makes a lasting impact. You will work alongside our full-time team and take part in tasks and projects with them.Networking Opportunities: We partner with the Lincoln Partnership for Economic Development to connect us with local companies to provide networking opportunities. Throughout the summer, you will meet other interns through projects and activities.In-Depth Onboarding: You’ll take a deep dive into each of our departments, learn about our history and vision, and take part in hands-on projects in order to be as prepared as possible to take on your new role.Competitive Pay: We know the work that you’ll do is valuable, so we want to make sure you receive that value in return.Community Impact Project: Bring your passion for social impact as you will collaborate with other interns to implement an initiative to make positive change in our communities.Department Cross Training: We want to show you all aspects of our business and help you learn about the world of ecommerce.Casual Dress: Come as you are. Wear what makes you most comfortable so you can focus on making a difference.Professional & Personal Development: We’ll help you prepare for your future with resume reviews, weekly round-table discussions, and specialty skills trainings (ex: negotiation, efficient meetings, feedback techniques).Mentorship: You will be paired with two mentors: one inside your department and one outside your department. They will provide you with feedback to help identify opportunities to improve and grow in your role and as a professional.Social Events: Spreetail has organized events exclusively planned by interns for interns, as well as regular company outings for the team and our families.Tech Tools & Equipment: We provide you with all of the technology and tools you need to level up your skills and be successful in your role.Discount on Products: Enjoy a 20% discount on the products we sell. Donation Matching: We want you to contribute to causes that you feel revolutionize your community. Starting your first day, Spreetail will match up to $250 each calendar year toward any nonprofit cause you choose. ['Position Description: We are seeking software engineers that possess a mix of talent areas related to full-stack development. ['**Role can be located in Austin, TX or Newport Beach, CA**Role:We are seeking a hardworking application developer to join our team. Building on top of PIMCO’s modern cloud-based solution infrastructure, we develop and maintain the central applications, platforms and tools that are the backbone of PIMCO’s trading and portfolio management processes by maximizing scalable technology solutions provided by PIMCO’s core engineering team. Dedicated to supporting a culture of diversity, inclusion and acceptance, at PIMCO we work to create an environment where all our people can be their authentic selves. We strive to heighten our employees’ appreciation for diverse perspectives and skills, facilitating increased collaboration and enhancing our ability to attract and engage top talent.In this role, you will be working on:•  Trade risk sizing and capital allocation decision support tools•  Order generation•  Fine-grained trade risk and performance tracking•  Portfolio PnL and historical performance attribution•  Customized Trade Floor reportingResponsibilities:•  Forward development of new system components and enhancements to the existing codebase•  Direct interaction with business users (Trade Floor, PMs, Risk Managers, etc.) in order to define, rollout, and support new platform features•  Detailed understanding of various aspects of PIMCO business and operational processes•  Architecture, design, and coding; solving engineering challenges associated with large data processing volumes, complex calculation dependencies, horizontal compute scale vs centralized data storage, etc. ', 'Requirements:•\xa0Candidates should have 5 years of experience in the investment domain building large-scale application solutions by using modern full stack technologies in a front office environment or supporting a portfolio management technology capacity•  Solid experience in writing backend services using Java or C# (while we are using Java, we will consider strong candidates in other languages as long as they show ability to learn Java)•  Interest in learning about / working with modern UI technologies']

['', 'Technical.', ' Develop expertise in VizQL Server’s telemetry, working closely with other team members to increase observability of Tableau’s analytics code. ', 'Job Details', ' Collaborate with other team members to achieve increasingly high standards of engineering and operational excellence.', 'Need for speed.', 'Accommodations ', 'Accommodations  - ', 'Salesforce.org', 'Passionate.', 'Analyze production performance and reliability for VizQL Server, the service at the core of Tableau’s analytics capabilities. Develop expertise in VizQL Server’s telemetry, working closely with other team members to increase observability of Tableau’s analytics code.  Troubleshoot issues in technically challenging C++ and Java code using centralized logs, post-mortem debugging, diagnostic tools and other techniques.  Work closely with teammates to design and implement features for automated detection, analysis and remediation of recurring issues.  Collaborate with other team members to achieve increasingly high standards of engineering and operational excellence.', 'Experienced.', 'Technical. You’re fluent in commonly used design patterns and can constructively review the work of others to ensure high quality. You have a good understanding of concurrency, asynchronous programming and synchronization.', 'Passionate. You have a passion for solving complex problems, be they at work or in your spare time on your own projects. You do great work even when no one is watching. The drive to deliver is just part of you.', 'Job Category', 'You are a Recruiter! Tableau hires company builders and, in this role, you will be asked to be on the constant lookout for the best talent to bring onboard to help us continue to build one of the best companies in the world!', 'Need for speed. You can analyze systems, find bottlenecks and leverage best practices to improve performance.', ' Troubleshoot issues in technically challenging C++ and Java code using centralized logs, post-mortem debugging, diagnostic tools and other techniques. ', 'To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.', 'Relentlessly High Standards.', 'Posting Statement', 'A True Team Player.', 'Salesfore.com', 'What you will be doing…', ' Work closely with teammates to design and implement features for automated detection, analysis and remediation of recurring issues. ', 'Analyze production performance and reliability for VizQL Server, the service at the core of Tableau’s analytics capabilities.', 'Salesforce.com', 'A True Team Player. You enjoy collaborating, learning from and teaching others so we can all become better engineers. You assume good intent in others, and actively do your part to make a positive work environment.', 'Experienced. You have 3+ years of professional software development experience. You have strong skills programming in modern C++ as well as one or more OO languages such as Java or C#.Need for speed. You can analyze systems, find bottlenecks and leverage best practices to improve performance.Technical. You’re fluent in commonly used design patterns and can constructively review the work of others to ensure high quality. You have a good understanding of concurrency, asynchronous programming and synchronization.Passionate. You have a passion for solving complex problems, be they at work or in your spare time on your own projects. You do great work even when no one is watching. The drive to deliver is just part of you.Relentlessly High Standards. You understand what it takes to write software that is used by thousands or millions of people. You love writing things that “just work” – things that are robust, scalable and perform well. You thrill in your accomplishments but also know it’s about doing and improving.A True Team Player. You enjoy collaborating, learning from and teaching others so we can all become better engineers. You assume good intent in others, and actively do your part to make a positive work environment.You are a Recruiter! Tableau hires company builders and, in this role, you will be asked to be on the constant lookout for the best talent to bring onboard to help us continue to build one of the best companies in the world!', 'Who You Are…', 'You are a Recruiter', 'Experienced. You have 3+ years of professional software development experience. You have strong skills programming in modern C++ as well as one or more OO languages such as Java or C#.', 'Relentlessly High Standards. You understand what it takes to write software that is used by thousands or millions of people. You love writing things that “just work” – things that are robust, scalable and perform well. You thrill in your accomplishments but also know it’s about doing and improving.']

ability to write backend code in Python or Node.js Adaptable, humble, and interested in making an impact 3+ years experience in Front-End or UI Developer job [Required] BSc in Computer Science, or equivalent work experience  ', 'What we value and look for in a Front-End Software Engineer:', 'Help think of new features and product ideas ', 'What a typical week may look like at Forethought: ', 'Build category-defining products ', 'A chance to be an early member of the team, with equity to match ', '"Full-stack" mentality; ability to write backend code in Python or Node.js ', 'Detailed ability to implement pixel-perfect UI from pixel-perfect mock-ups ', 'Strong coding ability; able to work in large code-bases with fluency ', 'Past work building web or mobile applications in a real world setting ', '[Required] BSc in Computer Science, or equivalent work experience ', 'Develop new features in HTML/CSS/Javascript using React.js ', 'Work with Backend Team to develop or modify an API endpoint ', 'Adaptable, humble, and interested in making an impact ', ' ', 'What we value and look for in a Front-End Software Engineer: ', "Test and launch your code to the world's largest companies ", 'Work with world class talent (ex Facebook, Palantir, Dropbox, LinkedIn) ', '3+ years experience in Front-End or UI Developer job ', 'Medical, dental and vision coverage ', 'What you get:', 'Unlimited PTO policy', "Develop new features in HTML/CSS/Javascript using React.js Work with Backend Team to develop or modify an API endpoint Work with Design Team to develop a pixel-perfect interface Help think of new features and product ideas Test and launch your code to the world's largest companies Iterate and do it all over again ", 'Iterate and do it all over again ', 'What a typical week may look like at Forethought:', 'Make an impact, and help make everyone a genius at their job ', 'As a member of the Front-End Team, you will be responsible for developing the user-facing products, features, and platforms at Forethought. years of software testing experience;', 'Ability to lead multiple projects at a time;', 'Commission, design, configure and adapt automated testing tools to meet the needs of new and existing applications;', 'This specific Senior Software Engineer holds a challenging responsibility unique within this Software Development Organization. This position will serve as the technical lead within the Quality Assurance team to design and direct the activities that test the suite of applications that make up the Infor Location Based Intelligence software portfolio. In addition, this individual will take an active part in the overall design of the products under development. Goals of this position will be, among others, to strive for 100% QA test case automation, enhance system scalability test strategy, enhance system performance test strategy, ensure our systems are designed with testability in mind, and reduce our system test regression cycle time. This individual must have a very strong software development background, be familiar with both on-premise and web-hosted software service architectures, be creative, collaborative, driven and always consider the big picture when making decisions.', '5+ years of software development experience (Java, JavaScript, SQL);', 'Commission, design, configure and adapt automated testing tools to meet the needs of new and existing applications;Advise in test case and test suite creation and execution;Oversee and participate in the overall testing process through test review and analysis;Oversee the development of QA and testing documentation for Location Based Intelligence products;Cooperatively establish and maintain standard concepts, practices, and procedures associated with the software development cycle;Work closely with internal team members to understand the technical requirements and technical implementation of products to achieve testing team goals;Coordinate the timely execution of tasks among QA engineers, working in conjunction with the development team;Collaborate with software architects and subject matter experts to analyze tradeoffs between testability and other technical implementation needs;Foster a success-oriented, accountable, collaborative, and ethical environment within the company;Provide support to services team when needed;Perform other activities and duties related to the quality assurance role, as directed by management.', 'Strong presentation skills and proven presentation experience;', 'Oversee the development of QA and testing documentation for Location Based Intelligence products;', 'Perform other activities and duties related to the quality assurance role, as directed by management.', 'Responsibilities:']

['', "Candidates must have a Bachelor's degree (ideally Computer Science, or a relevant engineering field) and at least 3 years designing, building, and operating Linux systems as well as in-depth knowledge of Python for automation. Experience with Ansible, Puppet, Terraform, or Packer is highly desirable, as well as any experience with network engineering, or server hardware (HP, Dell UCS).", 'The role is responsible for many aspects of Linux systems engineering including deployment, performance management (hardware and OS tuning), automation (Python), tooling, visibility, building and maintaining Infrastructure-as-code, and troubleshooting complex Linux issues.', 'Senior Linux Systems Engineer - New York City - Permanent / Direct Hire', 'Please note this is a full-time/permanent role, not available on contract, and unfortunately, neither Harrington Starr nor our client has plans to sponsor or transfer visas.', "Harrington Starr's client, a top hedge fund, is hiring for a Linux Systems Engineer in the NYC area. The firm is currently 100% remote but the role will eventually be based full-time in the NYC office.", 'If this sounds like a fit for you or someone you know, please get in touch ASAP. Apply directly or email me your resume at Matt.Kerwin@HarringtonStarr.com.']

['', ' DMP (Data Mapping) - a high-performance pub/sub system for real-time data models, used by a large number of functions in the Bloomberg Terminal (instant messaging, market data, etc.).', ' MBUS (Message Bus) - a very-high-performance, low-latency pub/sub system used by hundreds of server-side applications including many mission-critical systems. MBUS uses a combination of TCP, UDP and multicast (PGM) and scales up to millions of messages per second on a typical Linux box.', ' BMQ (Bloomberg Message Queues) - a clustered queue based messaging solution for Bloomberg providing high performance and high-reliability. BMQ significantly outperforms popular open source MQ systems and is designed with high resiliency at the core.', ' Exposure to all phases of the software development life cycle', ' Knowledge of network protocols such as TCP/IP and multicast and various optimization techniques', 'Bloomberg is an equal opportunities employer, and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', ' 2+ years experience with multi-threaded programming', ' 5+ years demonstrated experience in C++ 2+ years experience with multi-threaded programming 2+ years experience designing or working with complex distributed systems A deep understanding of object-oriented design, data structures, and algorithms An aptitude for analytical problem solving Exposure to all phases of the software development life cycle BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field', ' Experience working with Linux/UNIX', ' 2+ years experience designing or working with complex distributed systems', ' 5+ years demonstrated experience in C++', ' Willingness to use programming languages such as Python, JavaScript, or other scripting languages', ' BMQ (Bloomberg Message Queues) - a clustered queue based messaging solution for Bloomberg providing high performance and high-reliability. BMQ significantly outperforms popular open source MQ systems and is designed with high resiliency at the core. DMP (Data Mapping) - a high-performance pub/sub system for real-time data models, used by a large number of functions in the Bloomberg Terminal (instant messaging, market data, etc.). MBUS (Message Bus) - a very-high-performance, low-latency pub/sub system used by hundreds of server-side applications including many mission-critical systems. MBUS uses a combination of TCP, UDP and multicast (PGM) and scales up to millions of messages per second on a typical Linux box.', 'The Message-Oriented Middleware (MOM) team builds some of the most critical application frameworks at Bloomberg, used every day by thousands of engineers.', 'Together they form a software infrastructure designed for creating large-scale, fault-tolerant applications that run on thousands of machines throughout the world. With many clients depending on our infrastructure solutions, we are looking to grow the MOM team.', ' Willingness to use programming languages such as Python, JavaScript, or other scripting languages Familiarity with networking Experience working with Linux/UNIX Familiarity with the nuances of building high volume, high availability distributed systems Knowledge of network protocols such as TCP/IP and multicast and various optimization techniques', ' A deep understanding of object-oriented design, data structures, and algorithms', ' An aptitude for analytical problem solving', ' Familiarity with the nuances of building high volume, high availability distributed systems', ' BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field', ' Familiarity with networking']

You will collaborate with designers, product managers, and engineers–all of whom are eager to embrace change to improve. You will have a platform to influence our entire product landscape.', 'Prides themselves on writing highly readable, thoroughly tested code (we use React and Python)', 'Is driven to unlock the potential of data to positively impact the real world', 'The role:', 'As a core member of the team you will share technical ownership of our user experience with a team of motivated, product-minded individuals.\xa0', 'Gets excited when working as part of a motivated, collaborative team', 'The opportunity:', 'Apply now to learn more!', 'Technical Challenge - You will be building the UX for sophisticated data users as well as scaling high-throughput, high-availability ML-driven systems on cloud infrastructure.\xa0These systems drive critical decision making at multi-billion dollar companies.Ownership - The CSL team is retooling.\xa0An ideal candidate is an engineer looking to grow their responsibilities and work with the team to have a significant technical and business impact.']

job_text: ['', 'Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization', 'Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience ', 'Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs', 'Staff Data Scientist on the League Data Central team', ' Experience with data science for eCommerce  Familiarity with monetizations strategies in the gaming industry Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop) Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP) Experience working in an Agile environment ', 'Improve our data science practice by identifying novel techniques and technical approaches', 'Work with stakeholders across the organization and on initiatives, gathering requirements, designing project plans, determining approaches, and defining success criteria', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills. ['', 'At Aderant, we power the world’s leading law and professional services firms. We focus on delivering world class products and services which are developed, marketed, sold, and supported by superior talent. We're looking for people that offer passion, quality, delivery focus, leadership and problem solving. Our teams are empowered and fast moving – our belief is that this happens with good collaboration and communication, meaning that we can act on the ideas and thought leadership that you'll bring to the table.\xa0Our company is a multi-national corporation with development teams spanning many locations: you would be working daily with developers and testers from around the world including locations in North America and New Zealand.", 'Possess thorough knowledge of company’s products used by customers', 'Knowledge in Database Administration tasks not required, but a plus', 'Excellent writing, editing, interpersonal and communications skills', 'Collaborate with team on testing and troubleshooting', '4 years professional software development experience', 'Familiarity with SQL and relational databases', 'Professional appearance and presentation', 'Global provider of market leading solutions. Dynamic team culture. Competitive bonus programs. Collaborative cross-functional teams. World class benefits. Challenging and Rewarding work.', 'Familiarity with Network and/or Windows native diagnostic tools not required, but a plus', 'Excellent problem-solving abilities and logic skills', 'Related employment experience in software development is considered', '4-year degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related majorRelated employment experience in software development is considered4 years professional software development experienceExperience with web development (HTML, CSS, various front-end frameworks)Experience with .NET and C#Familiarity with SQL and relational databasesExperience with T-SQL is strongly preferredKnowledge in Database Administration tasks not required, but a plusAble to resolve general product problems via telephone or email supportFamiliarity with Network and/or Windows native diagnostic tools not required, but a plusKnowledge of network and PC architectureExcellent problem-solving abilities and logic skillsExcellent writing, editing, interpersonal and communications skillsProfessional appearance and presentation', 'Able to resolve general product problems via telephone or email support', 'Travel to client site to provide in depth support or to research issues (travel requirement < 10%)', 'Participate in source code peer reviews and design reviews as required', 'Adopt agile philosophies and improve methodology implementation', 'Provide support to junior team members', 'Work side by side with Support to investigate issues, review code changes made by junior developers and/or contractors, work with a BA to maintain and develop features in both the existing commercial web site and enterprise web application']

['', '\xa0Python experience is a plus.', 'You possess a rock solid knowledge of web languages (JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, and/or CSS) and backend JavaScript tooling (Node, Babel, Nginx, and/or webpack) is required.', 'Location:\xa0REMOTE', 'You will work and collaborate with business stakeholders to understand their needs and build and design innovative products to provide novel solutions.', ' ', '\xa0You will be responsible for contributing your expertise to include new product ideation in collaboration with technology research, and contributing to core data visualization frameworks and front end code bases.', 'Applicants must be authorized to work in the United States legally.', 'You have some experience managing day-to-day technical and design direction for production-level software is required.', '\xa0', 'Title:\xa0 Front End Engineer/ Product Manager', 'You have a critical understanding for developing products with clear and intuitive UX/UI ', 'Location:\xa0', '\xa0You will be working in an established financial company designing, building, and managing front end technology infrastructure for quantitative financial research.', 'Title:\xa0', '\xa0You have been and are a successful software developer who is at the TOP of the team always wanting to LEARN/ INNOVATE/ EXPLORE/ and be CHALLENGED', 'You have superb verbal and written communication skills ', 'You possess two to three years of industry experience in software development at a start-up or technology company.']

['', 'Headquartered in Boston, we have been named as one of North America’s fastest growing software companies as reported by Deloitte and Inc. Magazine, and have been rated a leader by the analyst community and named one of the Best Places to Work by the Boston Business Journal. We are Acquia. We are building for the future of the web, and we want you to be a part of it. ', 'Deep, working knowledge of AWS Cloud hosting experience, Ruby ', 'You’ll enjoy this role if you are… ', 'Advanced knowledge of distributed database and file system management and concepts ', 'You’ll enjoy this role if you are…', 'Able to lead by example ', 'Thank you for considering Acquia for your next career move, and we look forward to receiving your application. There’s no such thing as the perfect candidate. So, we’re not looking for someone who matches all of our criteria; we’re looking for someone with the potential to grow outward and upward. Regardless of how much of the criteria you meet, you should apply! ', 'Inclined to document and diagram ideas as a primary method of communication ', 'We are committed to continually strengthening our people-first culture within our Acquia family. Acquia is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive environment for all. Our highly motivated team features individuals from a multitude of backgrounds who offer their unique perspectives, starting with their first project as a new hire to their 100th as a manager and beyond. For every step in between, we help Acquians grow by promoting a culture of continuous learning through mentorship, knowledge-sharing, feedback, and more. ', 'Automated testing and continuous integration experience--Jenkins, TravisCI, unit tests, system tests, etc. ', 'The Principal Software Engineer is an integral member of the Acquia technology team and ensures that the company’s software products are well engineered, operable, maintainable, and aligned with the strategy and vision of the business. ', 'Experience with modern containerization systems: Docker, LXC, etc. ', 'Acquia', 'Acquia\xa0is an equal opportunity (EEO) employer. We hire without regard to age, color, disability, gender (including gender identity), marital status, national origin, race, religion, sex, sexual orientation, veteran status, or any other status protected by applicable law.', 'About the team you will be on… ', 'A passionate learner who provides guidance through questions as opposed to statements ', 'Deep, working knowledge of AWS Cloud hosting experience, Ruby Strong Object Oriented Programming experience in PHP Holistic understanding of the Internet and hosting from the network layer up through the application layer Strong background with service oriented architectures, and building scalable, reliable systems 7+ years of experience\xa0 ', 'Write blogs, white papers, and demonstrate domain expertise for internal/external publication ', 'Strong background with service oriented architectures, and building scalable, reliable systems ', 'What you’ll need to be successful…', 'Experienced Linux OS system management (Ubuntu, Centos) ', 'Web security and compliance experience (e.g., Firewalls, IDS/IPS systems, DOS prevention and PCI, HIPAA, FedRAMP, etc.) ', 'About the team you will be on…', 'As the Principal Software Engineer, you will… ', 'What you’ll need to be successful… ', 'Extra credit if you have... ', 'Networking (e.g., TCP/IP, Routing, DNS, load balancing, HTTP caching, clustering, VPN, etc.) ', 'Extra credit if you have...', '7+ years of experience\xa0 ', 'Drupal setup, maintenance and operational knowledge ', 'There’s no such thing as the perfect candidate. ', "Diagram and document current and future architectural plans that technical and non-technical stakeholders can understand how Acquia's technology works ", 'Influence internal stakeholders, including the CPO and CTO, engineering leads, product managers, and executives ', 'Configuration management (e.g., Puppet, Ansible, Chef) ', 'We work on a variety of exciting projects ranging from running massive microservice infrastructures, building highly available database clusters, scaling data pipelines and machine learning to enable our customers to deliver amazing digital experiences that are visited by millions of people each day. ', 'Mentor and lead engineering teams via quality of ideas, code and communication as a domain expert ', 'Comfortable under pressure and welcomes new challenges ', ' ', 'Strong Object Oriented Programming experience in PHP ', 'Able to work in an agile DevOps methodology collaborating and enabling all around them ', 'Able to communicate complex, technical concepts to a wide range of stakeholders with varying perspectives and technical expertise ', 'Strong experience in different programming languages: Go, Python, Varnish, CDN ', 'Drive deployment of new features or systems and the retirement of old ones, and be a change advocate for customers and employees, in order to simplify product development and operations and increase velocity ', 'As the Principal Software Engineer, you will…', "Acquia is the open source digital experience company. We provide the world's most ambitious brands with technology that allows them to embrace innovation and create customer moments that matter. At Acquia we believe in the power of community and collaboration - giving our customers the freedom to build tomorrow on their terms. ", 'Strong experience in different programming languages: Go, Python, Varnish, CDN Configuration management (e.g., Puppet, Ansible, Chef) Experience with modern containerization systems: Docker, LXC, etc. Web security and compliance experience (e.g., Firewalls, IDS/IPS systems, DOS prevention and PCI, HIPAA, FedRAMP, etc.) Networking (e.g., TCP/IP, Routing, DNS, load balancing, HTTP caching, clustering, VPN, etc.) Experienced Linux OS system management (Ubuntu, Centos) Automated testing and continuous integration experience--Jenkins, TravisCI, unit tests, system tests, etc. Drupal setup, maintenance and operational knowledge Advanced knowledge of distributed database and file system management and concepts ', 'Holistic understanding of the Internet and hosting from the network layer up through the application layer ', '\xa0is an equal opportunity (EEO) employer. We hire without regard to age, color, disability, gender (including gender identity), marital status, national origin, race, religion, sex, sexual orientation, veteran status, or any other status protected by applicable law.', "Mentor and lead engineering teams via quality of ideas, code and communication as a domain expert Influence internal stakeholders, including the CPO and CTO, engineering leads, product managers, and executives Diagram and document current and future architectural plans that technical and non-technical stakeholders can understand how Acquia's technology works Drive deployment of new features or systems and the retirement of old ones, and be a change advocate for customers and employees, in order to simplify product development and operations and increase velocity Write blogs, white papers, and demonstrate domain expertise for internal/external publication Collaborate with vendors and influence their roadmap to align with Acquia’s long term roadmap ", 'Collaborate with vendors and influence their roadmap to align with Acquia’s long term roadmap ', 'Able to lead by example A passionate learner who provides guidance through questions as opposed to statements Inclined to document and diagram ideas as a primary method of communication Able to communicate complex, technical concepts to a wide range of stakeholders with varying perspectives and technical expertise Comfortable under pressure and welcomes new challenges Able to work in an agile DevOps methodology collaborating and enabling all around them ']

job_title: Software Engineer (C++ | OOD/OOP | Design pattern | UML | Linux )
job_text: ['', 'BS, MS or PhD preferred, in Computer Science / Engineering or similar fields. ', 'Linux administration knowledge and UML knowledge are plus. ', 'BS, MS or PhD preferred, in Computer Science / Engineering or similar fields. Strong technical skills in OOD/OOP, design patterns, interface definitions are essential. Demonstrated multitasking/threading programming experience are required. Strong software diagnostic and troubleshooting skills are required. Linux administration knowledge and UML knowledge are plus. Strong team player and motivated by team success. Experience in semiconductor fab operations/manufacturing technology (optional) ', 'Kindly send your resume to sivaram.bose@kla.com\xa0 ', 'Strong technical skills in OOD/OOP, design patterns, interface definitions are essential. ', 'Demonstrated multitasking/threading programming experience are required. ', "Doctorate (Academic)ORMaster's Level Degree with at least 2 years of experience.ORBachelor's Level Degree with at least 3 years of experience. ", 'Company Overview', "Calling the adventurers ready to join a company that's pushing the limits of nanotechnology to keep the digital revolution rolling. At KLA, we're making technology advancements that are bigger—and tinier—than the world has ever seen.Who are we?  We research, develop, and manufacture the world's most advanced inspection and measurement equipment for the semiconductor and nanoelectronics industries. We enable the digital age by pushing the boundaries of technology, creating tools capable of finding defects smaller than a wavelength of visible light. We create smarter processes so that technology leaders can manufacture high-performance chips—the kind in that phone in your pocket, the tablet on your desk and nearly every electronic device you own—faster and better. We're passionate about creating solutions that drive progress and help people do what wouldn't be possible without us.  The future is calling. Will you answer? ", 'The RAPID division is the world leading provider of reticle inspection solutions for the semiconductor industry. The company provides inspection solutions to both the mask shops and the semiconductor fabs to ensure that lithography yields are consistently high thus enabling cost-effective manufacturing. ', 'Responsibilities ', 'The best candidates for this position will be a highly motivated self-driven individual who has strong C++ programming skill and troubleshooting, debugging skill with thorough knowledge in machine control and multi-threaded programming environment. ', 'Qualifications ', 'Experience in semiconductor fab operations/manufacturing technology (optional) ', 'Responsibilities', ' ', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'While primarily working on machine control software on mask inspection systems, the candidate will interact with multidisciplinary engineering teams including electrical, mechanical, optical, algorithm, and other SW team to acquire in-depth domain knowledge and troubleshoot system problems ', 'Strong team player and motivated by team success. ', 'Group/Division ', 'sivaram.bose@kla.com', 'Group/Division', 'Equal Employment Opportunity', 'Qualifications', 'Minimum Qualifications ', "With over 40 years of semiconductor process control experience, chipmakers around the globe rely on KLA to ensure that their fabs ramp next-generation devices to volume production quickly and cost-effectively. Enabling the movement towards advanced chip design, KLA's Global Products Group (GPG), which is responsible for creating all of KLA’s metrology and inspection products, is looking for the best and the brightest research scientist, software engineers, application development engineers, and senior product technology process engineers. ", 'Strong software diagnostic and troubleshooting skills are required. ']

job_text: ['', 'Solve problems pragmatically, applying judgment and experience to balance trade-offs', 'Develop new algorithms for reliable pose estimation using a ground truth system in challenging and dynamic environmentsWork on images from cameras, point clouds from LIDARs, and IMU dataMaintain existing robot ground truth infrastructureSolve problems pragmatically, applying judgment and experience to balance trade-offs', 'iRobot is looking to hire a Senior Robotics Software Engineer on our System Test Automation team who will play a vital role in developing the next generation of robots that will live in millions of homes across the world. If you are a consumer centric pioneer eager to build innovative robot products, please apply now or reach out to one of our recruiters on LinkedIn. ', 'To Be Successful You Will Have:', 'The System Test Organization is a high performing, multi-disciplined group, that touches every product in the organization. Our mission is to evaluate both iRobot and competitive products,enable risk burn-down and evaluate technologies, predict and assess reliability of designs and products over their life-cycle.', transformations, non-linear optimization', 'Maintain existing robot ground truth infrastructure', 'Work on images from cameras, point clouds from LIDARs, and IMU data', 'Experience in SLAM and pose estimation techniquesSolid background in linear algebra, Lie algebra related to transformations, non-linear optimizationSolid understanding of algorithms like RANSAC, Iterative Closest Point, Normal degree', 'Solid understanding and experience in design patterns, data structures, advanced programming techniques, and test driven development', 'Linux and Windows', 'Introduction:', 'Excellence at writing C# / C++ / Python and familiarity with both Linux and Windows', 'Solid understanding of algorithms like RANSAC, Iterative Closest Point, Normal Distribution Transform, laser scan assembly', 'Passion for robotics and experience building or programming robots professionally or as a hobby']

['', 'Creating GUI using such tools as React, Flux, JSP, HTML, Tag Libraries, JavaScript or any other Java GUI framework', 'Translate business requirements and use cases into functional applicationsEstablish and enforce design and implementation standardsDesign, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable softwareReview, test, and verify code for adherence to quality and security standardsIdentify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problemsDesign and enforce the use of automated unit and integration testingWork with development team to define and implement architecture directionEvaluate and implement tools, libraries, or frameworks to assist in producing softwareAssist in post-implementation, continuous improvement effortsStay abreast on effective tools, strategies and processes', 'Point & Pay, a wholly owned subsidiary of North American Bancard, designs, builds, and integrates advanced payment solutions for governments, utility companies, courts, HOAs, property management companies and other industries with unique payment needs. It’s simple. We make paying bills easier. Everything we do is backed by our best-in-class user interfaces, insightful features and high-quality service and support. We partner with your agency to provide audited, redundant, and compliant payment solutions that deliver exceptional user experiences for your organization’s most mission-critical functions. With over 20 years in business, over 3000 government related clients and millions of transactions completed, we’re proud to offer the best in-class services that help move our clients forward.', 'Review, test, and verify code for adherence to quality and security standards', "What else you'll be doing:", 'Designing/writing systems with a relational database such as Oracle, PostgresDB, or SQL Server', 'Experience with Web Services (SOAP and REST)', 'Expertise in the following:', "If you're a highly experience Software Engineer who thrives in a fast paced environment (in an entrepreneurial setting), who enjoys mentoring others and leading impactful projects - apply now!", 'What we need from you:', 'Analyzing, designing and implementing solutions using JEE (J2EE); designing and developing complex Web Systems', ' ', 'Design and enforce the use of automated unit and integration testing', 'Lead Software Engineer', '\ufeff', 'Stay abreast on effective tools, strategies and processes', 'Point & Pay', 'Point & Pay in Oldsmar, FL OR Portland, OR', 'At North American Bancard, we celebrate diversity and create an inclusive environment for everyone. We are an equal opportunity employer.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related discipline, or equivalent work experience and technical trainingExpertise in the following:Analyzing, designing and implementing solutions using JEE (J2EE); designing and developing complex Web SystemsDesigning/writing systems with a relational database such as Oracle, PostgresDB, or SQL ServerCreating GUI using such tools as React, Flux, JSP, HTML, Tag Libraries, JavaScript or any other Java GUI frameworkWriting automated unit tests using JUnit or similarExperience with Web Services (SOAP and REST)', 'Writing automated unit tests using JUnit or similar', 'Evaluate and implement tools, libraries, or frameworks to assist in producing software', ' apply now!', 'Translate business requirements and use cases into functional applications', 'Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problems', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related discipline, or equivalent work experience and technical training', 'Work with development team to define and implement architecture direction', 'Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable software', 'The Lead Software Engineer is an experienced and skilled developer who creates and maintains Point & Pay applications, helps set and enforce coding standards and best practices, and reviews application code. Our Lead Software Engineers have a track record of delivering excellent software products and providing technical leadership to development teams. In this role, you must be self-disciplined, passionate about innovation, and committed to a positive customer experience. You will provide consultation on complex projects and is considered to be the top level contributor and may lead project teams in the design and development of new applications or features. This role should also serve as a mentor to less experienced engineers. A wide degree of creativity and latitude is expected. All candidates should have very strong communication and teamwork skills and a strong desire and ability to effectively communicate with project stakeholders.', 'Establish and enforce design and implementation standards', 'Assist in post-implementation, continuous improvement efforts']
